SA15dhkpvsvu:1: A number of five figures at the left side indicates the location of the key word
SA15dhkpvsvu:2: in the basic texts. In the case of the SV, the HB and the VN, the first three figures
SA15dhkpvsvu:3: indicate the page number, and the last two indicate the line number (for example,
SA15dhkpvsvu:4: SV16026=SV 160,26; HB02314=HB 23,14; VN06110=VN 61,10). In the case of the
SA15dhkpvsvu:5: PV and the NB, the second figure indicates the chapter number and the last three
SA15dhkpvsvu:6: figures indicate the karika or sutra number (for example, PV02232=PV, the
SA15dhkpvsvu:7: Pramanasiddhi-chapter v.232; NB03015=NB, the Pararthanumana-chapter sutra 15.
SA15dhkpvsvu:8: In the case of the SP, the last two figures indicate the karika number (for example,
SA15dhkpvsvu:10: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units, although they
SA15dhkpvsvu:11: involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words are
SA15dhkpvsvu:12: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
SA15dhkpvsvu:13: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
SA15dhkpvsvu:15: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to
SA15dhkpvsvu:17: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes
SA15dhkpvsvu:18: making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided, and terms
SA15dhkpvsvu:19: such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
SA15dhkpvsvu:20: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta fundamentally
SA15dhkpvsvu:22: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the
SA15dhkpvsvu:23: wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya, tadutpatti,
SA15dhkpvsvu:24: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
SA15dhkpvsvu:25: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
SA15dhkpvsvu:26: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
SA15dhkpvsvu:29: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example, -d
SA15dhkpvsvu:30: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of
SA15dhkpvsvu:31: using this database to make an KWIC index.
SA15dhkpvsvu:35: This database is quite a tentative one, and I must admit that there are a lot of
SA15dhkpvsvu:36: errors and defects in this version. I would appreciate it very much if the user would
SA15dhkpvsvu:37: point out any errors in this version so that we can make a better new version in the future.

SA15dhkpvsvu:314: ātmano-nivṛtty-asiddheḥ / tan-nivṛttau kvacin nivṛttāv api prāṇa-ādīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:316: yā apy asiddhi-yojanā tathā sapakṣe sann asann ity evam-ādiṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:317: yathāyogam udāharyam ity evam-ādikā / sā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:319: anupalambha eva saṃśayāt / upalambhe tad-abhāvāt / anupalambhāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:320: ca vyatireka iti saṃśayito anivāryaḥ syāt / yathāyoga-vacanāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:321: anivārita eva iti cet / na / ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī ity ādi-vacanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:322: tena anupalambhe api saṃśayād anivṛttiṃ manyamānaḥ tat-pratiṣedham
SA15dhkpvsvu:325: śrāvaṇatvasya api nitya-anityayor adarśanād vyāvṛttir iti tad-vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:326: hetutā syāt / na hi tad-vyāvṛtter anyad vyavacchedanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:327: avyavacchedas tu kutaścid vyāvṛtter eva aniścayāt / yo hi yatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:328: na asti iti niścitaḥ sa bhavaṃs tad-abhāvaṃ kathaṃ na gamayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:330: atha api syād ubhaya-vyavacchede pramāṇa-antaraṃ bādhakam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:336: lakṣaṇa-yukte bādhā-asambhave tal-lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitaṃ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:338: darśanād anāśvāsa-prasaṅga iti cet / na / yathokte asambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:340: cet / anumāna-viṣaye avacanād iṣṭam / viṣayaṃ ca asya nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:342: dṛṣṭā ayuktir adṛṣṭeś ca syāt sparśasya avirodhinī //20//
SA15dhkpvsvu:343: yadi hy anupalambhena abhāvaḥ sidhyet / yad āha / yady adarśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:344: mātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate / na ca so api yukta
SA15dhkpvsvu:345: iti / katham ayuktaḥ / anupalambhād abhāva-siddheḥ / nanu upalabdhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:346: lakṣaṇa-prāpteḥ sparśasya yukta eva pratiṣedhaḥ / na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:348: gṛhītvā ayaṃ pratiṣedham āha / tatra ca tūla-upala-pallava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:349: ādiṣu tad-bhāve api sparśa-bheda-darśanāt asya api kvacid viśeṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:350: sambhava-āśaṅkayā bhavitavyam iti sarvatra adarśana-mātreṇa ayuktaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:351: pratiṣedha iti / evam ācāryīyaḥ kaścid anupalambhād abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:354: tatra eka-dṛṣṭyā na anyatra yuktas tad-bhāva-niścayaḥ //21//
SA15dhkpvsvu:355: yadi kathaṃcid vipakṣe adarśana-mātreṇa apratibaddhasya api tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:356: avyabhicāraḥ / kvacid deśe kānicid dravyāṇi kathaṃcid dṛṣṭāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:357: punar anyathā anyatra dṛśyante / yathā kāścid oṣadhayaḥ kṣetra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:358: viśeṣe viśiṣṭa-rasa-vīrya-vipākā bhavanti / na anyatra / tathā kāla-
SA15dhkpvsvu:359: saṃskāra-bhedāt / na ca tad-deśais tathā dṛṣṭā iti sarvās tattvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:361: viśeṣa-hetv-abhāve tu syād anumānam / yathā adṛṣṭa-kartṛkam api
SA15dhkpvsvu:363: sarva-prakārāṇāṃ puruṣaiḥ karaṇasya darśanāt / na evam asambhavad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:366: saṃskāra-bhedena viśeṣa-pratipatteḥ / tadvad anyasya api sambhavād /
SA15dhkpvsvu:369: kārya-abhāvāt / sambhave api viśeṣāṇāṃ draṣṭum aśakyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:370: tādṛśāṃ ca apratikṣepa-arthatvāt / na evaṃ vākyāni dṛśya-viśeṣatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:372: viśeṣāṇām anyatra api śakya-kriyatvāt / pratyakṣāṇāṃ śabdānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:376: tad abhinna-svabhāvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ puruṣa-kriyā na vā kasyacit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:379: sa eva anupalambhaḥ kiṃ hetv-abhāvasya sādhakaḥ //22//
SA15dhkpvsvu:380: anupalambhaṃ ca asya pramāṇayata ātma-vādo nirālambaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:383: kim apy asya kāraṇam asti iti / ca tv evaṃbhūtam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:384: na evaṃ sukha-ādi-kāryaṃ prasādhitaṃ kaṃcid arthaṃ puṣṇāti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:385: yena kenacit kāraṇavattva-abhyupagamāt / tathā ca anupalambha
SA15dhkpvsvu:386: eva ātmanaḥ syāt / taṃ tena pratyācakṣāṇaḥ kim iti prativyūḍho
SA15dhkpvsvu:387: anupalambhasya asādhanatvād iti / katham asādhanaṃ vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:388: sādhayet / mṛdaḥ khalv api kaścic caitanyam anupalabhyamānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:389: api icchann adarśanād vacana-āder vyāvṛttim āha / dadhy-ādikaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:390: ca aparaḥ kṣīra-ādiṣv apara-artheṣu saṃghātatva-adarśanād vyatirekam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:391: ko hy atra niyamaḥ saṃhatair avaśyaṃ parārthair bhavitavyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:392: asty eva upalambho dadhy-ādīnāṃ kṣīra-ādiṣv anumānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:393: aśaktād anutpatteḥ / atha kā iyaṃ śaktiḥ sa eva bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:394: uta anyad eva kiṃcit / sa eva cet tathā eva upalabhyeta viśeṣa-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:395: anyac cet katham anya-bhāve tad asti / upacāra-mātraṃ tu syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:397: tasmāt tan-mātra-sambandhaḥ svabhāvo bhāvam eva vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:399: yathā vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapāṃ / śākhā-ādimad-viśeṣasya eva kasyacit tathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:400: prasiddheḥ sa tasya svabhāvaḥ / svaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya
SA15dhkpvsvu:401: kathaṃ bhāvo bhavet / svabhāvasya eva bhāvatvād iti tasya svabhāvapratibandhād
SA15dhkpvsvu:404: kāraṇaṃ nivartamānaṃ kāryaṃ nivartayati / anyathā tat tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:405: kāryam eva na syāt / siddhas tu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:406: niyamayati ity ubhayathā svabhāvapratibandhād eva nivṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:408: na aśvavān iti martyena na bhāvyaṃ gamatā api kim //24//
SA15dhkpvsvu:409: saṃnidhānāt tathā ekasya katham anyasya saṃnidhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:410: gomān ity eva martyena bhāvyam aśvavatā api kim //25//
SA15dhkpvsvu:411: tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhād eva hetuḥ sādhyaṃ gamayati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:412: sa ca tad-bhāva-lakṣaṇas tadutpatti-lakṣaṇo vā / sa eva avinābhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:414: tasmād vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānte na iṣṭo avaśyam iha āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:415: tad-abhāve ca tan na iti vacanād api tad-gateḥ //26//
SA15dhkpvsvu:420: tat-svabhāvatayā khyāpyate / yaḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāvaṃ janayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:421: so anitya-svabhāvaṃ santaṃ janayati iti pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena upadarśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:424: tena ca pramāṇena sādhya-dharmasya tan-mātra-anubandhaḥ khyāpyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:425: sva-kāraṇād eva kṛtakas tathābhūto jāto yo naśvaraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:427: vā tasmin saty eva bhāvād iti dṛṣṭāntena pradarśyate artha-antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:428: tathā prasiddhe tad-bhāve hetu-bhāve vā anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:429: na bhavati dahana-abhāve ca dhūmaḥ / tathā hi sa tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:430: svabhāvo hetur vā / kathaṃ svaṃ svabhāvaṃ hetuṃ vā antareṇa bhaved
SA15dhkpvsvu:431: ity āśrayam antareṇa api vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:432: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhāv eva tad-bhāva-hetu-bhāvau teṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:433: viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevalaḥ //27//
SA15dhkpvsvu:434: yad-arthe dṛṣṭānta ucyate so arthaḥ siddha iti kiṃ tad-vacanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:435: tadā / tat-pradarśane api kiṃ vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānta-āśrayeṇa iti manyamāna
SA15dhkpvsvu:439: yad āha arthāpattyā vā anyatareṇa ubhaya-pradarśanād iti / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:441: eka-vacanena dvitīya-siddhim āha / tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:442: anityam ity ukte anartha-antara-bhāve vyaktam ayam asya svabhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:444: tad-bhāvasya arthāpattyā anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ na bhavati iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:445: bhavati / na hi svabhāvasya abhāve bhāvo bhavaty abhedāt / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:446: tad-bhāve bhavati ity eva na syāt / tathā tad-abhāve na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:447: ity ukte / tata eva tad-bhāvatā-vedinaḥ / tathā hy ayam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:448: svabhāvo yena tad-abhāve na bhavati / anyathā ayogād iti tat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:450: dhūmas tatra agnir ity ukte kāryaṃ dhūmo dahanasya / yena
SA15dhkpvsvu:451: dhūme avaśyam agnir bhavati / anyathā artha-antarasya tad-anubandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:452: niyama-abhāvāt svātantryaṃ bhāvasya syāt / atas tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:453: api svabhāva-avaikalyān na abhāvaḥ / kārye tv avaśyaṃ kāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:454: bhavati / idam eva hi kāraṇasya kāraṇatvaṃ yad artha-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:455: svabhāva-upadhānaṃ / kāryasya api tad-bhāva eva bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:456: tac ca asti dhūme / tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūma ity anvayena vidhita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:457: tat-kāryatvasya dahana-abhāve dhūmo na bhavati ity arthād vyatireka-pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:458: bhavati / tathā asaty agnau dhūmo na asti ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:459: ukte agnir dhūme bhavaty avaśyam ity arthād anvaya-pratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:460: anyathā hi tad-abhāve kiṃ na bhaved iti / nanu ca nitya-anitya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:461: artha-kāryatva-abhāve api śravaṇa-jñānaṃ na bhavati tad-abhāve /
SA15dhkpvsvu:462: na vai na bhavati / tayor eva tataḥ saṃśayāt / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:463: abhāvena niścitāt kathaṃ tad-bhāva-parāmarśena saṃśayaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:464: kevalaṃ tu bhāva-niścaya-abhāvān na asti ity ucyate / yadā punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:465: dṛṣṭāntena na agni-dhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pradarśyate / tadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:466: yatra dhūmas tatra agnir ity eva na syāt / pratibandha-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:467: kuto agny-abhāve dhūmo na asti ity arthād vyatireka-siddhiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:468: vaidharmyeṇa abhāva-asiddher anvaya-smṛtiḥ tasmād dṛṣṭāntena ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:473: tāv eva hi nivartamānau sva-pratibaddhaṃ nivartayata iti kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:474: arthasya pratiṣedham api sādhayitukāmena hetor vyāpakasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:475: vā svabhāvasya nivṛttir hetutvena ākhyeyā / apratibandhe hi katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:481: iti iyaṃ trividhā apy ukta-anupalabdhir anekadhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:483: trividha eva hi pratiṣedha-hetuḥ / upalabhya-sattvasya hetos tathābhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:484: niścaye vyāpakasya svātmanaś ca anupalabdhir iti / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:486: prakāra uktaḥ / tasya agatyā tad-viruddha-gatyā viruddha-kārya-gatyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:493: artha-antara-nimitto hi dharmaḥ syād anya eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:494: na hi tasmin niṣpanne aniṣpanno bhinna-hetuko vā tat-svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:495: yuktaḥ / ayam eva khalu bhedo bheda-hetur vā bhāvānāṃ viruddha-dharma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:496: adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa-bhedaś ca / tau cen na bhedakau tadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:497: na kasyacit kutaścid bheda ity ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:498: tataś ca saha utpatti-vināśau sarvasya ca sarvatra upayogaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:499: anyathā ekam ity eva na syāt / nāma-antaraṃ vā / artha-bhedam abhyupagamya
SA15dhkpvsvu:500: tathā abhidhānāt / nanv anartha-antara-hetutve api bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:501: kāle anityatā aniṣpattes tulyā atat-svabhāvatā / na vai kācid anyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:502: anityatā nāma yā paścān niṣpadyeta / sa eva hi bhāvaḥ kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:503: sthiti-dharmā anityatā / vacana-bhede api dharmi-dharmatayā nimittaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:504: vakṣyāmaḥ / tāṃ punar asya kṣaṇa-sthito-dharmatāṃ svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:505: sva-hetor eva tathā-utpatteḥ paśyann api manda-buddhiḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:508: paścād asya anupalabdhyā asthito-pratipatter niścaya-kāla iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:512: eva anityatā syāt / anya-nimittatve animittatve vā / tathā ca bhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:513: tadvān na syāt / tad-anupayogāt / upayoge vā sa eva asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:514: svātmabhūto anityatā iti kim anyayā / svabhāvena vā acalasya artha-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:515: yoge api tad-bhāva-anutpatteḥ / sa ca artha-antarād bhavann anityatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:516: anyo vā dharmo hetuḥ phalaṃ vā syāt / ahetu-phalasya asambandhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:518: paścād bhāvān na hetutvaṃ phale apy ekāntatā kutaḥ //33//
SA15dhkpvsvu:519: sa hi niṣpanne bhāve artha-antarataḥ paścād bhavan kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:520: tasya hetuḥ syāt / phalasya api na avaśyaṃ hetau bhāva iti tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:521: bhāva-hetor anaikāntikatvam / tan na artha-antara-nimitto dharmo
SA15dhkpvsvu:522: bhāve avaśyaṃ bhāvi ity ananumānam / yadi tarhi darśana -adarśane
SA15dhkpvsvu:523: na anvaya-vyatireka-gater āśrayaḥ kathaṃ dhūmo agniṃ na vyabhicarati
SA15dhkpvsvu:526: yeṣām upalambhe tal-lakṣaṇam anupalabdhaṃ yad upalabhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:527: tatra eka-abhāve api na upalabhyate / tat tasya kāryaṃ / tac ca dhūme
SA15dhkpvsvu:529: sa bhavaṃs tad-abhāve tu hetumattāṃ vilaṅghayet //34//
SA15dhkpvsvu:530: sakṛd api tathā adarśanāt kāryaṃ siddhaḥ / akāryatve akāraṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:531: sakṛd apy abhāvāt / kāryasya ca sva-kāraṇam antareṇa bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:532: ahetumattā eva syāt / na hi yasya yam antareṇa bhāvaḥ sa tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:533: hetur bhavati / bhavati ca dhūmo agnim antareṇa tan na tad-hetuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:534: anya-hetukatvān na ahetukatvam iti cet / na / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:535: tulyatvāt / tad-abhāve apy agnau bhavati iti / kathaṃ vā tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:536: anyato vā ataj-janana-svabhāvād bhavet / svayam atat-svabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:537: ajananāt tasya ahetutā syāt / na vai sa eva bhavati tādṛśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:538: bhāvāt / anya-adṛśād bhavan kathaṃ tādṛśaḥ syāt / tādṛśād hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:539: bhavan tādṛśaḥ syāt / anya-adṛśād api tādṛśo bhāve tac-śakti-niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:540: abhāvān na hetu-bhedo bhedaka iti akāraṇaṃ viśvasya vaiśvarūpyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:541: syāt / sarvaṃ vā sarvasmāj jāyeta / tasmāt kāraṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:542: bheda-abhedābhyāṃ kārya-bheda-abhedau / tan na dhūmo arthād dṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:544: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:546: sa hi dhūmo ahetur bhavan nirapekṣatvān na kadācin na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:547: tad-bhāve vaikalya-abhāvād iṣṭa-kāla-vat / tadā api vā na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:548: abhāva-kāla-aviśeṣāt / apekṣayā hi bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:550: yogyatayor deśa-kālayos tadvattā itarayor niyama-ayogāt / sā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:551: yogyatā hetu-bhāvāt kim anyat / tasmād eka-deśa-kāla-parihāreṇa anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:552: deśa-kālayor vartamāno bhāvas tat-sāpekṣo nāma bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:553: tathā hi / tathā vṛttir eva apekṣā tat-kṛta-upakāra-anapekṣasya tan-niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:554: ayogāt / tan niyata-deśa-kālatvād dhūmo atra dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd
SA15dhkpvsvu:555: vaikalye ca punar na dṛṣṭaḥ taj-janyo asya svabhāvaḥ / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:556: sakṛd apy abhāvāt / sa tat-pratiniyato anyatra kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:557: bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt / taj-janito hi svabhāva-viśeṣo dhūma
SA15dhkpvsvu:558: iti / tathā hetur api tathābhūta-kārya-janana-svabhāvaḥ / tasya anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:559: api bhāve na sa tasya svabhāva iti sakṛd api na janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:560: na vā sa dhūmo adhūma-janana-svabhāvād bhāvāt / tat-svabhāvatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:561: ca sa eva agnir ity avyabhicāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:562: agni-svabhāvaḥ śakrasya mūrddhā yady agnir eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:563: atha anagni-svabhāvo asau dhūmas tatra kathaṃ bhavet //36//
SA15dhkpvsvu:565: adhūma-hetor dhūmasya bhāve sa syād ahetukaḥ //37//
SA15dhkpvsvu:566: iti saṃgrahaślokau / kathaṃ tarhi idānīṃ bhinnāt sahakāriṇaḥ kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:567: utpatter yathā cakṣū-rūpa-āder vijñānasya / na vai kiṃcid ekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:568: janakaṃ tat-svabhāvam / kiṃ tu sāmagrī janikā tat-svabhāvā / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:569: anumīyate / sa eva ca sāmagrī svabhāva-sthity-āśrayaḥ kāryasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:570: ata eva sahakāriṇām apy aparyāyeṇa jananam / yad api kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:571: vijātīyād bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ gomaya-ādeḥ śāluka-ādi / tatra api tathā abhidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:572: apy asty eva sva-bīja-prabhavāt svabhāva-bhedaḥ / hetu-svabhāva-bhedāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:574: tādṛśaṃ loko vivecayaty ākāra-bhedāt / tasmān na suvivecita-ākāraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:577: svabhāvas tasya tad-hetur ato bhinnān na sambhavaḥ //38//
SA15dhkpvsvu:578: iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ / tasmāt sakṛd api darśana-adarśanābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:579: kāryakāraṇabhāva-siddher bhavati tatas tat-pratipattiḥ / na anyathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:581: amūrtatve nityatva-darśane apy anyatra anyathā adṛṣṭeḥ / kvacin
SA15dhkpvsvu:582: nityatva-abhāve apy adṛṣṭasya punar dṛṣṭer iti bhavatu kāryasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:583: kāraṇena avinābhāvas tadutpatteḥ / svabhāva idānīṃ katham avinābhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:585: yo hi bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāvas tatra avinābhāvo bhāvasya iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:586: tad-abhāve svayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvaḥ syād abhedataḥ //39//
SA15dhkpvsvu:587: ya eva bhāvo bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāva ity ucyate / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:588: svayaṃ vastuto bhāvaḥ / sa ca ātmānaṃ parityajya kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:589: ya eva tarhi kṛtakaḥ sa eva anityo bheda-abhāvāt / pratijñārthaikadeśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:590: hetuḥ syāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:593: tasmād yato yato arthānāṃ vyāvṛttis tan-nibandhanāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:595: tasmād yo yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ sampratīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:596: na sa śakyas tato anyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ //42//
SA15dhkpvsvu:597: sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ svarūpa-sthitayaḥ / te na ātmānaṃ pareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:598: miśrayanti / tasya aparatva-prasaṅgāt / yad apy eṣām abhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:599: ātmabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ na tat teṣām / tadānīṃ teṣām abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:600: tad eva hi syād abhinnasya bhāvāt / tad-vyatiriktasya bhinnasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:601: ca abhāvāt / tasya eva ca punar bheda-virodhāt / tac ca ātmani vyavasthitam
SA15dhkpvsvu:602: amiśram eva / artha-antaram apy aneka-sambandhe api
SA15dhkpvsvu:603: na tat teṣāṃ sāmānyam atad-rūpatvāt / dvitva-ādi-saṃyoga-kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:604: dravyeṣv api prasaṅgāt / na hi sambandhinā apy anyena anye samānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:605: nāma / tadvanto nāma syuḥ / bhūta-vat / kaṇṭhe-guṇena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:606: na abhinna-pratyaya-viṣayāḥ / bhūta-vat / tadātmānam eva hi buddhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:607: saṃsṛjantī sāmānya-viṣayā pratibhāsate / na eka-sambandhināv iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:608: bhūta-vat / tad-darśinyāḥ sā bhrāntir iti cet / tad-darśinī iti kutaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:609: nirbīja-bhrānty-ayogād iti cet / ta eva tad-eka-kāryā bījam / saṃkhyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:610: saṃyoga-kārya-dravya-ādimatsu bhūta-ādiṣv abhāvāc ca / tan na tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:611: sāmānya-buddhau niveṣa-abhāvāt sāmānyam anyat / sati vā tasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:612: svātmani vyavasthānād amiśraṇam anyena / tasmād ime bhāvāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:613: sajātīya-abhimatād anyasmāc ca vyatiriktāḥ svabhāvena eka-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:615: śabdais tatas tato bhedam upādāya svabhāva-abhede apy aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:616: dharmāṇaḥ pratīyante / te api śabdāḥ sarva-bheda-anākṣepe apy eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:617: bheda-codanāt tat-svalakṣaṇa-niṣṭhā eva bhavanti / tad ekasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:618: api tasya bhedo asti iti / tasmād ekasya bhāvasya yāvanti pararūpāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:620: tad-bhedāt / yāvat yaś ca vyāvṛttayas tāvat yaḥ śrutayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:623: tasmāt svabhāva-abhede api yena yena dharmeṇa nāmnā yo viśeṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:624: bhedaḥ pratīyate na sa śakyo anyena pratyāyayitum iti na eka-arthāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:625: sarva-śabdāḥ / tan na pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur iti / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:626: punar etad gamyate vyavacchedaḥ śabda-liṅgābhyāṃ pratipādyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:627: vidhinā na vastu-rūpam eva iti / pramāṇa-antarasya śabda- antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:630: ko anyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syād yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate //43//
SA15dhkpvsvu:631: eko hy artha-ātmā / sa pratyakṣaḥ asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana-asambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:632: yathā anityatve sādhye śabdaḥ / tasya pratyakṣeṇa eva siddheḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:633: sarva-ākāra-siddhiḥ / tad-anyasya asiddhasya abhāvāt / bhāve vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:634: atat-svabhāvatvam / na hi yo yad ekayogakṣemo na bhavati sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:636: anyathā abhāva-prasaṅgād ity uktam / tasmāt pratyakṣe dharmiṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:641: yadi dṛṣṭa-sarva-tattvasya api bhāvasya tathā niścaya-pratirodhinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:642: bhrānti-nimittena guṇa-antaraṃ na saṃyojyate / yathā śuktau rajata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:643: ākāraḥ / na hi śuktau dve rūpe samānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:645: atiprasaṅgāc ca / tasmāt paśyan śukti-rūpaṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:647: paśyāmi iti manyate / tato asya rajata-samāropaḥ / tathā / sadṛśā-para-apara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:649: yāvanto asya parabhāvās tāvanta eva yathāsvaṃ nimitta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:650: bhāvinaḥ samāropā iti tad-vyavacchedakāni bhavanti pramāṇāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:651: saphalāni syuḥ / teṣāṃ tu vyavaccheda-phalānāṃ na apratīta-vastv-aṃśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:652: pratyāyane pravṛttis tasya dṛṣṭatvāt / anaṃśasya ca eka-deśena
SA15dhkpvsvu:654: tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa eva akhilo guṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:655: bhrānter niścīyate na iti sādhanaṃ sampravartate //45//
SA15dhkpvsvu:656: iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ / tasmān na adṛṣṭa-grahaṇāya dṛṣṭe pramāṇa-antara-vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:657: vastu-grahe anumānāc ca dharmasya ekasya niścaye /
SA15dhkpvsvu:658: sarva-dharma-graho apohe na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate //46//
SA15dhkpvsvu:659: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣa-dṛṣṭe pramāṇa-antara-avṛttiḥ kvacit / yadā anumānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:660: api vastu vidhinā pratyāyayati na vyavaccheda-kṛt tadā eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:662: antara-avṛttiḥ na hi tasmin niścite tadātmā aniścito yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:663: yadā punar anumānena samāropa-vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadā na eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:664: samāropa-vyavacchedād anya-vyavacchedaḥ kṛto bhavati iti tad-artham
SA15dhkpvsvu:665: anyat pravartate / nanu na avaśyaṃ viparyāsa-pūrvaka eva apratīta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:666: niścayo bhavati / yathā akasmād dhūmād agni-pratipattiḥ / na hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:667: tatra anagni-samāropaḥ sambhāvyate / tan na sarvatra vyavacchedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:668: kriyate / uktam atra / dharmi-pratipattāv abhedāt sarva-pratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:669: bhede vā asambaddhasya tatra apratipattir iti / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:670: tatra api tad-darśinas tat-svabhāva-aniścayaḥ kutaḥ viparyāsāt / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:671: ca taṃ pradeśaṃ tad-viviktena rūpeṇa niścinvann agni-sattā-bhāvanā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:672: vimuktayā buddhyā katham aviparyasto nāma / tad-ākāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:673: samāropa-saṃśaya-rahitaś ca tat-pratipattau na liṅgam anusaret /
SA15dhkpvsvu:676: anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhāv asiddhaṃ kim ataḥ param //47//
SA15dhkpvsvu:678: kvacid dṛṣṭe api yaj jñānaṃ sāmānya-arthaṃ vikalpakam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:681: tat katham asati samārope bhavad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:682: samāropa-viṣaye tasya abhāvāt / yatra hy asya samāropo yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:683: sthiraḥ sātmaka iti vā na tatra bhede niścayo bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:685: na hi sarvato bhinno dṛṣṭo api bhāvas tathā eva pratyabhijñāyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:686: kvacid bhede vyavadhāna-sambhavāt / yathā śukteḥ śuktitve /
SA15dhkpvsvu:687: yatra tu pratipattur bhrānti-nimittaṃ na asti tatra eva asya tad-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:688: aviśeṣe api smārto niścayo bhavati / samāropa-niścayayor bādhyabādhakabhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:691: tad-viveka eva ca anyāpohaḥ / tasmāt tad api tan-mātra-apoha-gocaram /
SA15dhkpvsvu:692: na vastu-svabhāva-niścaya-ātmakam / tathā hi kasyacin niścaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:693: apy anyasya apratipatti-darśanāt / tat-svabhāva-niścaye ca tasya ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:695: tāvantā eva śabdāś ca tena te bhinna-gocarāḥ //50//
SA15dhkpvsvu:696: anyathā ekena śabdena vyāpta ekatra vastuni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:697: buddhyā vā na anya-viṣaya iti paryāyatā bhavet //51//
SA15dhkpvsvu:699: yasya api nānā-upādher dhīr grāhika-arthasya bhedinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:700: yo api manyate bhinnā eva upādhayaḥ parasparam āśrayāc ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:701: tan-nibandhanāḥ śrutayas tad-ādhāreṣu vartante / tatra eva vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:702: tad ayam aprasaṅga iti / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:704: sarvātmanā upakārasya ko bhedakaḥ syād aniścitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:705: yady apy upādhayo bhinnā eva śabda-jñāna-antarāṇāṃ nimittam
SA15dhkpvsvu:706: arthe / sa tu tais tadvān eka eva upalīyate / tasya nānā-upādhīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:708: grahaṇe ka eva upādhi-bhedo aniścitaḥ syāt / sarva-upādhy-upakārakatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:709: grahaṇāt / na hy upakārakatvaṃ anyad eva tasya svarūpeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:710: gṛhyamāṇasya agṛhītaṃ nāma / ato yad eva asya svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:711: grahaṇaṃ tad eva upakāratvena api iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:714: eka-jñāne dvayor api grahaṇam iti eka-upādhi-viśiṣṭe api tasmin
SA15dhkpvsvu:716: upādhimad-grahaṇasya / anyathā tathā api na gṛhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:717: na hy anya eva anya-upakārako yo na gṛhītaḥ syāt / na ca apy upakārake
SA15dhkpvsvu:718: tathā gṛhīte upakārya-agrahaṇaṃ tasya apy agrahaṇa-prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:719: svasvāmitva-vat / tasmād artha-antara-upādhi-vāde api samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:720: atha api syād bhinnā eva śaktayaḥ śaktimato yābhir upādhīn
SA15dhkpvsvu:721: upakaroti / tato na ayaṃ prasaṅga iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:722: dharma-upakāra-śaktīnāṃ bhede tās tasya kiṃ yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:723: na upakāras tatas tāsāṃ tathā syād anavasthitiḥ //54//
SA15dhkpvsvu:724: yadi pratyupādhy upakārakatvāni tasya na svātmabhūtāny eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:725: na api tata upakāram anubhavanti / kiṃ tasya iti tā ucyante / upakāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:726: vā svātmabhūtābhir ayam ekaḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktīr upakurvan
SA15dhkpvsvu:727: eka upādhinā api gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhyata eva / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:728: hi / eka-upādhi-grahaṇe tad-upakāriṇyāḥ śakter grahaṇam / tad-grahaṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:730: sarvāḥ śaktīr grāhayati tāś ca sva-upādhīn iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:731: prasaṅgaḥ / atha tā api śakty-upakāriṇyaḥ śaktayo bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:732: bhāvāt / evam upādhīnāṃ tac-śaktīnāṃ ca aparā parāsv eva śaktiṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:733: aparyavasānena ghaṭanāt sa ekas tābhiḥ kadācid apy agṛhītas
SA15dhkpvsvu:734: tad-upakāra-ātmā tadvattvena na gṛhyate / yadi punaḥ kevalān
SA15dhkpvsvu:735: eva upādhīn śabda-jñānāny upalīyeran / tadā tasya asamāveṣān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:736: bhavati tat-pratipatti-mukhena sarva-pratipattiḥ / tadā api tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:737: śabdair anākṣepān na syāt tatra pravṛttir iti vyarthaḥ śabda-prayogaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:738: syāt / arthakriyā-āśrayo hi sarvo vidhi-pratiṣedhābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:739: upādhayaś ca tatra asamarthāḥ samarthaś ca na eva ucyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:740: iti kiṃ śabda-prayogaiḥ / tataś ca upādhayo na upādhayaḥ syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:741: kvacit pravṛttau hi kasyacit pradhānasya aṅga-bhāvāt tad-apekṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:742: tathā ucyate / tasya śabdair anākṣepān na te kasyacid aṅga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:743: bhūtā iti kim upādhayaḥ / lakṣita-lakṣaṇād adoṣa iti cet samānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:744: prasaṅgaḥ / sa tāvat tair upādhibhir nāntarīyakatayā upalakṣyamāṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:745: ekena apy upalakṣaṇe sarvātmanā upalakṣita iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:746: prasaṅgaḥ / ko hy atra viśeṣaḥ śabdā vā enam upalakṣayeyus tal-lakṣitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:747: vā upādhayaḥ / sa tāvat tadānīṃ niścīyate sarva-upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:749: eka-upakārake grāhye na upakāras tato apare /
SA15dhkpvsvu:750: dṛṣṭe tasminn adṛṣṭā ye tad-grahe sakala-grahaḥ //55//
SA15dhkpvsvu:752: yadi bhrānti-nivṛtty-arthaṃ gṛhīte apy anyad iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:753: syād etat nirbhāgasya vastuno grahaṇe ko anyas tadā na gṛhīto
SA15dhkpvsvu:754: nāma / sa tu bhrāntyā na avadhāryata iti pramāṇa-antaraṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:756: tad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ siddhaṃ tadvat tato aparam //56//
SA15dhkpvsvu:758: tat tarhi bhrānti-nivṛtty-arthaṃ pravṛttaṃ pramāṇam / anya-samāropa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:760: anyad api / asamāropa-viṣaye vṛtteḥ / yatra asya samāropo na tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:761: niścaya iti samāropa-abhāve vartamāno anyāpoha-viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:763: yan na niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham //57//
SA15dhkpvsvu:764: iyam eva khalu niścayānāṃ svārtha-pratipattir yat tan-niścayanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:765: tac ced ākāra-antara-vad aniścitaṃ kathaṃ tair gṛhītaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:766: katham idānīm aniścīyamānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhītaṃ nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:767: na pratyakṣaṃ kasyacin niścāyakam / tad ayam api gṛhṇāti tan
SA15dhkpvsvu:768: na niścayena / kiṃ tarhi / tat-pratibhāsena / tan na niścaya-aniścaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:769: vaśāt pratyakṣasya grahaṇa-agrahaṇe / na evaṃ niścayānāṃ kiṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:770: niścinvato apy anyatra aniścayena pravṛtti-bhedād grahaṇa -agrahaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:771: tasmāt tad eva asya grahaṇaṃ yo niścayaḥ / anyathā eka-ākāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:772: api tan na syāt / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sarvato bhinne vastu-rūpe
SA15dhkpvsvu:773: anubhava-utpattāv api tathā eva na smārto niścayo bhavati / sahakāri-
SA15dhkpvsvu:776: yad viśeṣa-avasāye asti pratyakṣaḥ sa pratīyate //58//
SA15dhkpvsvu:777: yady apy aṃśa-rahitaḥ sarvato bhinna-svabhāvo bhāvo anubhūtas
SA15dhkpvsvu:778: tathā api na sarva-bhedeṣu tāvatā niścayo bhavati / kāraṇa-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:779: apekṣyatvāt / anubhavo hi yathā avikalpa-abhyāsaṃ niścaya-pratyayān
SA15dhkpvsvu:784: janakatva-adhyāpakatva-aviśeṣe api pitaram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā me
SA15dhkpvsvu:785: āgacchati na upādhyāya iti / so api bhavan niścayo asati bhrānti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:786: kāraṇe bhavati / tasmān na abhūta ity eva sarva-ākāra-niścayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:787: tatra api ca anyavyāvṛttir anyavyāvṛtta ity api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:788: śabdāś ca niścayāś ca eva saṃketam anurundhate //59//
SA15dhkpvsvu:789: tatra apy anyāpohe na vyāvṛttir anyā anya eva vyāvṛttas tad-vyāvṛtter
SA15dhkpvsvu:791: abhāvaḥ / tasmād yā eva vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva vyāvṛttaḥ / śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:792: pratipatti-bhedas tu saṃketa-bhedāt / na vācya-bhedo asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:793: nanu ca vācya-viśeṣa-abhāvāt saṃketa-bhedo apy ayukto dvayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:794: eka-abhidhānāt / tathā ca vyatirekiṇyā vibhakter ayogas tasyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:797: bhinnam artham iva anveti vācye leśa-viśeṣataḥ //60//
SA15dhkpvsvu:798: na vai śabdānāṃ kācid viṣaya-svabhāva-āyattā vṛttir icchāto vṛtty-
SA15dhkpvsvu:799: abhāva-prasaṅgāt / te yathā vyatirikte avyatirikte vā prayoktum
SA15dhkpvsvu:800: iṣyante tathā niyuktās tam artham pratibandhena prakāśayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:801: tena gaur gotvam ity eka-artha-abhidhāne api kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:803: vibhaktir artha-antaram iva adarśayantī pratibhāty anartha-antare
SA15dhkpvsvu:804: api tathā prayoga-darśana-abhyāsāt / na tāvatā sarvatra bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:805: anyatra api puruṣa-icchā-vaśāt pravṛttasya pratibandha-abhāvāt / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:806: ekaṃ kvacid eka-vacanena khyāpyate tad-aviśeṣe api gaurava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:808: bhedo na syāt / tad apy asty eva / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:813: tathā ākṛta-saṃketena śabdena prabodhyata anaśvatvam asya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:814: iti / yadā punar vyavaccheda-antara-anirākāṅkṣas taṃ jñātum icchati
SA15dhkpvsvu:816: tathā aprakāśanāya prayuñjate anaśvo ayam iti / ata eva pūrvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:818: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vā / gotvam asya śuklam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:820: nirākāṅkṣatvāc ca / dvitīye tu bhavati / tathā saṃketa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:825: śabdayor na tayor vācye viśeṣas tena kaścana //62//
SA15dhkpvsvu:826: tasmān na sarvatra dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye arthe
SA15dhkpvsvu:827: niścaya-pratyaya-viṣayatvena kaścid viśeṣaḥ / ekas tam eva pratyāyayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:830: jijñāpayiṣur arthaṃ taṃ taddhitena kṛtā api vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:831: anyena vā yadi brūyād bhedo na asti tato aparaḥ //63 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:832: etāvantam eva ca bhedaṃ darśayaṃs taddhitena vā darśayet
SA15dhkpvsvu:833: pācakatvam iti kṛtā api vā pāka ity anyena vā tathābhūta-jñāpanāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:834: svayaṃ kṛtena samayena / na punas tathā abhidhāna-mātreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:835: artha-antaram eva tad bhavati / tathābhūtasya eva jñāpanāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:836: śabdasya kṛta-saṃketatvāt / nanu ca pācakatvam iti sambandha
SA15dhkpvsvu:837: ucyate na pāka eva / na vai pākena anya eva kaścit pācako nāma abhidhīyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:838: yādṛśo varṇyate / yat punar asya abhidheyaṃ tat kathitaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:839: tad eva pācakatvena api ity alam apratiṣṭhair mithyā-vikalpaiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:840: yathā ca na artha-antara-bhūtā kriyā asti tat-samavāyo vā tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:843: pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syād doṣo jāti-tadvatoḥ //64//
SA15dhkpvsvu:844: yad āhuḥ / anyāpohe api śabda-arthe tad-viśiṣṭasya abhidhānāt tadvat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:845: pakṣa-uditaḥ sarvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ samāna iti tad apy anena prativyūḍham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:846: tatra hy artha-antaram upādāya anyatra vartamāno dhvanir
SA15dhkpvsvu:847: asvātantrya-ādi-doṣair upadrūyate / na ca artha-antaram anyasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:848: vyāvṛttir vyāvṛttād dvayor eka-abhidhānād ity uktam / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:850: sāmānyam / tad-buddhau tathā pratibhāsanāt / na vai kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:851: sāmānyaṃ nāma asti / śabda-āśrayā buddhir anādi-vāsanā-sāmarthyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:852: asaṃsṛṣṭān api dharmān saṃsṛjantī jāyate / tasyāḥ pratibhāsa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:854: asad-artho api / arthānāṃ saṃsarga-bheda-abhāvāt / tasya sarvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:856: dhvaniś ca aniṣṭa-parihāreṇa pravartayati ity anyāpoha-viṣaya uktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:861: avācyaḥ pratanyate / na hy anyo dharmo dharmiṇo anartha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:862: antara-abhidhānāt na api sa eva / tad-vācinām iva dharma-vācinām
SA15dhkpvsvu:865: dharma-dharmiṇoḥ / vastuni tu svalakṣaṇe sāmānyalakṣaṇam avācyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:866: abhāvāt / nanu ca dharma-dharmiṇor abhede bhede vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:867: dṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṣṭhy-ādi-vibhaktayo dharma-bahutvāt tatra dṛṣṭo vacana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:868: bhedaś ca dharmiṇi na syāt / uktam atra śabdānāṃ svātantrya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:872: yadi nāma ete śabdāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacit praṇinīṣitā api na śakyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:873: praṇetuṃ vastu-pratibandhād dhūma-ādi-vat / tadā ayam upālambhaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:874: syāt kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhy-ādaya iti / yadā punaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:877: na hi vyatireke ṣaṣṭhī bāhulye jas-ādaya ity etad api puruṣa-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:879: tu tatra tathā prayuñjata iti tatas tathā pratipattir bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:880: evam anyatra api kathaṃcit taiḥ prayuktās tathā eva pratīti-hetavo
SA15dhkpvsvu:881: bhavanti / tatra vācyeṣu puruṣa-āyatta-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānām avastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:885: punar vyatireka-vastu-bhedād iti kuta etat / tathā vyavahāra- ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:886: na hi dharma-dharmiṇor bhede tattva-rūpatve vā sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:888: śabdānāṃ vā yathā-avastu-vṛttāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ / yaś ca ayaṃ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:891: khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ ca ity atra vā kiṃ nibandhanam //67 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:892: yadā ekā api strī dārā ekam api sikatā-dravyaṃ sikatā iti vyavahāras
SA15dhkpvsvu:893: tatra kiṃ bāhulyaṃ yena evaṃ bhavati / śakti-bheda iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:894: sarvatra utsannam idānīṃ eka-vacanam eka-śakter abhāvāt / yatnaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:895: ca vyarthaḥ / vastv-abhedād anyatra eka-vacanam iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:896: iha apy astu / tad ayaṃ nirvastuko niyamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:897: icchāyāḥ śabda-prayoge khyāpayati / ṣaṇṇagarī iti ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:898: kathaṃ bahuṣv eka-vacanam / na hi nagarāṇy eva kiṃcit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:900: anārambhāt kutas tat-samudāyo dravyam / asaṃyogāś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:901: na saṃyogaḥ / prāsādasya svayaṃ saṃyoga-ātmakasya pareṇa asaṃyogāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:903: sattā nagaram iti cet / kim asyā niratiśayāyā viśeṣaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:904: sattāyāś ca ekatvāt / nagara-bahutve api nagarāṇi iti bahu-vacanaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:905: na syāt / dvayasya paraspara-sahitatā iti cet / anupakārya-upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:907: nagaram iti katham eka-vacanam / tathābhūtānāṃ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:908: arthe abhinnā śaktir asti sā nimittam iti cet / na / śakter vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:910: upakāre vā śakty-upakāriṇyā api śakter vyatireka ity anavasthiter
SA15dhkpvsvu:911: apratipattiḥ / tad-avyatireke vā ādyāyām api prasaṅga iti yat
SA15dhkpvsvu:912: kiṃcid etat / khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvam iti vyatireka-āśrayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:913: ṣaṣṭhī na syāt / na hi tatra sāmānyam asti na api vibhutva-ādayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:914: guṇās tathā ucyante / artha-antarasya tat-svabhāvatva-ayogāt / teṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:916: atiprasaṅgaḥ / tathā ca apratipattiḥ / evaṃ ṣaṭ-padārtha-varga-ādayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:917: api vācyāḥ / na hi tatra sāmānyaṃ saṃkhyā saṃyogo vā sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:918: katham idānīm asaty atiśaye khasya svabhāva iti na tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:919: kham ity eva / khasya artha-antara-sādhāraṇa-rūpa-aparāmarśena kha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:920: śabda-pravṛtti-nibandhanaṃ rūpaṃ tathā jijñāsāyām evam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:921: nanu sarvato vyāvṛttasya rūpasya abhidhānaṃ na sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:922: na vai tad eva rūpaṃ buddhau samarpyate / anatīndriyatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:923: prasaṅgāt / kevalam ayaṃ tathābhūtaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdena
SA15dhkpvsvu:925: yad āha / adṛṣṭa-arthe artha-vikalpa-mātram iti / na evaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:927: vā bhavati / svarga-ādi-śravaṇe api tad-anubhāvinām iva
SA15dhkpvsvu:931: tena etad evam ucyate śabdaḥ svarūpam āha iti / na punaḥ svarūpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:932: pratibhāsasya eva vijñānasya jananāt / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ekānta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:933: vyāvṛtta-rūpeṣu bhāveṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma / teṣām asaṃsargād
SA15dhkpvsvu:934: anyasya ca abhāvāt / uktaṃ yādṛśaṃ sāmānyam asaṃsṛṣṭānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:935: eka-asaṃsargas tad-vyatirekiṇāṃ samānatā iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:939: abhedina iva ābhānti bhāvā rūpeṇa kenacit //69//
SA15dhkpvsvu:941: tad asat paramārthena yathā saṃkalpitaṃ tayā //70//
SA15dhkpvsvu:942: buddhiḥ khalu tad-anya-vyatirekiṇaḥ padārthān āśritya utpadyamānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:944: rūpaṃ tirodhāya pratibhāsam abhinnam ātmīyam adhyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:945: tān saṃsṛjantī sandarśayati / sā ca eka-sādhyasādhanatayā anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:946: vivekināṃ bhāvānāṃ tad-vikalpa-vāsanāyāś ca prakṛtir yad evam
SA15dhkpvsvu:947: eṣā pratibhāti tad-udbhavā / sā ca saṃvṛtiḥ saṃvriyate anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:948: svarūpeṇa pararūpam iti / te ca tayā saṃvṛta-bhedāḥ svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:949: bhedino apy abhedina iva kenacid rūpeṇa pratibhānti / tad eṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:952: ity ucyate / katham idānīm anyāpohaḥ sāmānyaṃ / sa eva khalv
SA15dhkpvsvu:953: anyāpohas / tam eva gṛhṇatī sā prakṛti-vibhramād vikalpānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:954: vastu-grāhiṇī iva pratibhāti / sā hi tad-anya-vivekiṣv eva bhāveṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:955: bhavantī viveka-viṣayā iti gamyate / nanu bāhyā vivekino na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:956: teṣu vikalpa-pravṛttir iti kathaṃ teṣu bhavati / vyākhyātāraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:957: khalv evaṃ vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ / te tu sva-ālambanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:958: eva arthakriyā-yogyaṃ manyamānā dṛśya-vikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya
SA15dhkpvsvu:960: atat-kāribhyo bhinnāṃs tathā śabdena pratipādayanti iti / pratibhāsa-bheda-ādibhyas
SA15dhkpvsvu:962: yadi pratipattṛ-abhiprāyo anuvidhīyate anyāpoho api sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:963: mā bhūt na hy evaṃ pratipattir iti / na vai kevalam
SA15dhkpvsvu:965: ākārair api na eva pratipattiḥ / kevalam abhinna-ākārā buddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:966: utpadyate / tasyāḥ ka āśraya ity anyāpoha ucyate / tasya vastuṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:967: bhāvāt / avirodhāt / vyavahārasya ca śabda-āśrayasya tathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:968: darśanāt / na punar vastu-bhūtaṃ kiṃcit sāmānyaṃ nāma asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:970: vyaktayo na anuyanty anyad anuyāyi na bhāsate //
SA15dhkpvsvu:971: na hi imā vyaktayaḥ parasparam anvāviśanti / bheda-abhāve na sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:972: eva abhāva-prasaṅgāt / anyac ca na tābhyo vyatiriktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:973: kiṃcit tathā buddhau pratibhāty apratibhāsamānaṃ ca katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:974: ātmanā anyaṃ grāhayed vyapadeśayed vā / na ca taiḥ sambaddham
SA15dhkpvsvu:975: ekam ity eva sāmānyaṃ bhavaty atiprasaṅgād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:977: iti cet / katham anyato anyatra pratyaya-vṛttiḥ / tat-sambandhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:979: na iti cet / nanu sa eva ayaṃ vicāryate / ko ayaṃ sāmānya-ātmā
SA15dhkpvsvu:980: iti / tatra sati sambandhe pratyaya-vṛttis tataḥ sāmānyam ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:982: sambhavāt pratyaya-vṛttis tataś ca sāmānya-ātmatā / anyathā anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:983: api mā bhūt / viśeṣa-abhāvāt / tathā ca dravya-guṇa-sāmānyānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:984: rūpa-saṃkara iti / evaṃ tarhi buddher eva pratibhāso jñāna-rūpatvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:985: san eva sāmānyam / tan na / yasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:986: jñānād avyatiriktaṃ ca katham artha-antaraṃ vrajet / 71//
SA15dhkpvsvu:987: jñānasya rūpaṃ katham arthānāṃ sāmānyam / tasya teṣv abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:988: tad-bhāva-adhyavasāyāt tathā-bhrāntyā vyavahāra iti cet / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:989: tathā-jñāna-utpatteḥ kiṃ nibandhanam anāśrayasya ca utpattau sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:990: syāt / athavā jñānād avyatiriktam ekasmāt katham anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:991: punar jñānasya rūpaṃ syāt vyakty-antara-bhāvinaḥ / ta taś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:992: jñāna-antaraṃ vyakty-antaraṃ vā avyāpnuvat kathaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:995: na hy arthā vyatiriktena avyatiriktena vā kenacid ātmanā samānāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:998: yasya pratyāyana-arthaṃ saṃketaḥ kriyate abhinna-sādhyān bhāvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:999: atat-sādhyebhyo bhedena jñātvā tat-parihāreṇa pravarteta iti so
SA15dhkpvsvu:1001: bījaṃ / tam eva gṛhṇan eṣa vikalpaḥ sva-vāsanā-prakṛter evaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1002: pratibhāti / kathaṃ punar bhinnānām abhinnaṃ kāryaṃ yena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1003: tad-anyebhyo bhedād abheda ity ucyate / prakṛtir eṣā bhavānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1006: bhede api niyatāḥ kecit svabhāvena indriya-ādi-vat //73//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1008: vā asaty api tad-bhāva-niyate sāmānye rūpa-vijñānam ekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1009: janayanti evaṃ śiṃśapā-ādayo api bhedāḥ paraspara-ananvaye api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1010: prakṛtyā eva ekaṃ eka-ākāraṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ janayanti anyāṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1012: na tu bheda-aviśeṣe api jala-ādayaḥ śrotṛ-ādi-vad rūpa-ādi-jñāne /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1013: jvara-ādi-śamane kāścit saha pratyekam eva vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1014: dṛṣṭā yathā vā oṣadhayo nānātve api na ca aparāḥ //74//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1015: yathā vā guḍūcī-vyakty-ādayaḥ saha pratyekaṃ vā jvara-ādi-śamana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1016: lakṣaṇam ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti / na ca tatra sāmānyam apekṣante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1017: bhede api tat-prakṛtitvāt / na tad-aviśeṣe api dadhi-trapusā-ādayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1018: syād etat sāmānyam eva kiṃcit tāsu tathābhūtāsu
SA15dhkpvsvu:1019: vidyate tata eva tad ekaṃ kāryam iti / tad ayuktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1026: yadi hi sāmānyāj jvara-ādi-śamanaṃ kāryaṃ syāt / tasya aviśeṣād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1028: guṇa-tāratamyaṃ ca na syāt / viśeṣe vā sāmānyasya svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1033: yadi hy upakuryād anādheyaviśeṣasya ananya-apekṣaṇāt sakṛt sarvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1034: sva-kāryaṃ janayet / na vā taj-janana-svabhāvam / vyaktayas
SA15dhkpvsvu:1036: kuryur ity avirodhaḥ / tadvad arthā api kecit svabhāva-bhede api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1038: bhedād abhinnā ity ucyante ekena vā aneko janito ataj-janyebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1039: bhedāt / kiṃ punar anena bheda-lakṣaṇena sāmānyena svalakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1040: samānam iti pratyeyam atha anyad eva / kiṃ ca ataḥ / yadi
SA15dhkpvsvu:1041: svalakṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vikalpasya viṣayaḥ / anyato vā katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1042: arthakriyā / svalakṣaṇe ca anityatva-ādi-pratīter atādrūpyam teṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1043: ca avastu-dharmatā / na eṣa doṣaḥ / jñāna-pratibhāsiny-arthe sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1046: vikalpakam utpadyate atad-viṣayam api tad-viṣayam iva tad-anubhava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1049: paramārtha-samāna-ākāram tatra yo artha-ākāraḥ pratibhāti bāhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1050: iva eka iva anarthakriyākāry api tat-kārī iva vyavahāriṇāṃ tathā adhyavasāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1052: pratibhāsanāt tad-akāribhyo bhinnam iva na ca tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1053: tattvaṃ parīkṣā-anaṅgatvād iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ / te arthā buddhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1054: niveśinas tena samānā iti gṛhyante kutaścid vyāvṛttyā pratibhāsanāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1055: na svalakṣaṇam tatra apratibhāsanāt / ta eva ca kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1056: vyāvṛttāḥ punar anyato api vyāvṛttimanto abhinnāś ca pratibhānti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1057: iti / svayaṃ asatām api tathā buddhyā upadarśanān
SA15dhkpvsvu:1059: sarvaś ca ayaṃ svalakṣaṇānām eva darśana-āhita-vāsanākṛto viplava
SA15dhkpvsvu:1061: vastuny avisaṃvādo maṇi-prabhāyām iva maṇi-bhrānteḥ na anyeṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:1062: tad-bheda-prabhave saty api yathā adṛṣṭa-viśeṣa-anusaraṇaṃ parityajya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1064: prabhāyām iva maṇi-buddheḥ / tena na vikalpa-viṣayeṣv artheṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:1065: arthakriyākāritvam / na api svalakṣaṇasya anityatva-ādy-abhāvaḥ / yasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:1066: na anityatvaṃ nāma kiṃcid anyac calād vastunaḥ / kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1068: evaṃ bhavaty anityo ayam anityatvam asya iti vā / tad-dharmatām
SA15dhkpvsvu:1070: na ca te nirāśrayās tad-bheda-darśana-āśrayatvāt / na avastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1071: dharmatā tat-svabhāvasya eva tathā khyāteḥ / vastunas tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:1074: na vastu-bhedāt / tasya ekasya anekatva-ayogāt / anekasya ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1075: ekatva-ayogāt / vyatiriktasya ca niṣedhāt / teṣāṃ prakṛti-bhedād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1077: upādher ekasya dvābhyām abhidhānād adoṣa iti cet / anupakāriṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:1078: pāratantrya-ayogād anupādhiḥ / pāratantrye ca janyajanaka bhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1079: saha anavasthiter dvayor anabhidhānam / ekasya buddhyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1080: adhyāhāre na vastu-viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ syāt / buddhi-pratibhāsa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1081: viṣayatve ca sarvaṃ tathā eva astu / tathā bhinna-upādhim ata ekasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1083: saha avasthānād adoṣa iti cet / na / niṣpannasya pāratantrya-abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1084: anupādhitvam / na aniṣpannasya svarūpa-asiddheḥ / sarvathā asat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1085: pāratantryam iti kalpanā-āropitaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāre sarvathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1086: sa eva kiṃ na buddhir anuvidhīyate / eka-śabda-pramāṇena viṣayīkaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:1087: vastu-balād aśeṣa-ākṣepāt tad-anya-vaiyarthyaṃ ca na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1089: doṣāṇām aprasaṅgaḥ / tad abhinnam eka-ākāra-viṣayīkaraṇe apy aniścita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1091: upasaṃhāre apy abhinnaṃ buddhau pratibhāti iti sāmānya- viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1096: pratibhāsanād vyatiriktaṃ dharmam iva aviśeṣeṇa aparam asya svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1097: dharmitayā vyavasthāpya pradarśyate / tāvatā ca aṃśena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1098: dharma-dharmiṇor bhedād bhedavatī iva buddhiḥ pratibhāti / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1102: tat-svabhāva-grahaṇāt yā dhīs tad-arthā iva apy anarthikā //
SA15dhkpvsvu:1104: tasyāṃ yad rūpam ābhāti bāhyam ekam iva anyataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1107: tena abhinnā iva ābhānti vyāvṛttāḥ punar anyataḥ //78//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1113: na anyatra bhrānti-sāmye api dīpa-tejo maṇau yathā //81//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1119: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca vastuny asya na sambhavaḥ //84//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1124: saṃsṛjyante na bhidyate svato arthāḥ pāramārthikāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1125: rūpam ekam anekaṃ ca teṣu buddher upaplavaḥ //87//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1126: bhedas tato ayaṃ bauddhe arthe sāmānyaṃ bheda ity api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1127: tasya eva ca anyavyāvṛttyā dharma-bhedaḥ prakalpyate //88//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1129: bhedaḥ sāmānya-saṃsṛṣṭo grāhyo na atra svalakṣaṇam //89//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1133: na śrutiḥ kalpanā vā asti sāmānyena eva vṛttitaḥ //91//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1134: iti saṃgrahaślokāḥ / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svalakṣaṇe śabdā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1136: śabdāḥ saṃketitaṃ prāhur vyavahārāya sa smṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1137: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ na asti saṃketas tena tatra na //92 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:1138: na hi śabdā asaṃketitam arthaṃ prakāśayanti / saṃketaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1139: vyavahāra-arthaṃ kriyate api nāma itaḥ śabdāt kṛta-saṃketād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1140: uttara-kālaṃ imam arthaṃ pratipadyeta iti / na ca prākkṛta-sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1141: ekatra svalakṣaṇe śabdasya paścād prayogo yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1143: samayaḥ / sāmānyaṃ tarhi vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā vyāpi
SA15dhkpvsvu:1144: śabdair abhidhīyate / tan na vyavahāra-kāla-abhāva-doṣaḥ / na etad
SA15dhkpvsvu:1147: tat sādhanāya ity artheṣu saṃyojyante abhidhāyakāḥ //93//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1148: na khalu vai vyasanam eva etal lokasya yad ayam asaṃketayann
SA15dhkpvsvu:1149: aprayuñjāno vā śabdān duḥkham āsīta / kiṃ tarhi sarva eva asya avadheya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1151: tad ayaṃ śabdān api kvacin niyuñjānaḥ phalam eva kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1152: īhituṃ yuktaḥ / tac ca sarvaṃ tyāga-āpti-lakṣaṇam iṣṭa-aniṣṭayoḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1153: tena ayam iṣṭa-aniṣṭayoḥ sādhanam asādhanaṃ ca jñātvā tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:1154: pravṛtti-nivṛttī kuryāṃ kārayeyaṃ vā iti śabdān niyuñjīta niyoge
SA15dhkpvsvu:1157: na hi jātiḥ kvacid vāha-doha-upatiṣṭhate / na ca tādṛśaṃ prakaraṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1158: antareṇa loke śabda-prayogo vyavahāreṣu / vyakter aśakya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1159: codanatvāl lakṣita-lakṣaṇa-arthaṃ jāti-codanā iti cet / aśabda-codite
SA15dhkpvsvu:1160: saty api sambandhe kathaṃ pravarteta / na hi kaścid daṇḍaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1161: chindhi ity ukte daṇḍinaṃ chinatti / na apy asambhavād vyaktau pravṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1162: evaṃ hy asambaddha-pralāpī syāt / na tato anyatra pravṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1163: balīvarda-doha-codanā-vat / na ca artha-antara-codanena artha-antarasya lakṣaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1164: na hi sambandhe saty api daṇḍa-śabdād daṇḍini pratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1165: aniyata-sambandhatvāt tatra na iti cet / tat tulyaṃ jātāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:1166: api / vyaktīnām apāye kevalāyā jāter avasthānāt / bhrātṛ-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1167: śabdās tu sambandhi-śabdatvād ākṣipeyuḥ param / na tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1170: yogyatā-pratīter iṣṭam eva iti cet / sarvadā tarhi go-śabdād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1172: sambandhinyā jāteś codanād adoṣa iti cet / sarvadā tarhi tad-viśeṣaṇatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1173: avasthitā vyaktir ākṣiptā eva iti tadvān abhidheyaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1174: na ca jāti-vyaktyoḥ kaścit sambandho anyonyam ajanyajanakatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1175: anupakārāt / tato lakṣaṇam apy ayuktam / tasmān na jātau
SA15dhkpvsvu:1181: yadi vyaktau śabda-niveśanaṃ phala-vat / sa ca śabdaḥ kasmāt sākṣād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1182: vyaktiṣv eva na niyujyate / kiṃ tatra anyena vyavadhinā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1184: syād etad ānantyād vyaktīnām aśakyaḥ śabdena sambandhaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1185: kartum / evaṃ sati idam ānantyaṃ tadvaty api samānam / jātyā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1186: hi vyaktasya eva vaktavyā ity akṛta-sambandhasya anabhidhānād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1187: avaśyaṃ tatra sambandhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / sa ca na śakyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1188: tat-sambandhini karaṇāt tatra api kṛta eva iti cet / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1189: atra sambandhe apy ekatra kṛtād anyatra apratītiḥ na ca sambandho
SA15dhkpvsvu:1192: yām arthakriyām adhikṛtya ayam artheṣu śabdān niyuṅkte tat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1193: kāriṇām arthānām anyebhyo bhedāt tatra eva ca eṣām abhede kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1195: tadvad-doṣasya sāmyāc ced astu jātir alaṃ parā //95//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1196: syād etat anyavyāvṛtte api śabda-arthe vyāvṛtti-viśiṣṭasya tadvato
SA15dhkpvsvu:1197: abhidhānān na tadvat-pakṣād viśeṣaḥ / ko hy atra viśeṣo vyāvṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1198: jātir vyāvṛttimān jātimān iti / astu nāma tadvad-doṣaḥ / jātir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1199: anyā mā bhūt / jātim api hy abhyupagacchatā avaśyaṃ bhāvānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1200: bhedo abhyupagantavyaḥ / tad-abhāve tasyā apy abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1201: prasaṅgāt sa ca ekasmād bhedas tad-anyeṣām abhedas tad-viśiṣṭeṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:1202: artheṣu pratipattir astu / sarvathā doṣa-parihārasya kartum
SA15dhkpvsvu:1204: arthasya anyena sādhanāt / tad-abhyupagamasya ca avaśyaṃ bhāvitvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1207: ucyate tena tebhyo asya avyavacchede kathaṃ ca saḥ //96//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1208: śabdaṃ hy eṣa prayuñjāno artheṣv aniṣṭa-parihāreṇa pravarteta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1209: ca prayuṅkte / tatra anyatra ca pravṛtty-anujñāyāṃ tan- nāma-grahaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1211: avacanam eva syād anyavyāvṛtty-anabhidhāne / tasmād avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1212: śabdena vyavacchedaś codanīyaḥ / sa ca abhinnas tad-anyeṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:1213: iti jāti-dharmo apy asti / tan niyata-abhyupagamaṃ niyata-codanaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1215: anartha-nirbandha eva / yathā-kalpanam asya ayogāt / na vai vyavacchedo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1216: na kriyate / pravṛtti-viṣayaṃ tu kathayadbhir jātir uktā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1217: vyavacchedo asti ced asya nanv etāvat prayojanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1218: śabdānām iti kiṃ tatra sāmānyena apareṇa vaḥ //97//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1219: nanu uktaṃ pravṛtti-viṣayaḥ pradarśyate iti / uktam idam / ayuktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1220: tu uktam / tathā hi na sā pravṛtti-yogyā iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1221: tad-dvāreṇa acodite pravṛttir api pratyuktā / tadvac-codane ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1223: kiṃ na iṣyete / vyāvṛtter avastutvena asādhanatvāc cet / tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1224: tulyaṃ jāteḥ / tadvataḥ sādhanād adoṣa iti cet / tulyaṃ tad vyāvṛttimataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1226: sa vibhrama-vaśād akārake api kāraka-adhyavasāyī pravartayati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1227: vastu-saṃvādas tu vastu-utpattyā tat-pratibandhe sati bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1228: anyathā na eva asti / vastu-utpatter abhrāntir iti cet / na / atat-pratibhāsinas
SA15dhkpvsvu:1230: vyabhicārāc ca / bhrānter avastu-saṃvāda iti cet / na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1231: yathoktena eva vyabhicārāt / vitatha-pratibhāso hi bhrānti- lakṣaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1232: tan-nāntarīyakatayā tu saṃvādo na pratibhāsa-apekṣī / vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:1233: tu yathābhāvam arpita-cetasaḥ pravṛttau grāhyasya sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1236: jāti-grahaṇe api sambandhāc śliṣṭa-ābhāsā buddhiḥ pravartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:1237: iti cet / tadā na jātir na tadvān ekasya api svabhāva-sthiter
SA15dhkpvsvu:1238: agrahaṇād iti para-vāda eva āśritaḥ syāt / evaṃ tarhy anvayinaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1239: kasyacid arthasya abhāvāt prakṛti-bhinneṣv artheṣu tad eva idam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1240: pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1241: jñāna-ādy-arthakriyāṃ tāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhede api kurvataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1244: uktam etat bhede api bhāvās tulya-arthakriyākāriṇaś cakṣur-ādi-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:1245: iti / tām ekām jñāna-ādikām arthakriyāṃ teṣu paśyato vastu-dharmatayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1247: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tad eva idam iti sva-anubhava-vāsanā-prabodhena saṃsṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1248: bhedaṃ mithyā-pratyayaṃ janayanti / anyathā na bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1249: saṃsargavatī buddhiḥ syāt / yathā daṇḍiṣu / na hi tatra eka-daṇḍa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1250: yoge apy anyatra sa eva ayam iti bhavati / kiṃ tarhi / tad iha iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1251: na ca evaṃ pratyabhijñānam / kiṃ tarhi / tad eva idam iti / tan na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1252: tad ekaṃ anekatra paśyato api bheda-saṃsarga-vad yuktam / vibhrama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1253: balāt tu tathā jñāne na virodhaḥ / nimitta-abhāvād vibhramo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1254: ayukta iti cet / ta eva bhāvas tad-eka-artha-kāriṇo anubhava- dvāreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1256: marīcika-ādiṣv api hi jala-ādi-bhrāntes tāv eka-abhinna -ākāra-parāmarśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1258: api / na hi tatra anyad eva kiṃcit sāmānyam asti yat tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1259: pratīyeta / sattve vā sad-artha-grāhiṇī buddhir bhrāntir na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1260: abhūta-ākāra-samāropād bhrāntir iti cet / na tarhi sā tat-sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1261: grāhiṇī / yam eva khalv ākāram iyam āropayati sa eva asyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1262: viṣaya iti / aviṣayīkṛtasya aśakya-samāropāt / ākāra-antara-vat / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1263: ca tatra na asti ity asāmānyaṃ / sati sāmānya-grahaṇe tad-āropo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1264: na anyathā atiprasaṅgād iti cet / saty eka-kārya-kāri-grahaṇa iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1265: kiṃ na iṣyate / avaśyaṃ ca icchatā api sāmānyaṃ vyaktīnām eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1266: kārya-janana-śaktir eṣṭavyā / tatas ta eva anyebhyo bhidyamānās
SA15dhkpvsvu:1267: tādṛśaṃ pratyayaṃ janayanti iti kim atra sāmānyena / yathābhāvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1268: eva asaṃsṛṣṭa-bhedaṃ kiṃ na pratyeti iti cet / aśaktir eṣā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1269: vikalpānām avidyā-prabhavād / na vai bāhya-apekṣā eva bhrāntayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1270: bhavanti / kiṃ tu viplavād āntarād api keśa-ādi-vibhrama-vat / avidyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1271: udbhavād viplavatve cakṣurvijñāna-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1272: tasyā vikalpa-lakṣaṇatvāt / vikalpa eva hy avidyā / sā svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1273: eva viparyasyati / na evam indriya-jñānāni vikalpakāni / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1274: vā teṣv apy eṣa doṣo advayānāṃ dvaya-nirbhāsād iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1275: sarveṣāṃ viplave api pramāṇa-tad-ābhāsa-vyavasthā ā āśrayaparāvṛtter
SA15dhkpvsvu:1278: ca bhinna-bhāva-utpatter vibhramasya ca aviśeṣe apy abhimata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1280: katham utpattir iti cet / vikalpānām artha-pratibandha-niyama-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1281: na hi vikalpā yathārtham eva jāyante / sati marīcika-adarśane
SA15dhkpvsvu:1282: jala-bhrāntir iti tad-udbhavā ity ucyate na tu yathā-svabhāvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1286: tad eva idam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1287: darśanāt na avyatiriktasya vyakti-vad ananvayāt / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1289: parasya api na sā buddhiḥ sāmānyād eva kevalāt //99//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1290: na hi paro api enāṃ buddhiṃ kevala-sāmānya-bhāvinīṃ vaktum
SA15dhkpvsvu:1293: yadi hi nityam anayā buddhyā sāmānyam eva gṛhyeta apratītā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1296: tadvattā aniścayo na syād vyavahāras tataḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1297: yadā sāmānya-grāhiṇo vijñānasya na bheda ālambana-bhāvena upayujyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:1298: tadā na tau kadācid api śliṣṭau gṛhītāv iti idam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1299: sāmānyam ayaṃ vā tadvān iti na syāt / tathā ca tat-pratipattyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1302: syād etad bhavanti vyaktayas tasya ālambana-bhāvena kāraṇaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1303: tu kevalāḥ / yadā punar āsām ekaṃ sahakāry asti tadā tat-sahitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1305: tad ekaṃ vastu kiṃ tāsāṃ nānātvaṃ samapohati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1306: nānātvāc ca eka-vijñāna-hetutā tāsu na iṣyate //102//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1307: kiṃ vai teṣāṃ bhedānāṃ tena ekena nānātvaṃ nirākriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1308: nānātvaṃ hi teṣv eka-vijñāna-akāraṇatve kāraṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1310: na brūmo anekam ekaṃ pratyayaṃ na janayati bhedād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1311: na bhedo janana-virodhī / kiṃ tarhi / kaivalyam / tena ekena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1313: tābhir vinā api pratyekaṃ kriyamāṇāṃ dhiyaṃ prati //103//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1314: tena ekena api sāmarthyaṃ tāsāṃ na ity agraho dhiyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1315: katham idānīṃ vyaktīnāṃ tatra jñāne sāmarthya-gatiḥ / pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1316: tāsām abhāve api tad-bhāvāt / asati sāmānye abhāvād itarathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1317: ca bhāvāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yathā nīla-ādiṣv eka-apāye api cakṣurvijñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1318: bhavati iti / na samūhe api teṣām asāmarthyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1319: tathā iha api pratyekam eka-apāye api bhavati iti na sarvadā sāmarthyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1322: śakti-siddhiḥ samūhe api na evaṃ vyakteḥ kathaṃcana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1323: nīla-ādīnāṃ hi cakṣurvijñāne pratyekam api sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1324: iti samūhe api śaktir aviruddhā / tathā na kadācid vyaktayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1325: sāmānya-nirapekṣā anvayi vijñānaṃ janayanti / tasmād asamarthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1326: eva vyaktayas tatra iti na tena gṛhyeran /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1327: tāsām anyatama-apekṣaṃ tac cec śaktaṃ na kevalam //105//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1328: atha api syāt na vema-rahitaḥ kuvindaḥ paṭaṃ karoti praty ekam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1329: vema-abhāve api kuvindaḥ karoti iti na tata eva paṭa-utpattiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1330: na kevalam ekaika-vyakty-apāye vijñāna-utpattāv api sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1331: tad-hetuḥ / kiṃ tarhi / vyaktīnām ekāṃ kāṃcid apekṣya vijñānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1333: tad ekam upakuryus tāḥ kathaṃ ekāṃ dhiyaṃ ca na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1334: bhinnānāṃ hy arthānām eka-artha-upakriyā virodhinī iti sarvo ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1335: ārambhaḥ / tāś ced vyaktayo bhinnā apy ekaṃ sāmānyam upakurvanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1336: kaḥ punar āsāṃ vijñānena aparādhaḥ kṛto yat tan na upakurvanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1338: apy eka-sāmānya-upakaraṇa-śaktiḥ evaṃ tad eva ekaṃ vijñānaṃ kurvantu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1340: kāryaś ca tāsāṃ prāpto asau jananaṃ yad upakriyā //106//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1341: na hy anatiśayam ātmānam asya pūrvavad bibhrataḥ kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1342: upakārako nāma / atiprasaṅgāt / artha-antara-janane api tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1343: kiṃ tena / tasya tad-āśrayatve anupakāriṇaḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1344: atiprasaṅgo vā / upakāre api tatra eva tat-pratibandha
SA15dhkpvsvu:1345: iti kim anyas tat-karaṇāt tad-upakārī / tad-apekṣasya āśrayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1346: tad-upayoge anupakāryatve kā iyam apekṣā nāma / tadutpatti-dharmā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1347: dharmā bhāvaḥ svabhāvapratibandhād apekṣate nāma anādheyātiśaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1348: ātmā parair apekṣate ca iti vyāhatam etat / tasmād yaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1349: kaścit kasyacit kvacit pratibandhaḥ sa sarvo janyatāyām eva antarbhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1351: ca anupakārāt / tasmād vyakty-upakṛtasya sāmānyasya vijñāna-janane
SA15dhkpvsvu:1352: janane vyaktam asya tat-kāryatā-anuyujyate / kevalasya sāmarthye
SA15dhkpvsvu:1353: api vyaktīnāṃ kvacid apy atra sāmarthya-asiddheḥ agrāhyatvaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1354: samarthā vyaktayo vijñāne pratibhāsanād iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1355: katham asiddha-upakārāṇāṃ pratibhāsa iti sa eva sāmānya-abhyupagame
SA15dhkpvsvu:1356: cintyate / yasmān na anupakārako viṣayo atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1357: na aviṣayasya vijñāne pratibhāsaḥ / anupakārakasya aviṣayatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1359: iti cet / bhavantu nāma tad-viṣayāṇi nirviṣayāṇi / nirviṣayatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1361: ātmabhūta eva vijñānasya / bhāva-abhāva-anuvidhānāc ca sāmarthyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1362: na pratibhāsanāt / apratibhāsino api vyakti-vyatirekeṇa sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1364: abhinna-pratibhāsā dhīr na bhinneṣv iti cen matam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1365: na brūmo anekam eka-kārya-kṛn na bhavati iti / kiṃ tarhi / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1367: syāt / na vai sāmānya-grāhiṇīṣu svalakṣaṇa-pratibhāsaḥ tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1368: api tāsāṃ bhāvāt ākāra-antareṇa ca sva-jñāne pratibhāsanāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1369: aneka-ākāra-ayogād ekasya atiprasaṅgāc ca / tasmān na iyaṃ bhinna-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1371: apy adhyavasāya-vibhramād vyavahārayati lokam / sa tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:1372: tasyāṃ pratibhāsamāna ākāro na artheṣv asti / anyatra bhedād abhedinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1373: sa ca arūpaḥ / tam eva eṣā gṛhṇatī tathā viplavata ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:1374: uktaṃ prāk / api ca / vastu-sāmānya-vādino api hi bhinnā eva vyaktayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1375: kathaṃ tāsv abhinna-ākārā buddhir iti tulyaṃ codyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1376: na tulyaṃ tatra abhinnasya sāmānyasya sadbhāvāt / nanu tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:1377: tasya ābhāsaḥ sato api na lakṣyate / sā hi varṇa-saṃsthāna-pratibhāsavatī
SA15dhkpvsvu:1378: vibhāvyate / na ca īdṛśaṃ sāmānyam / na ca tato vyatiriktaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1379: kaścid abhinna ākāro asti / ākṛti-sāmānya-vādino api viśeṣa-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1380: tasya avyatirekād artha-antare avṛttir iti bhedān na abhinna-pratibhāso
SA15dhkpvsvu:1382: pratibhāso dhiyaṃ bhinnaḥ samānā iti tad-grahāt //107//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1383: na eva tāsv abhinnaḥ pratibhāso asti samānā iti grahāt / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:1384: ekasmin pratibhāse samānā iti yuktaṃ / kiṃ tarhi / tad eva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1385: dvayasya grahaṇād adoṣa iti cet / tathā api tad iha iti syāt / na samāna
SA15dhkpvsvu:1386: iti / tad eva tāsāṃ sāmyam iti cet / katham anyonyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1387: sāmyam / tat-sambandhād iti cet / na / pratibaddhasya sambandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1390: nanu samānā iti grahaṇād eva āsv abhinna-pratibhāsaḥ / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:1391: tad-darśane bhinna-abhinnayoḥ pratibhāsanāt samānā iti pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1395: na hi vayam artha-jñāne dvāv ākārau paśyāmaḥ / apaśyantaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1396: katham artha-dvaya-kalpanena ātmānam eva vipralabhāmahe / eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1397: kāryās tu vyaktayaḥ kalpanā-viṣayatām upayāntyas tathā anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1399: nanu dhīḥ kāryaṃ tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate //108//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1400: pratibhāvaṃ / tadvat tat-pratibhāsino vijñānasya api bhedāt / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1401: eka-kāryāḥ / tad hi tāsāṃ kāryaṃ tac ca bhidyate / yad
SA15dhkpvsvu:1402: apy udaka-āharaṇa-ādikam ekaṃ ghaṭa-ādi-kāryaṃ tad api pratidravyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1403: bhedād bhidyata eva iti na ekaṃ bhedānāṃ kāryam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1407: niveditam etad yathā na bhāvānāṃ svabhāva-saṃsargo asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1408: tatra saṃsṛṣṭa-ākārā buddhir bhrāntir eva / tāṃ tu bhedinaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1409: padārthāḥ krameṇa vikalpa-hetavo bhavanto janayanti svabhāvata
SA15dhkpvsvu:1410: iti ca / sa tv eṣām abhinno bheda ity ucyate jñāna-ādeḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1411: kasyacid ekasya karaṇāt atat-kāri-svabhāva-vivekaḥ / tad api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1412: pratidravyaṃ bhidyamānam api prakṛtyā eka-pratyavamarśasya abheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1413: avaskandino hetur bhavad abhinnaṃ khyāti / tathābhūta-pratyavamarśa-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:1416: ekaṃ pratyayaṃ janayanti ity asakṛd uktam etat / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1423: na hi dṛśyaṃ vibhāgena apratibhāsamānam asti ity uktam etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:1424: sati vā kvacid anāśritaṃ kathaṃ jñāna-hetur iti / pratiṣedhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1425: ca vidhānāt tat-kalpanā ayuktā iti / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1429: eva yuktaḥ / yo ayam anyonyaṃ viveko bhāvānāṃ tat-pratītaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1430: eva saṃketo api kriyamāṇaḥ śobheta atat-kāri-vivekena pravṛtty-arthatayā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1431: yadi hi na tat-pratīty-arthaḥ saṃketas tasya vyavahāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1432: kāle apy asaṃsparśān na anya-parihāreṇa pravarteta / na hi sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1433: teṣāṃ tebhyo vivekaḥ śabdena codita iti / sā ca śrutiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1437: vastu-bheda-āśrayāc ca arthe na visaṃvādikā matā //112//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1440: pratibhāsitvād akārya-kāriṇam api tat-kārya-kāriṇam iva adhyavasyantīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1443: paramārthatas tad-vyatirekiṣu padārtheṣu na visaṃvādikā ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1444: tathā hi sa teṣu vyatireko bhūtaḥ / sarvathā avyatikramaṇīyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1445: na eko vyatirikto avyatirikto vā sarvathā ayogāt / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1446: samāveśane vastuni dūra-utsṛṣṭam eva vastu syāc śabda-jñānābhyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1447: tad-viṣaya-abhimatasya tasya abhāvāt / anyasya ca vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1448: dharmasya kasyacid asaṃsparśāt / tata eva ca sā śrutir anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1449: viṣayayā ity ucyate / anyavyāvṛtteṣv artheṣu vyāvṛtti-bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1450: upādāya aviśeṣeṇa niveśanāt / vyavahāre apy anya-parihāreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1455: yady avṛkṣebhyo bhedo vṛkṣas tasya avṛkṣa-grahaṇam antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1456: tathā grahītum aśakyatvāt avijñāta-vṛkṣeṇa avṛkṣasya api tad-vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1457: rūpasya aparijñānāt buddhāv anārūḍhe arthe na saṃketaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1459: teṣām avṛkṣāḥ saṃkete vyavacchinnā na vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1460: ya evam ekaṃ vastu-sāmānyam abhyupagamya itaretara-āśrayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1461: anya-vyavacchedena saṃkete codayanti / teṣāṃ tatra api saṃketa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1464: vyavacchinnāḥ kathaṃ jñātāḥ prāg vṛkṣa-grahaṇād ṛte //115//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1465: na hi tadā pratipattā vṛkṣaṃ vetti na avṛkṣaṃ taj-jñānāya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1466: tad-arthitayā upagamāt / so ajānānaḥ katham avṛkṣa-vyavacchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1471: na hi saṃkete para-avyavacchedena niveśitāc śabdād vyavahāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:1472: tat-parihāreṇa pravṛttir yuktā / śiṃśapā-ādi-bheda-vat / atha api syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1473: avidhāya niṣidhya-anyat pradarśya ekaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1474: vṛkṣo ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate tat prapadyate //117//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1475: vyavahāre api tena ayam adoṣa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1476: na vai vastu-sat sāmānya-vādinā kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1477: vidhīyate / kiṃ tarhi / ekam agrato vyavasthitaṃ vastu sandarśya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1478: vṛkṣo ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate / saṃketa-kāle tathā-dṛṣṭam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1479: eva ayam arthaṃ tat-sambandhinaṃ vā vyavahāre api pratipadyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:1480: iti na samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ / na samānaḥ / yasmāt tatra api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1482: ayam apy ayam eva iti prasaṅgo na nivartate //118//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1483: ekaṃ pradarśya ayaṃ vṛkṣa ity api bruvāṇo ayam apy ayam eva ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:1484: ubhayīṃ gatiṃ na ativartate / tayoś ca sa eva doṣaḥ / na doṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1485: dṛṣṭa-viparītasya sujñānatvāt / ekaṃ hi kiṃcit paśyato anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:1486: tad-ākāra-vivekinīṃ buddhim anubhavatas tato anyad iti yathā-anubhavaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1488: ayam eva vṛkṣa iti pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ / yatra eva taṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1489: paśyati tam eva avṛkṣaṃ svayam eva pratipadyate / na idaṃ vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1490: vādinaḥ sambhavati / ekatra dṛṣṭasya rūpasya kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1491: ananvayād darśanena pratipattau vyakty-antare api na syāt tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1492: pratītiḥ / evaṃ tarhi tatra api tulyam etat / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1495: niveditam etat prāg yathā ete bhāvāḥ prakṛti-bhedino api jñāna-ādikam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1496: ekaṃ kāryaṃ kecit kurvanti na anya iti / tān ayaṃ tatra svayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1497: eva tad-hetūn atad-hetūṃś ca vibhajya pratyeti / tasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1500: bhedena pratipadyeta ity uktir bhede niyujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1501: taṃ tasyāḥ pratiyatī dhīr bhrāntyā ekaṃ vastv iva īkṣyate //121//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1504: hetutayā tad-anyavyāvṛttyā ca atathābhūtān api tathā-adhyavasitān
SA15dhkpvsvu:1506: ete vṛkṣā iti sva-para-vikalpeṣv eka-pratibhāsān ādarśya vikalpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1508: ity uktim atad-hetubhyo bhede niyuṅkte / taṃ tasyāḥ pratipadyamānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1509: buddhir vikalpikā bhrānti-vaśād eva eka-vastu-grahiṇī iva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1510: pratibhāti / na punar ekaṃ vastu tatra dṛśyam asti yasya darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1513: agrahaṇāt / agṛhītasya ca apara-pravibhāgena anupalakṣaṇāt / ākṛter
SA15dhkpvsvu:1514: apy ekatra dṛṣṭāyā anyatra draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / tad-atadvator
SA15dhkpvsvu:1515: vṛkṣa-avṛkṣatve vyaktir eka eva vṛkṣaḥ syāt / bhavatu nāma ghaṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1517: na hy ajñeyaṃ kiṃcid asti yato bhedaḥ syāt / tato bhedena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1518: viṣayīkaraṇa eva tasya jñeyatvāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1521: vyartho anyathā prayogaḥ syāt taj jñeya-ādi-padeṣv api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1523: śabdaṃ hi prayuñjānaḥ sarvo anvaya-vyatirekau na ativartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1524: tasya pravṛtti-nivṛtty-arthatvāt / yadi hy ayaṃ na kasyacit kutaścin
SA15dhkpvsvu:1526: sarva-vyavahāreṣu na kiṃcid vyāharet / vyāhārasya avadhāraṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1527: nāntarīyakatvāt / yathā ghaṭena udakam ānayeti / yadi ghaṭena añjalinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1528: vā udaka-ānayanaṃ yathākathaṃcid abhimataṃ syāt udakam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1529: ānayety eva vaktavyaṃ syāt / na ghaṭena iti / tathā paṃśunā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1530: vā anena vā yena kenacid ānītena artha ānayety eva syād anākṣipta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1531: karaṇa-karmakam / evam ānayanam anyad vā yat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1532: anuṣṭhānaṃ vā abhimataṃ tadā ānayety api na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1533: brūyāt / vyarthatvād vacanasya / tathā vyavahāra-upanītānāṃ jñeya-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1534: padānām api kenacid vyavacchedyena bhavitavyam / ananya-āśaṅkāyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1535: prayoga-ayogāt tatra hi yad eva mūḍha-mater āśaṅkā-sthānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1536: tad eva nivartyam / anāśaṅkamāno vā kiṃ parasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1537: upadeśam apekṣate / aśrotṛ-saṃskāraṃ ca bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1538: na unmattaḥ / tat-saṃskārāya eva śabdānāṃ kṛta-saṃketatvāt / avyavahāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1539: upanītaś ca na eva kaścit jñeya-ādi-śabdo asti / vākya-gatasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1540: padasya artha-cintanāt / kva punar ete śabdāḥ prayujyanta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1542: jñeya-śabdasya ko artha iti praśne na kaścid arthaḥ / tataḥ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1543: apratipatteḥ / tathā ghaṭa-ādi-śabdānām api / yā api kvacit prakaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:1546: tādṛśo jñeya-ādi-śabdeṣv api yathā-darśanam asty eva / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1547: sarva eva śabda-prayogaḥ kutaścid buddhiṃ nivartya kvacin niveśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1549: niveśanaṃ ca yo yasmād bhidyate vinivartya tam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1551: sa ca ayam anyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1552: kaścid bhāga iti prokto rūpaṃ na asya api kiṃcana //125//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1554: na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacit paraḥ //126//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1555: na ca api śabdo dvaya-kṛd anyonya-abhāva ity asan /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1557: niveśyamāno apy eṣa śabdo yasmād bhidyate taṃ vinivartya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1559: niveśyata iti / sa eva ayam artha-antara-vyāvṛttyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1560: tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gamyate śabdo artha-antara-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1561: viśiṣṭān eva bhāvān āha ity ādinā nirdiṣṭaḥ / sa hi taṃ bhedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1564: sa eva bhedas tad-vyāvṛttyā gato bhāgas tad-gates tad-upādhitvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1565: tad-viśiṣṭo gata ity ucyate / na punar artha-antara-nivṛttir viśeṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1566: bhūtā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ yayā viśiṣṭāḥ śabdaiś codyante / daṇḍi-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1568: eka-bheda-abhidhāne api nāntarīyakas tad-anya-ākṣepo bhavati iti tayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:1571: darśayaṃs tad-vyāvṛttyā gamyate tad-viśiṣṭo vā ity āha / ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:1572: eva ca śabdasya na dvau vyāpārau tad-anyavyāvartanaṃ svārtha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1574: svārthasya bheda-rūpatvāt / na hy anvayo avyatireko ananvayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1576: tathā eka-parihārasya kvacit sthity-abhāve / sa ca ayaṃ bhedo arūpaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1577: rūpavattvena tv asya darśanaṃ kevalaṃ buddhi-viplava
SA15dhkpvsvu:1579: tena eva aparamārtho asāv anyathā na hi vastunaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1580: vyāvṛttir vastu bhavati bhedo asya asmād iti īraṇāt //128//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1581: rūpaṃ hi paramārthaḥ / bhedaś ced rūpaṃ syāt / tad-rūpaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1582: syād atad-rūpaṃ vā / tādrūpye tad eva iti na anyas tato bhidyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1583: na hi tasya rūpam anyasya syāt / na tad eva bhedasya rūpaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1584: rūpaṃ ca anyad eva syāt / tataś ca bhāvas tasmād vyāvarteta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1585: tato asmāt tasya bheda iti na syāt / yat khalu yad-bhedād vyāvartate
SA15dhkpvsvu:1586: tad eva tad bhavati iti so asya bheda iti ca na syāt / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1587: hy anyonyasya bhedo bhavati / sambandha-abhāvāt / sati vā sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1588: kāryakāraṇabhāva iti rūpaṃ taj-janitaṃ bheda ity aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1590: ca bhedasya tato apy asya bheda iti bheda-upādhitvāt dravya-antara-van
SA15dhkpvsvu:1591: na bhedaḥ syāt / na hi bheda-upādhir eva bhedo ayam ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:1592: iti viśeṣa-nirdeśāt / tataś ca upādhy-abhāve bhedasya eva abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1593: tasmān na vyatiriktaḥ / tad-anya-gaty-abhāvāc ca vastuno na paramārthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1594: kathaṃ tarhy abhinnasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane
SA15dhkpvsvu:1595: tasya eva anyato api bhedād anaṃśaya-eka-bheda-codane sarva-bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1596: gates tatra śabda-pramāṇa-antarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1598: liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vācyaṃ vastu na kiṃcana //129//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1600: bhaven nānā-phalaḥ śabda eka-ādhāro bhavaty ataḥ //130//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1601: uktaṃ prāg yathā saṃsṛṣṭa-bāhya-adhyātmika-bhedā buddhiḥ svam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1603: śabda-artham upanayati iti / tatra eva ca te śabdās tais tair bhrānti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1604: kāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭa-rūpa iva ābhāti yathā-saṃketaṃ vicchedāya vyāpriyante/
SA15dhkpvsvu:1605: na ca eka-sādhyaṃ vyavacchedam anyaḥ karoti / saṃketa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1606: pratiniyamāt na ca vicchinnaṃ kiṃcid vastv ākṣipyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:1607: yasya abhidhānād vastu-balena akhile gatiḥ syāt / śabdānāṃ buddhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1608: viplava-viṣayatvāt / tatra ca avastuni vastu-sāmarthya-abhāvāt / tathābhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1610: viplava-anusārī vyavahāra iti tasya tat-pratibandhe sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:1611: tad-avyabhicāraḥ / tato vitathād apy ante tathābhūta eva vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:1613: eka-vastu-viṣayatvāt nānā-phalaḥ śabda eka-ādhāro vyāghātāt / yathā varṇite
SA15dhkpvsvu:1616: yadā anyaṃ tena sa vyāpta ekatvena ca bhāsate //131//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1619: syāt satyaṃ sa hi tatra iti na eka-vastv-abhidhāyini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1623: śabdāś ca buddhayaś ca eva vastuny eṣām asambhavāt //134//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1624: yadi hi vidhi-rūpeṇa vastv eva śabdair vikalpair vā api viṣayīkriyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:1626: ādayaś ca iti manyamānaḥ praṇetā nyāya-śāstrasya anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1630: tad ekam anaṃśaṃ vastu kathaṃ bhinna-ākārābhir buddhibhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1631: viṣayīkriyate / ākāra-bheda-āśrayatvād bhedasya / tasya ca abhedāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1632: tadātmano api sāmānyasya tad-ekayogakṣematvāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1634: ādir na ca vastv-ātmana ekasya tatra eva vṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1635: avṛttiś ca yuktā vyāghātāt / na ca anyatra avartamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1636: syāt / sāmānyasya vṛttir na viśeṣasya iti cet / na / bheda-abhāvāt / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:1637: hi eka-rūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā bhavet viśeṣo vā / na hy asati rūpa-bhede
SA15dhkpvsvu:1638: ayaṃ pravibhāgo yuktaḥ sati vā avyatireko na syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1639: tad ayam avibhāgo anviyād vā na vā / na punar ananvayo anvayī
SA15dhkpvsvu:1640: ca / yo api bhinnam eva sāmānyam āha / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1642: yathāsvaṃ śabdā bhinnam artham abhidadhānāḥ katham eka-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1645: sarvatra bhāvād vyāvṛtter na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ //136//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1646: yathā hy ekas tasmād bhinnas tathā anyo api iti bhedasya asāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1647: doṣo api na asti / pariśiṣṭa-abhāvas tu prāg eva uktaḥ / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1652: yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1654: artha-abhedena ca vinā śabda-abhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1655: tasmāt tat-kāryatā api iṣṭā atat-kāryād eva bhinnatā //140//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1660: yo api manyate katham abhinnam artham antareṇa bahuṣv ekā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1661: śrutiḥ teṣām asāmyāt eka-vṛtter anyatra pratyaya-ajananāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1662: apratyāsattike ca pratyaya-utpāde atiprasaṅgāt teṣu ca eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1665: iti / tasya apy ekam asti ity eva lokena śabdo niveśanīyaḥ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:1666: vā ekam enāṃ śrutiṃ vastu-śaktyā eva dhvanayati iti / na asty etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1667: kiṃ tarhi kenacit prayojanena kecic śabdāḥ kvacin niveśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1668: tatra yady anekam ekatra upayujyeta tad avaśyaṃ tatra codanīyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1669: tasya pṛthak pṛthak codane atigauravaṃ syāt / na ca asya ananya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1670: sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ śakyaṃ codayitum / na apy asya āyāsa asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1671: kiṃcit sāphalyaṃ / kevalam anena tatra yogyās te arthāś codanīyāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1672: ta ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhir vā iti svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1673: atra vaktuḥ / tad iyam ekā śrutir bahuṣu vaktṛ-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1674: vaśāt pravartamānā na upālambham arhati / na ca iyam aśakya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1675: pravartanā / icchā-adhīnatvāt / yadi hi na prayoktur icchā katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1676: iyam ekatra api pravarteta / icchāyāṃ vā ka enāṃ bahuṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1677: pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ / prayojana-abhāvād / eva apravartanam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1678: cet / uktaṃ prayojanam / bhinneṣv ekasmāt pratītir atat-prayojana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1679: bhedena ity uktam / na punaḥ svabhāvasya ekatvāt / yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1681: śabdo bhinneṣu bhaved ity uktaṃ prāk / atat-prayojana-vyāvṛttis
SA15dhkpvsvu:1682: tu bhinnānām aviruddhā iti sa eva artha-abhedaḥ śabda-abhedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1683: kāraṇaṃ bhavatu / tena ime tat-prayojanā ity atat-prayojanebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1684: bhinnā eva uktāḥ / na punar eṣām anyā tat-kāryatā anyatra anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:1687: sambhave kuto rūpa-vijñānam iti vyavahāra-lāghava-arthaṃ kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:1688: sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ niveśayet yaro rūpa-vijñāna-hetuḥ śaso
SA15dhkpvsvu:1689: vā iti / api nāma sarveṣāṃ tad-hetūnāṃ sakṛt pratītir yathā syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1690: iti / na ca atra anugāmi kiṃcid rūpam asti / kevalaṃ tad-arthatayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1691: te bhāvā atad-arthebhyo bhinnā iti bheda eva eṣām abhedaḥ / evaṃjātīyāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:1693: kiṃcid ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tatra viśeṣa-abhāvād apārthikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1694: viśeṣa-codanā iti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojana-artham ekam ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1695: lokaḥ śabdaṃ teṣu niyuṅkte ghaṭa iti / te api sajātīyād anyataś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1697: ity abhedāt tato aviśeṣeṇa pratīyante / tatra ghaṭasya rūpa-ādayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1701: ta evam ucyante / na punar atra anyat kiṃcid yathā-varṇita-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1702: dravyam asti tasya tādṛśasya anupalambhāt / eka-vacanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1704: ye hetu-phala-viśeṣa-bhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:1705: vā te api sakṛt pratyaya-arthaṃ vrīhy-ādi-śabdaiḥ kṛta-saṃketāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1706: kathyanta iti pūrvavad vācyam / ye api pṛthak samastā vā kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1707: upayujyante ta avasthā-viśeṣa-vācibhiḥ sakṛd eva śabdaiḥ pratyaya-
