SA15dhkpvsvu:1708: arthaṃ khyāpyante sanidarśanāḥ sapratighā vā iti tad-anyebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1711: apy aneka ekena vyavahāra-artham eva / yathā śābaleyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1712: bāhuleyaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtako vā iti / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1713: tat-kārya-pratiṣedhena apy acākṣuṣaḥ śabdo anityo anātma iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1714: tat-kāraṇa-pratiṣedhena apy asvāmikaḥ śūnya iti / evaṃ yathāyogam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1715: anyad api vācyam / śūnya-anitya-ādi-śabdeṣu yathā-kalpanaṃ samīhita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1716: ākāraṃ buddhāv āropya tad-vyavacchedena vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1720: eka-vṛtter aneko api yady eka-śrutimān bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1721: na kevalam eka-kāryās tad-anya-bheda-aviśeṣād eka-śabdena ucyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:1722: api tv eka-vṛttyā apy aneka eka-śabdena ucyeta / ko virodhaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1723: uktam atra / tasya upalabhya-abhimatasya anupalabdher abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1725: ādayo na bhaveyur ity ādi / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1726: vṛttir ādheyatā vyaktir iti tasmin na yujyate //143//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1727: yad etad ekam anekatra vartamānam ekāṃ śrutiṃ vartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:1728: tasya kā iyaṃ vṛttiḥ / ādheyatā vā syāt / yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:1729: vartanta iti / vyaktir vā tair abhivyakter / yady ādheyatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1731: nityaṃ hi sāmānyam iṣyate / anityatve aparāpara-utpatter anekatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1732: bheda-vad eka-pratyaya-ayogāt / nityasya ca kiṃ kurvāṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:1733: ādhāraḥ syāt / tasya tatra samavāyād ādhāra iti cet ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:1735: tad eva idam anupakārakasya āśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1737: ādayo api vastu-sambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvān na vyatiricyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1738: parasparam anyato vā anupakāriṇām apratibandhāt / apratibaddhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1739: ca asambandhāt / yady apy eka-artha-samavāyināṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1740: anupakāraḥ / tata ekasmād upakāreṇa bhāvyam / abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1741: yathokta-doṣa-prasaṅgāt / ataḥ sva-upakāra-dvāreṇa eva param api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1742: buddhyā saṃghaṭayya khyāpyate / tasmāt tatra api kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1743: kṛta eva pratibandhaḥ / tad ayam āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1744: svātmany anupakurvāṇo anapekṣasya ādhāra iti yācitaka-maṇḍanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1745: etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ajanakaṃ kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇām
SA15dhkpvsvu:1749: prakṛtyā eva guruṇo dravyasya asamāna-deśa-kārya-utpādana dharmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1751: kṣaṇa-sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ tatra eva badara-kāryaṃ janayad ādhāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:1752: ity ucyate / anyathā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi ity api na syāt / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:1753: tad-upakāra-kṛto ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / saṃyoga-kṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1754: kiṃ punaḥ sa tayor eva saṃyogaḥ / tābhyāṃ jananāt samavāyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1755: vā / sa kim ekatra eva na samavaiti janyate vā / tasya asāmarthyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1756: tad asamarthaṃ pṛthak tat sahitam api tādṛśam eva ity anupakārakatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:1757: na saṃyogena tadvat syāt / sahitasya tad-anya-upakārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1760: api tatra anupakārāt / ubhayathā kārakasya akiṃcitkaratvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1761: anupakārakatvād ity ukta-prāyam / tasmāt sarva eva vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1762: sambandhā janakasya eva upayoga-viśeṣa-vaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1766: na hy ayaṃ janana-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇa ādhāra-bhāvaḥ sāmānye sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1770: atha api syāt sthāpaka āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya tataḥ sthiti-hetutvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1771: ādhāro na jananād iti / tad ayuktam / tasya tad-abhāve api sthānāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1772: patana-dharmāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ pāta-pratibandhād ajanako api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1773: sthāpako bhavet / atra api yadi kaścit pratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1774: sa hi pāta-pratibandho na artha-antaram eva yaḥ sthāpayitrā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1775: kriyeta / artha-antaratve tatra eva asya upayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1776: pratibandhād apāte api tulyaḥ paryanuyogo anavasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1777: vā / tasmāt pāta-abhāvaḥ pāta-pratibandhaḥ sa kathaṃ kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:1778: kriyate / abhāvaṃ karoti iti hi na abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1779: kathaṃcit kārya-rūpatve abhāva-ayogāt / tasmād bhāva- kriyā-pratiṣedha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1780: nirdeśa eṣa bhāvaṃ na karoti iti yāvat / tathā ca ayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1781: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya sthāpako nāma / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1782: ayaṃ kenacid apratibaddha iti na kadācit tiṣṭhet / tasmāt pāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1783: pratibandha ity api kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānām upādāna-samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1784: deśa-utpādanam ucyate / astu nāma ajananaṃ pātināṃ tat-pratibaddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1785: tat-karaṇād gatimato dravyasya kaścit sthāpako apy astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1786: sāmānyasya akriyasya kiṃ-lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇaḥ sthāpakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1787: syāt / sthitir hi tasya svarūpa-apracyutir eva / sā ca na āśraya-āyattā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1790: astu nāma āśraya-hetukā sthitiḥ sāmānyasya / sā sāmānyād anyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1791: vā syād ananyā vā / sā anyā cet tām eva sa āśrayaḥ karoti / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1792: ca apratibaddhā sāmānya iti kim sāmānyasya āśrayeṇa / pratibaddhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:1793: vā kaḥ pratibandha iti vācyam / sthiti-karaṇaṃ cet tatra api tulyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1794: prasaṅgo anavasthā ca / tata upakāra-anavadhāraṇād asya iyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1795: sthitir ity apratītiḥ / jananaṃ cet kim āśrayeṇa apekṣitena anupakāriṇā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1796: apekṣā iti hi tat-pratibandhaḥ sa ca anādheyaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1797: ayukta iti / kevalaṃ janayed iti / na asty anyaḥ sthiti-hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1798: abhede vā sthiteḥ sāmānyāt svarūpam eva tat tasya / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1799: nityam asti iti / na sthitir asya kenacit kriyate / tasmān na sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1800: ādhāro asti / tan na ādheyatā asya vṛttiḥ / atha punaḥ sato api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1801: sāmānyasya avyaktasya vyaktyā jñāna-kāraṇatvāt tad-vyaktis tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:1802: vṛttiḥ syāt / na yuktam evaṃ bhavitum / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1804: tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāś ca kāraṇam kārakaṃ matam //146//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1805: prāg eva asya ca yogyatve tad-apekṣā na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1807: na khalu vai kārakād vyañjakasya kaścid bhedaḥ / sva-viṣaya-vijñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1809: vā janayan bhāvam eva vyañjaka ucyate / paratra tu jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1810: janana-śaktir anākṣiptā janyasya iti janana-mātreṇa kārakatvam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1811: yo hi yato vijñāna-utpādana-yogyatāṃ pratilabhate sa cen
SA15dhkpvsvu:1812: na tasya janyaḥ syāt / sā asya svabhāva-bhūtā yogyatā prāg eva asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1813: iti na vijñāna-janane tam apekṣeta / para-bhūtāyāṃ ca asyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1814: sa eva tato bhavati iti sthiti-vat prasaṅgaḥ / tasmād vyañjako na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1815: taṃ karoti na apy anyam ity akiṃcitkaraś ca apekṣyata iti vyāhatam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1816: etat / nanv ajanakā api kāryatvād dhūma-ādayo vyañjakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1817: satyaṃ vyañjakā na tu dhūmam apekṣya agnir ātmani jñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1818: janayati / tathābhūtasya agneḥ sākṣād ajanakatvāt / kevalam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1819: upādāna-balena eva tatra jñānam utpadyate na viṣaya-balena asaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:1820: api tasmin bhāvāt paraṃparayā liṅga-anusāreṇa / na api sāmānyalakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1822: balena utpattir vā iti niveditam etat / nivedayiṣyate ca / tasmād ye
SA15dhkpvsvu:1823: viṣayāḥ sākṣād upayogena vijñānaṃ janayantas tatra param
SA15dhkpvsvu:1824: apekṣante te avaśyaṃ tata ātmānaṃ pratilabhante / na ca ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1826: tasmān na tat kenacit vyaṅgyam / na vai yogyatā-pratilambhaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1827: sāmānyasya vyaktiṃ brūmaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / svāśraya-samavāyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1828: svāśraya-samavetaṃ hi tad ātmany anyatra vā vijñāna-hetur iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1829: uktam atra ajanya-janakayoḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāva-lakṣaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1830: samavāya iti / svāśraya-samavāya-apekṣo vijñāna-hetus tena janya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1831: eva syāt / tad-hetoḥ svabhāvasya prāg-abhāvāt paścāc ca tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:1832: bhāvāt / nityaṃ tat-svabhāva-sadbhāve prāg api samavāyād vijñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1833: udaya-prasaṅgāt / na vai vyaktiḥ sāmānyasya saṃskārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1834: vyañjikā / kiṃ tarhi / tad-grāhiṇa indriyasya / so api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1835: añjana-āder iva vyakteḥ saṃskāro na indriyasya ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1837: saṃskṛtam añjana-ādibhir indriyaṃ pratipattau kiṃcid atiśayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1839: na evaṃ vyakter indriyasya kaścit saṃskāras tad-bhāva-abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1840: kālayoḥ pratipattiṃ praty aviśeṣāt / viṣaya-saṃskāras tv indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1841: aviśeṣe api tad-viśeṣa-ādhānād upakārī syāt / na indriya-saṃskāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1842: prāg adṛśye darśana-śakty-ādhānād upakāraka iti cet / so atīndriyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1843: arthaṃ darśayan kathaṃ na pratipatter bhedakaḥ / eka-pratiniyame
SA15dhkpvsvu:1844: ca sāmānya-antarasya darśako na syāt / vyaktyā ca indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1845: saṃskārāt tad-darśane tad-vyaṅgyeṣu sāmānyeṣu kadācit aniścayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1846: na syād eka-niścayo vā / tasyā avibhāgāyās teṣu viśeṣa-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1847: vyakter yadi indriya-saṃskāro yadi na indriya-saṃskāraḥ sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1848: vijñāna-janana-svabhāva iti svabhāvād apracyuter anapekṣya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1850: kevalam asamartham iti cet / ko ayam anādheyātiśayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1851: sahakāra-arthaḥ / anityā hi bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo viśiṣṭa-ātma-lābhāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:1852: tam apekṣeran / yo hy eṣāṃ janaka ātmā sa tadā eva tato bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:1853: iti janyatā eva eṣāṃ parasparato apekṣā / sāmānyaṃ punar anāsādya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1854: paraṃ nityaṃ tat-svabhāvaṃ kim iti indriyam apekṣate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1855: hi tasya kevalasya yo na tat-svabhāvaḥ sa punaḥ kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:1856: bhāvī vyakter indriya-saṃskāraḥ / tat-sahakāri sāmānyaṃ vijñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1857: hetur ity api pāraṃparyeṇa vyakteḥ kāryam eva sāmānyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1859: vyañjakasya ca jātīnāṃ jātimattā yadi iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1861: yo hi yad-viṣaya-vijñāna-hetuḥ sa tasya vyañjakaḥ / vijñāna-hetutvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1863: cakṣuṣo artha-pratipatteḥ / tataḥ pradīpa-ādayo gotva-ādinā tadvantaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1864: syuḥ / na hi vyakter api jñāna-hetutāṃ muktvā anyā kācid asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:1866: samavāyo abhivyaktir iti cet / uktā uttaram etat / tasya samavāya-ayogād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1867: iti / samavāya-mātraṃ hi vyaktyā saha asya jātaṃ na anyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1868: kaścid viśeṣa iti / pūrvavat paścād api na jñāna-hetuḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1869: samavāyād eva jñāna-hetutve svāśraya-samavāyinām anyeṣām api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1870: dṛśyatā-āpattiḥ / tasmāj jñāna-hetutā eva vyañjakatvaṃ / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1871: tulyaṃ pradīpa-ādāv iti sa eva prasaṅgaḥ / tan na ādheyatā na vyaktir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1872: vṛttiḥ sāmānyasya iti / avṛtter na anekatra jñāna-hetuḥ / ata eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1873: vyakter anyā athavā ananyā yeṣāṃ jātis tu vidyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1875: vidyata eva ity avadhāraṇa-arthas tu-śabdaḥ / vidyamāno hi padārthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1877: tat-sambandham apekṣate / anyathā atiprasaṅgāt / sa ca sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1880: sā hi buddhir eka-bhāvinī vyakty-antaram evam āskanded bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1881: grāhiṇī yadi tatra dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid anyatra paśyet / tac ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1884: na sambhavati / svabhāvo hi svabhāvān na tattvam anyatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1885: vā laṅghayati / rūpasya atadbhūtasya anyatva-avyatikramāt / idam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1886: eva khalu rūpasya anyatvaṃ yan na tad ākāra-antara-vad aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1887: tac cet sāmānyasya rūpam ananyat tad eva tad bhavati / atattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1888: vastv-antara-vad anyatva-prasaṅgāt / na ca eka-vyakty-ātmano vyakty-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1890: sāmānyād anvayinī buddhiḥ syāt / na api vyatirekiṇas tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1891: kvacid anāśrayād anyasya api vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāva-ādeḥ sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1893: ca jñāna-utpattāv api prasaṅgāt / tad ayam eka-vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1894: darśanena eka-vṛtteḥ pratyayasya anyatra vṛttim icchaṃs tattvānyattve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1895: na atikrāmati ity ayuktam etat / tasmād iyam artheṣv eka-rūpā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1896: pratītir vikalpa-vāsanā-samutthitā bhrāntir eva / bhāva-bhedo vāsanā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1897: prakṛtiś ca tasya āśraya iti nirloṭhitam etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1900: vijñāna-santateḥ sarva-artha-darśaneṣv anapekṣya api tad-bhedaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1903: pravartante / na hi teṣv atathābhūteṣu kiṃcid vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1904: vā sāmānyam asti / tathābhāva-kalpanayā tu tad-anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1905: bhedaḥ pratipattṛ-abhiprāya-vaśāt syāt / tad-abhiprāyād eva sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1906: kiṃ na iti cet / tena avaśyaṃ hi tatra bhedo nāntarīyakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1907: eṣṭavyaḥ / sa eva sāmānya-kārye paryāpta iti niḥprayojanā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1908: sāmānya-kalpanā / yadi satsv asatsu vā bhāveṣu sāmānya-buddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:1909: na iyam arthavatī kevalaṃ viplava eva iti na asmākam asyā viṣaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1910: nirūpaṇaṃ prati kaścid ādaraḥ kvacid avisaṃvādo asyā vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:1912: pratyakṣa-vad atathābhāve api bhāvād iti nivedayiṣyāmo niveditaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1913: ca / bheda-viṣayatvaṃ punar asyā bahulaṃ bhinna-padārtha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1915: eva aparatra bhāvāt / api ca ayaṃ sāmānyam artha-antaraṃ kalpayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:1916: svāśraya-mātra-gataṃ vā kalpayet sarva-gataṃ vā ākāśa-ādi-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1919: sambhavaḥ / yasmāt tat pūrva-dravyād utpitsu dravyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1921: niṣkriyatva-upagamāt / na hy anya-dravya-vṛtter bhāvasya tato avicalato
SA15dhkpvsvu:1924: na ca tatra āsīt asti paścān /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1925: na ca tatra utpanno na kutaścid āyāta iti ka imaṃ vyāghāta-bhāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:1926: udvoḍhuṃ samartho anyatra jāḍyāt / api ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1929: utpitsu-deśād bhinna-deśam / tayoś ca vartata iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1931: bhinna-deśayor hi bhāvayoḥ sambandho dvidhā bhavet / nānā-avayava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1933: rajju-vaṃśa-daṇḍa-ādi-vat / na hi sa avayavatvam antareṇa bhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1934: deśābhyāṃ yugapat kasyacid yogo yuktaḥ / tasya dvitīya- ātma-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1936: tat-sambandha-ayogāt / ekasya ādheyasya tatra sthānaṃ tadā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:1937: tatra tena eva ātmanā asthānam iti tat-sthita-asthita-ātmanor ekasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1938: virodhād ayuktam etat / sarvatra sarvadā sarva-ākāra-sthita-ātmā iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:1940: syāt / tathā ca gām apy aśva iti pratīyāt / aśva-sthita-ātmanā dravyatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:1942: tasya ca ekasya adṛṣṭa-ākāra-antara-abhāvāt / tasmān na anavayavam aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1943: deśe yugapad ādhīyate / pūrva-ādhāra-tyāge tu bhinna-deśe api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1946: svasmād acalataḥ sthānād vṛttir ity atiyuktimat //153//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1947: yatra asau vartate bhāvas tena sambadhyate api na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1948: tad-deśinaṃ ca vyāpnoti kim apy etan mahādbhutam //154//
SA15dhkpvsvu:1949: ity antaraślokau / yasya tu sarva-gataṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:1950: vyaktā eva ekatra sā vyaktyā abhedāt sarvatragā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1952: na jāter nityāyāḥ kācid vyaktir iti niṣiddham etat / tasmān nityam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1953: anapekṣita-para-upaskārā dṛśyeta vā na vā kadācit tasmin svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:1955: api vyaktiṃ vyāpiny ekatra vyaktyā bheda-abhāvād vyaktā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1956: eva sarvatra iti vyakti-śūnyeṣv api pradeśeṣu dṛśyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1962: āśraya-śūnyeṣu pradeśeṣu na dṛśyata iti pratisamādadhīta tasya apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:1963: asty eva āśraya-indriya-saṃyoga upakāraka iti tatas tad-darśī yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1964: sthitāṃ paśyet / na hi tasyāṃ dṛśyamānāyām adṛṣṭaṃ tadīyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1966: pradeśeṣv adarśanam ity api mithyā / tathābhūtasya vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1968: hi vyañjakaḥ pradīpa-ādiḥ svarūpa-śūnye deśe sva-vyaṅgyaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1969: darśayat / na evaṃ vyaktir viparyayāt / kathaṃ hi sā vyañjikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1970: ca syāt sāmānyasya / tat-pratipatti-dvāreṇa ca dṛśyā syāt / vyaṅgyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:1971: ca sā eva prasajyate pradīpa-ghaṭa-vat / kathaṃcit tat-pratipattim
SA15dhkpvsvu:1972: antareṇa adṛśya-rūpatvāt / api ca anena kim asambhavad abhisamīkṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1973: evaṃ bahv-āyāsaḥ sāmānya-vāda āśritaḥ / parasparato bhedād
SA15dhkpvsvu:1974: vyatirekiṇīṣu vyaktiṣv anvayinaḥ pratyayasya ayogāt / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:1976: pācaka-ādiṣv abhinnena vinā apy arthena vācakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1978: asti / pācakaḥ pāṭhaka iti / na hi teṣv anyad ekam abhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1979: asti yena bhinnās tathā pratīyeran / karma asti cet / vyaktibhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:1980: eva tarhi sa pratyayo astu / kim idānīṃ karmaṇā anyena vā / bhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:1981: abhinna-pratyaya-hetur na bhavati ity ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1982: tad yadi bhinnam api karma-abhinnam pratyayaṃ janayet / vyaktibhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:1983: ko aparādhaḥ kṛto yena tās tathā na iṣyante / tāsām eka-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:1984: asya idam iti vyatireka-pratītir atad-ākāra-viśeṣavatī ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:1985: syād iti cet / uktam atra yathā vyatireko viśeṣa-pratyayāś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:1991: na hy artha-antara-sambandhinī jātir artha-antare pratyaya-hetur
SA15dhkpvsvu:1992: gotvam iva karka-ādiṣu / pācaka-karmasu ca karma-jātir na ca tāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:1993: karmāṇi pācaka-śabdena abhidhīyante / kiṃ tarhi / tat-karma-āśrayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:1996: ca pākaḥ pāka iti hi tataḥ syān na punaḥ pācaka iti / tasya karma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:1999: na hy anityaṃ karma sarvadā asti / tasya ca pratyayasya karma-nimittatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2000: niruddhe karmaṇi na pācaka ity ucyeta / pacata eva karma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2002: asambandhān na sāmānyaṃ na ayuktam śabda-kāraṇam //158//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2004: vinaṣṭe hi karmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmaṇi na kartari iti sambaddha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2005: sambandhe apy asya na asti ity asambandhān na śabda-jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2006: hetuḥ / anyathā hy atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt / atītam anāgataṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2011: asad hi nirupākhyaṃ kathaṃ nimittaṃ syāt / kārya-karaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2013: karma-nimittam / anyac ca vyakty-ādikaṃ na iṣṭam ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2014: animitte te syātām / tathā ca na jāti-siddhis tasyā jñāna-abhidhānayoḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2016: na karma na sāmānyam iti cet
SA15dhkpvsvu:2018: na hi śaktir nāma kiṃcid anyad eva pācaka-ādīnām / tasyā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2020: tasya upayoga iti cet kim idānīṃ śaktyā / śakty-upayogāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2022: eva upayujyata iti vācyam / tasya upayoge śaktāv arthakriyāyām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2023: eva upayujyata iti kiṃ na iṣyata iti kim antarāle anarthikayā śaktyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2024: tasmāc śaktir iti dravyam eva tat-kāryaṃ tac ca na anveti iti / tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2026: sāmānyaṃ pācakatva-ādi yadi prāg eva tad bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2027: vyaktaṃ sattā-ādi-van no cen na paścād aviśeṣataḥ //160//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2028: atha api pācakatvam iti sāmānyam eva kiṃcid bhavet / saty arthe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2029: tat-samavāyasya akādācitkatvāt sattā-ādi-vat / prāg eva vyaktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2030: syāt / yāvanti hi sāmānyāny arthe samavāya-dharmāṇi tāni saha
SA15dhkpvsvu:2031: utpādena asya samavayanti iti samayaḥ / tad-vyatikrame tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2032: paścād apy aviśeṣān na tat-samavāyaḥ syāt / tat-sambandhi-svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2033: vaiguṇyād hi sa tasya prāṅ na āsīt tatra eva ca asya svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2034: sthitasya paścād bhavati iti duranvayam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2036: na apekṣa-atiśaye apy asya kṣaṇikatvāt kriyā kutaḥ //161//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2037: karma-upakāram apekṣya pācakatvaṃ dravyeṇa vyajyata iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2038: sthira-svabhāvasya anatiśayād aviśeṣa-ādhāyini kā apekṣā / atiśaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:2039: vā kṣaṇikatvāt karmaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāva-bhūtasya anyānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2040: atiśayasya utpattes tad api kṣaṇikaṃ syāt / tataḥ sva-utpatti-sthāna-vināśinaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2041: kriyā kutaḥ yad-apekṣaṃ vyañjakaṃ syāt / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2042: tarhi idānīm asty abhinne vastuni jñāna-śabdayor anvayinor vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2043: yathā pācaka-ādiṣu / nanu tad eva idaṃ cintyate kathaṃ teṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2044: api iti / cintitam etad yathā na teṣu sambhavati / tat kim idānīm
SA15dhkpvsvu:2045: animitte te syātām / na animitte / kiṃ tarhi / na bāhya-tattva-nimitte /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2047: na punar vikalpa-abhidhānayor vastu-sattā samāśraya ity ukta-prāyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2049: aparāpara-darśane apy anvayinos tayor darśanāt / na ca tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2050: tan-nibandhanaḥ kaścit svabhāvo asti paraspara-virodhinor yugapad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2051: ekatra samāveśa-ayogāt / aniyamena tarhi syāt / na hy animittaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2052: bhavat kvacid bhavati kvacin na bhavati iti niyamam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2053: arhati / na khalu vai tad animittaṃ vāsanā-viśeṣa-nimittatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2054: bāhyaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ dṛśyaṃ na asti iti brūmaḥ / na ca asati tasmin
SA15dhkpvsvu:2057: ca te asatsu utpadyanta iti sarvatra sarva-ākāraḥ / vibhāge na eva tathā-upalabdhānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2058: vikalpanāt / uktaṃ ca atra kiṃcid asmābhiḥ prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2059: api kecid eka-jñāna-kāryāḥ svabhāva-bhedād iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2060: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2061: kvacin na anyatra sa eva astu śabda-jñāna-nibandhanam //162//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2063: na nivṛttiṃ vihāya asti yadi bhāva-anvayo aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2064: ekasya kāryam anyasya na syād atyanta-bhedataḥ //163//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2065: yady ete bhāvā vyāvṛttiṃ muktvā svabhāvena kenacid anvayinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2066: śūnyāḥ / na eṣāṃ bahūnām ekaṃ kāryaṃ syāt / yo hi tasya svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2067: janakaḥ / na hi so anyasya asti / yo asti sa na janako vyatirekas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2068: niḥsvabhāvatvāt / yaj-janakaṃ tad eva vastu taj-janakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2069: ca aparatra na asti iti na aparaṃ janayet / sa hi tasya svabhāvo yo janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2070: so anyasya api yadi syāt / sa tena svabhāvena tato abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2072: yady ekātmatayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2073: ātmā ekatra api so asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ //164//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2074: yady eka-svabhāvatvād aneka ekasya kārakaḥ sa teṣām abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2075: svabhāvaḥ / eka-saṃnidhāne apy asti iti / avaikalyāt kāraṇasya eko
SA15dhkpvsvu:2077: na apaity abhinnaṃ tad-rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalv apāyinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2078: na hi tasya abhinna-svabhāvasya artha-antare viśeṣo asti / viśeṣo abheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2079: hāneḥ / sa ca tatra apy asti iti na eka-sthitāv api tasya apāyo asti / ye
SA15dhkpvsvu:2080: viśeṣās teṣāṃ saha-sthiti-niyama-abhāvāt syād apāyaḥ / na ca te
SA15dhkpvsvu:2082: tato janakasya sthānāt / asthāyinaś ca ajanakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2083: eka-sthitāv api kārya-utpattiḥ syāt / na ca bhavati / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2085: tat-kāryam aneka-sahakāri-sādhāraṇam eka-viśeṣa-apāye api na bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2086: punar apy avikaleṣu sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu bhavati / na tv avikale
SA15dhkpvsvu:2087: apy abhinne rūpe / kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāva-dharmi yan na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2088: tat tasya eva vaikalyāt / na ca abhinnasya rūpasya eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2089: api vaikalyam asti / avikale api tasminn abhavat tasya ajanaka-ātmatāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2091: tata eva utpattiḥ / tasmin sati niyamena bhavatas tad-anyasmād utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2092: kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgāt / tasmād viśeṣā eva janakā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2093: sāmānyaṃ / tatas ta eva vastu / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2094: sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya eva arthakriyā-kṣamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2095: idam eva hi vastv-avastunor lakṣaṇaṃ yad arthakriyā-yogyatā ayogyatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2099: na anveti yo anveti na tasmāt kārya-sambhavaḥ //166//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2100: tasmāt sarvaṃ sāmānyam anarthakriyā-yogyatvād avastu / vastu
SA15dhkpvsvu:2101: tu viśeṣa eva tata eva tan-niṣpatteḥ / svabhāva-ananvayāt tarhy
SA15dhkpvsvu:2102: ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya na asti ity ajanakaḥ syāt / janakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2103: vā bheda-aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syāt / na etad asti / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2104: tena ātmanā hi bhede api hetuḥ kaścin na ca aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2106: ekasya janakād ātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2107: aviśeṣe kaścid iti syād etad yady eṣāṃ na viśeṣaḥ sambhavet / tato bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2108: api kutaścid ātma-atiśayāt kaścij janako na aparaḥ / sa hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2109: tasya svabhāvo na aparasya / na hi svabhāvā bhāvānāṃ paryanuyogam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2110: arhanti kim agnir dahaty uṣṇo vā na udakam iti / etāvat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:2111: syāt kuto ayaṃ svabhāva iti / nirhetukatve anapekṣiṇo niyama-abhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2112: atiprasaṅgāt / tasmāt svabhāvo asya sva-hetor ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2113: tasya api taj-janana-ātmatā tad-anyasmād ity anādir hetu-paraṃparā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2114: bhinnānāṃ hi kaścid hetur na anyaḥ svabhāvād ity atra na kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2117: abhedāt / svabhāvena eva viśvasya svātma-vad vibhāga-utpatti-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2118: nirodha-ādayo na syuḥ tathā upalakṣaṇād abhedasya / idam eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2119: bheda-abheda-lakṣaṇam eka-ākārasya api vyatireko avyatirekaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2121: bhedo api tena na evaṃ ced /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2122: na vai sarva-ākāra-avyatirekaṃ brūmo yena evaṃ syāt / kaścid asya ātmā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2123: bhinno na anya iti bhedān na sahotpatty-ādayaḥ / evaṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2126: bhedaḥ / sthāna-asthānayor ekātma-āśrayatve ko anyo dharmo bhedaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:2127: iti nānātvam eva kvacin na syāt / sarva-ākāra-viveka avivekinor vā arthayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:2128: abhyupagamān nāma kevalaṃ na iṣṭaṃ syān na vastv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2129: ity uktam / tad ime na ekayogakṣemā bhāvāḥ bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2131: tad idam artha-antaram anāyattam ajanyatvād asya idaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2132: bhedo vā iti vyapadeśaṃ na arhati / anyāpohe apy eṣa tulyaḥ prasaṅga
SA15dhkpvsvu:2135: na hy anyāpoho nāma kiṃcit tasya ca svabhāva-anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2137: upaplavaś ca sāmānya-dhiyas tena apy adūṣaṇā //169//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2138: nirviṣayam eva khalv idaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ yad anekatra eka-ākāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:2139: iti na tad-viṣayasya abhāvāt sthitir asthitir vā / yat punar etad uktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2141: yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato anyo janakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2142: tatra na brūmo anyasya taj-janakaṃ rūpaṃ na asti iti / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2143: yad ekasya taj-janakaṃ tad anyasya na ity anyo api svarūpeṇa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2144: janako na pararūpeṇa atattvāt / te yathāsvaṃ bhinnāś ca taj-janakāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:2145: ca svabhāvena iti ko atra virodhaḥ / eka-rūpa-vikalas tad-rūpo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2146: na syāt na atat-kāryaḥ / tena eva ca tat-kāryaṃ kartavyam iti ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:2149: ity uktam / na ca te viśeṣās tena ātmanā parasparam anuyanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2150: yad ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya tan na asti / na ca tāvatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2153: syād etat satyaṃ viśeṣā janakāḥ na punas teṣāṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2154: rūpaṃ kiṃ tv abhinnam api tad-eka-śakti-yogāj janakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2156: saty api sāmānye rūpe na tena te janakās tasya anapāyād eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2157: api kārya-utpatti-prasaṅgād ity uktaṃ prāk / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2160: utpatti-sthiti-vināśa-ādi-bhedaś na ity api-śabdāt / yo ayam abhinnān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2161: sarva-arthān manyate tasya ayam artheṣu buddhi-pratibhāsa-bhedo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2162: viruddha-dharma-adhyāsaś ca na syāt / sati vā tasminn abhede api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2163: na kaścid bhedaḥ syāt / tathā ca ayaṃ pravibhāgo na syād ekātma-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2164: tasmād ayaṃ bhinna-pratibhāsa-ādir viśeṣa eva / na ca atra aparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2167: sa eva arthas tasya vyāvṛttayo apare //170//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2168: tat-kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca uktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2170: yad arthakriyākāri tad eva vastv ity uktam / sa ca viśeṣa eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2171: yat punar etat sāmānyaṃ nāma tat tasya eva aparasmād bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2172: na hi tasya arthatve dṛśyasya rūpa-anupalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam / tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2174: yathā abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2175: tathā bheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam //173//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2176: yad uktam / kathaṃ taj-janaka-svabhāvād bhinno asya janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2177: syāt / janakatve vā aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syād iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2178: atra / yady aviśeṣaḥ syāt syād etad iti / yathā ca asya svayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2179: abheda-vādino abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaḥ sarvasya janaka iti tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2181: bhede hi kārakaṃ kiṃcid vastu-dharmatayā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2182: abhede tu virudhyete tasya ekasya kriyā-akriye //174//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2184: eva kārakāḥ syuḥ na anye atat-svabhāvatvād ity atra na eva kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2185: viruddham asti / ekatve tu tasya tatra eva tathā kārakatvam akārakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2187: bhedo apy asty akriyātaś cen na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2188: na vai sarva-ākāra-avivekaṃ brūmo bhedasya api bhāvāt / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2189: kaścid akārako api iti / tathā api kathaṃcid bhedāt sahakāriṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2191: paryāyeṇa atha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasya eva vastunaḥ //175//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2192: atha api syān na eva kaścid akārako asti / sarveṣāṃ sarvatra paryāyeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2193: upayogāt / śakter vā vipariṇatāyās tan-niveśinyā rūpa-antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2194: upayogāt / sa eva khalv ayaṃ paryāyo bheda-āśraya ekasya katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2195: pariṇāmo vā avyatirekiṇyāḥ / viśeṣe vā kathaṃcid ekatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2196: hānir iti yat kiṃcid etat / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2199: bhāvāś ced abhinnena ātmanā svātmabhūtena bhedinas tadvantaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2200: syuḥ tad-abhinna-svabhāva-ātmatvād bhedasya api kutaḥ parasparaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2201: bhedaḥ / atha na sa tasya samāna ātmā / tathā sati tadātmanā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2202: tena api na yuktaṃ tathā bhavitum / tathā abhāve hy atad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2203: dharmā syāt / na hy ayaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān svabhāva eko yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2206: na hi kvacid asya ekāntiko bhedo abhedo vā vivekena vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2209: bhedaḥ sāmānyam ity etad yadi bhedas tadātmanā //177//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2211: yadi sāmānya-viśeṣayor yam ātmānam āśritya sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2212: iti sthitis tena ātmanā bhedas tadā bheda eva / yasmāt tau hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2213: tayoḥ svātmānau tau ced vyatirekiṇau vyatireka eva sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2214: viśeṣayoḥ svabhāva-bhedāt / svabhāvo hi bhāva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2217: vyatireke ca bheda-sāmānyayor na bhedaḥ sāmānyān na sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2220: yam ātmānaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo ayaṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2222: cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2223: asty eva vastu na anveti pravṛtty-ādi-prasaṅgataḥ //180 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2224: sarva eva gaur aśvād bhinno abhinno vā iti bhedam abhedaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2225: pṛcchan viśeṣam eva bhāvasya svabhāva-ākhyam adhikṛtya pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2226: sa eva hi tathā ucyate / dravyatva-ādayas tu na tatra śabda-coditāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2228: tato gatiḥ syāt / nirloṭhitaṃ ca etad ācāryeṇa / tad ayaṃ gava-ādi-śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2229: pratyupasthāpitam arthaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā pṛcchann
SA15dhkpvsvu:2230: artha-antara-upakṣepeṇa tatra kim iti dvi-mukha-buddhiḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2231: tasmād yo asya ātmā ananya-sādhāraṇo yaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2232: viśiṣṭa-arthakriyā-arthī pravartate yathā gor vāha-doha-ādau na anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2233: sambhavino arthasya yathā yuddha-praveśe sa eva svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2234: yathāsvaṃ śabda-codito na dravyatva-ādi sāmānyam / tac-codanayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2235: tadā prāptum anabhipretatvāt / gava-ādi-samāveśāt tad ātmabhūtānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2236: ca ananvayena tatra anubhaya-rūpatvāt / tam eva ca ayaṃ bhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2238: asya abādhaka eva / sarvatra svabhāvena bhedasya abhyupagamāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2239: sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇasya svabhāva-bhūtasya ca sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2240: abhede apy uktam / svātmanā eva abhede tu tat-svabhāva-nibandhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2241: arthakriyā-arthī samaṃ dvayor api pravarteta / eko api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2242: tām arthakriyāṃ tat-svabhāvatvād eva karoti / tad-anyasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2243: tat tulyam iti so api kiṃ na karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2244: etena eva yad ahrīkāḥ kiṃ apy aślīlam ākulam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2246: yad ayam ahrīkaḥ syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti kim apy aślīlam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2247: ayuktam aheya-upādeyam apariniṣṭhānād ākulaṃ pralapanti / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2248: apy anena nirastaṃ svabhāvena ekānta-bhedāt / tad-anvaye vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2250: codito dadhi khādeti kim uṣṭraṃ na abhidhāvati //182//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2251: tathā hy uṣṭro api syād dadhi na api sa eva uṣṭraḥ ye na anyo api syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2252: uṣṭraḥ / tathā dadhy api syād uṣṭraḥ na api tad eva dadhi yena anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2253: api syād dadhi / tad anayor ekasya api kasyacit tad-rūpa-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2254: abhāvāt svarūpasya vā atad-bhāvinaḥ sva-niyatasya abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2255: na kaścid viśeṣa iti / dadhi khādeti codita uṣṭram api khādet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2256: atha asty atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena vartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2257: sa eva dadhi so anyatra na asti ity anubhayaṃ param //183//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2258: atha anayoḥ kaścid atiśayo asti yena ayaṃ tathā coditaḥ kṣīra-vikāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2259: eva pravartate na anyatra / sa eva atiśayo arthakriyā-arthi-pravṛtti-viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2261: vastu dadhi iti / sa ca tādṛśaḥ svabhāvo anyatra na asti iti / pravṛtty-abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2262: arthinaḥ / tasmāt tan na ubhaya-rūpam ity ekānta-vādaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2264: sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhī-dhvanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2266: so ayam ahrīkaḥ kvacid apy ekam ākāraṃ pratiniyatam apaśyan
SA15dhkpvsvu:2268: ādhimucyeta arthān abhilaped vā / tato bheda-agrahāt tat-saṃhāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2269: vādo na syāt syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti / atha punar asaṃsṛṣṭāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2271: kvacit pratiniyamāt tat-pratibhāsa-bheda-kṛta eva tayo rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2273: tathā ca na ekas tad-ubhaya-rūpaḥ syād iti mithyā-vāda
SA15dhkpvsvu:2274: eṣaḥ / sthitam etat na bhāvānāṃ kaścit svabhāva-anvayo asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2275: bheda-lakṣaṇam eva tu sāmānyam / atha ca prakṛtyā kecid eka-jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2276: ādi-phalāḥ kecin na iti / bhavatu nāma bhāvānāṃ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2277: bhedaḥ sāmānyam / yeṣāṃ tu nirupākhyānāṃ svabhāva eva na asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2278: tatra kathaṃ svabhāva-bheda-viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ / teṣv avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2280: ayogāt / tathā ca sarvatra ayam anvaya-vyatireka-āśrayo vyavahāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:2281: na syāt uṣṇa-svabhāvo agnir na anuṣṇa ity api / svabhāva-antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2283: agni-svabhāvasya apratipattir iti vyāmūḍhaṃ jagat syāt / syād etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:2284: na tatra kasyacid asato niṣedhaḥ anuṣṇaṃ sad eva artha-antaraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2285: niṣidhyata iti / katham idānīṃ sad asan nāma / na brūmaḥ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2286: asat tatra na asti iti deśa-kāla-dharma-niṣedha eva sarva-bhāveṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:2288: anirdiṣṭa-viṣayasya naño aprayogāt / so api tarhi deśa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2289: pratiṣedhaḥ katham / yasmān na tatra api deśa-ādīnāṃ pratiṣedho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2290: na apy arthasya / sambandho niṣedhyata iti cet / nanu tan-niṣedhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2291: api tulyo doṣo niṣedhād asati śabda-apravṛttir ity ādi / asato vā asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2292: niṣedhe tadvad dharmiṇo api niṣedhaḥ / na vai sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2293: na asti iti niṣedhaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / na iha ghaṭo na idānīṃ na evam ity uktau
SA15dhkpvsvu:2294: na anena sambandho asti na etad dharmā vā iti pratītiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2295: ca sambandho niṣiddho bhavati iti / tathā api kathaṃ niṣiddho yāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2296: asya sambandho dharmo vā na asti iti matir na bhavati / na ca asyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2297: kathaṃcid bhāve sambhavo abhāveṣu tathā abhāvāt / tasmāt sambandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2298: abhāva-pratīter na ayam iha ity ādyā pratītiḥ / sa tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2299: na syāt / pratītau vā tad-abhāvasya / yathā pratīti-matas tat-prabhavāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2300: śabdāḥ kena nivāryante / sa eva hi śabdānāṃ na viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2301: yo na vitarkāṇām / te cet pravṛttāḥ ko vacanasya niṣeddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2302: na hy avācyam arthaṃ buddhayaḥ samīhante / sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2303: tu svarūpeṇa anabhidhānam uktam / abhidhāne sambandhitvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2304: buddhāv upasthānāt / yathā-abhiprāyam apratītiḥ / tad ayaṃ pratīyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:2305: api sambandhi-rūpa eva iti svarūpeṇa na abhidhīyate / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2306: na abhāva-vat sambandhe api prasaṅgaḥ / api ca / ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2307: abhāvam abhidheyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ prati pratividadhad abruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2308: kathaṃ pratividadhyāt / vacane vā asya katham abhāvo anuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2309: atha abhāvam eva na icchet / tena avacanam / tad eva idānīṃ katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2310: abhāvo na asti iti / yat punar etad artha-niṣedhe anarthaka-śabda-aprayogān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2311: nirviṣayasya naño aprayoga ity atra uttaraṃ vakṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2312: santy abhāveṣu śabdāḥ / teṣu kathaṃ svabhāva-bheda iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2315: na āśaṅkyā eva siddhās te vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ //185//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2316: vastu-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānāṃ kiṃ rūpam abhidheyam āhosvid bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:2317: iti śaṅkā syāt / abhāvas tu viveka-lakṣaṇa eva nimittīkartavyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2318: kasyacid rūpasya abhāvāt tad-bhāve abhāva-ayogāt / tad-bhāva-lakṣaṇatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2319: bhāvasya / tasmād ayam eva sa mukhyo vivekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2320: tasya tathā abhāva-khyāpinaḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ viveka-viṣayā ity asthānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2321: eva etad āśaṅkāyāḥ / tasmāt siddham etat sarve śabdā viveka-viṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2322: vikalpāś ca / ta ete eka-vastu-pratiśaraṇā api yathāsvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2323: avadhi-bheda-upakalpitair bhedair bhinneṣv iva pratibhātsu buddhau
SA15dhkpvsvu:2324: vivekeṣu upalayanād bhinna-viṣayā eva / tena svabhāvasya eva sādhyasādhanabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2325: api na sādhya-sādhana-saṃsargaḥ / tau na pratijñārthaikadeśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2326: hetur iti / sa ca ayaṃ hetutvena apadiśyamānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2330: tena iyaṃ kṛtaka-śrutiḥ svabhāva-abhidhāyiny api para-upādhim enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2332: upādhi-bheda-apekṣaḥ kvacit svabhāvo hetur ucyate kvacid anapekṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2333: sāmānyena yathā anityatva eva sattvam kvacit svabhāva-bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2334: dharma-viśeṣa-parigraheṇa yathā tatra eva utpattiḥ / anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2336: sattā-svabhāvo hetuś cen na sattā sādhyate katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2338: yadi sattvam anityatve anyatra vā hetuḥ syāt sādhyam api kasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2339: na iṣyate / tat kila evaṃ prasādhyamānaṃ viśeṣībhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2340: na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhāyituṃ śakyate ananvayāt / yathā āha pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2341: viśeṣayā ajñānād iti / so ayaṃ viśeṣo na sādhya eva vyāhanyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2342: kiṃ tarhi / hetāv api tulya-doṣatvāt / na hi hetur ananvayaḥ siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:2343: aṅgaṃ tataḥ saṃśayāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2345: na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syād aniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam //188//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2346: na sarvathā sattā-sādhane viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavati / bhāva-mātra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2347: viśeṣaṇo asti kaścid dharmī iti prasādhayato anirdiṣṭa-svabhāva-viśeṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2348: kasyacit sattā-mātre virodha-abhāvāt na iha sattā-sādhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2349: pratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu sa tathā asti kaścid iti kaṃcana asya bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2350: aparāmṛśan bruvāṇaḥ kaṃ svārthaṃ puṣṇāti / tasmād anena upātta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2352: upātta-bhede sādhye asmin bhavad hetur ananvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2353: sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet //189//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2354: sa hi dharmī pradhāna-lakṣaṇa eko nityaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmako anyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2355: vā iti yathākathaṃcid api viśeṣitas tat-svabhāvaḥ prasādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2356: sa ca tathā na anveti / yad api sattā-mātram anveti na tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2357: siddhena kiṃcit / nanv evam agny-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2358: na agni-sattā-mātre kaścid vivādaḥ / viśiṣṭa-ādhāra-viśeṣasya tv abhimatasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2359: ananvayād asiddhiḥ / na vai sa ādhāras taṃ viśeṣīkaroti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2360: tad-ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2362: na tathā iha api kvacit sattāyāḥ sādhanam / pradhāna-ādi-śabda-vācyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2363: eva arthasya kvacid abhāvān nirviśeṣaṇā eva sā / katham abhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2364: jñeya-abhidheya-prameyatvaiḥ so api siddha eva / tat kim idānīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2365: jñeyam asti iti siddhir astu / tathā api kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt / anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2366: tu tad eva agni-sāmānyaṃ tatra asiddham iti sādhyate / nanu tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2367: tad-ayoga-virahiṇā sāmānyena anvayo na siddha eva / na vai kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2368: tathā abhūtena anvayaṃ karoti / pratipādayatā hi paraṃ dhūmo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2369: agni-nāntarīyako darśanīyo yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti / sa tathā agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2370: mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatra eva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatra eva agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2371: buddhiṃ janayati / tatra ca sādhya-nirdeśena na kiṃcit / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2373: kathaṃ tad-viśiṣṭena anvayaḥ / tad ayam agninā avinābhāvī
SA15dhkpvsvu:2374: siddhaḥ / arthād eva agnes tat-pradeśa-ayogaṃ vyavacchinatti iti sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2375: tathā sādhya ucyate / na punas tathā asya upanyāsa-pūrvako anvayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2376: sādhya-ukter iha anaṅgatvāt / tat-pūrvakatve vā kaḥ pratijñāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2378: liṅgasya avyabhicāras tu dharmeṇa anyatra darśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2380: tasmān na agny-ādi-sādhana-vat sattā-sādhanam apy anavadyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2384: vyāpini sādhya-dharme na anvaya-vyāghātaḥ / na hi tatra avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2388: dharmo viruddho abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham //191//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2389: sattāyāṃ hi sādhyāyāṃ / sarvas tad-hetur na trayīṃ doṣa-jātim
SA15dhkpvsvu:2390: atipatati / asiddhiṃ vyabhicāraṃ virodhaṃ ca / tatra yadi bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2391: dharmo hetur ucyate / sa katham asiddha-sattāke syāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2392: bhāva-dharmaṃ tatra icchati / sa kathaṃ bhāvaṃ na icchet / svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2393: eva hi kayācid apekṣayā dharma iti vyatirekī iva dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2394: nirdiśyate / na hi dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2395: viśeṣo asti ity uktam etat / atha punar ubhaya-dharmaṃ brūyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2396: anāśrita-vastuno aparyudāsena vyatireka-mātrasya abhāve apy avirodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2397: yathā na bhavati mūrta iti amūrtatvaṃ nirupākhye api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2398: syāt / nirupākhyasya abhāvād na pratiṣedha-viṣayatā iti cet / tat kim
SA15dhkpvsvu:2399: idānīṃ vidhi-viṣayo astu / tad api na iti cet / katham idānīṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2401: etad vyavaccheda-mātraṃ dvayor api sambhavad vipakṣa-pracāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2403: kuryāt / sa ca svayaṃ sva-vāca-ubhaya-dharmatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2404: anyatra apy asya vṛttiṃ bhāṣate sattāyāṃ ca avyabhicāram iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2405: kathaṃ na unmattaḥ / abhāva-dharmaṃ tu bhāva-mātra-vyāpino
SA15dhkpvsvu:2406: arthasya vyavacchedaṃ hetuṃ sattāyāṃ vadato asya viruddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2407: hetuḥ syāt / tasya bhāve kvacid asambhavāt abhāve ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2408: vyavacchedasya bhāvāt / tad ayaṃ triprakāro api dharmaḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2409: sādhane na hetu-lakṣaṇa-bhāk na ca anyā gatir asti / tasmān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2410: sattā sādhyate / sādhanatve punar asyāḥ sāmānyena tan-mātra-vyāpini
SA15dhkpvsvu:2411: vastu-dharme siddha-sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ / tena ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2412: sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptir yadi kathaṃcin niścīyate na virodha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2413: vyabhicārāv iti na ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ / aniścitāyāṃ tu vyāptau dharmi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2414: samāśraye vā tat-svabhāvatayā gamako na kaścid gamakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2417: vācyaḥ / na hi prakāśatayā prakāśayan pradīpas tad-rūpa-apratipattau
SA15dhkpvsvu:2421: tad-dharma-niścayād eva niścito vyāpakatvena tasya dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2424: tasya vyāpyasya dharmasya ayaṃ nivartako vyāpako dharmaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2425: svayaṃ nirvartamānaḥ / evaṃ hy ayam asya vyāpakaḥ siddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2426: bhavati yady asya abhāve na bhavet / tad anena dvividhasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2428: hi prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca / yathā āhur
SA15dhkpvsvu:2429: eke anvayī vyatirekī ca iti / na anayor vastutaḥ kaścid bhedo anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2430: prayoga-bhedāt / sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2431: gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvaya-abhāvāt / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2432: vaidharmye apy anvaya-gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya-abhāve hetv-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2434: anityatve yathā kāryam akāryaṃ vā avināśini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2435: anena udāharaṇam anayor darśayati / tatra anvayī yat kiṃcit kṛtakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2436: tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ śabdaś ca kṛtaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:2437: iti kṛtakatvasya apy anityatvena vyāptiṃ pradarśya śabdas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2438: kṛtakatve kathite sāmarthyād eva anityaḥ śabda iti / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2439: na avaśyam iha pakṣa-nirdeśa iti / ayam anvayinaḥ prayogaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2440: vyatireke api na anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ bhavati śabdaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:2441: kṛtaka iti / siddha-tat-svabhāvatayā tad-abhāve na bhavataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2442: kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva-khyātau tadātmanaḥ sato bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2443: sāmarthyāt siddheḥ pūrvavān na pratijñā-vacanam / anvayas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2444: arthāpattyā siddhaḥ / na hy atadātma-niyatasya tan-nivṛttau
SA15dhkpvsvu:2445: nivṛttiḥ / tasmāt tan-niyamaṃ prasādhya nivṛttir vaktavyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2446: sā cet sidhyati tadātma-niyamam arthāt sūcayati iti siddho anvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2447: katham idānīṃ kṛtako avaśyam anitya iti pratyetavyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2450: na hi bhāvā vinaśyantas tad-bhāve hetum apekṣante / sva-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:2451: eva vinaśvarāṇāṃ bhāvāt / tasmād yaḥ kaścit kṛtakaḥ sa prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2453: sāpekṣāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ na avaśyaṃbhāvitā īkṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2454: nirapekṣo bhāvo vināśe / sāpekṣatve hi ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ keṣāṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:2456: bāhulye api hi tad-hetor bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ //194//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2457: yady api bahulaṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva-pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2458: adhīna-saṃnidhitvān na avaśyaṃ saṃnidhānam iti kaścin na vinaśyed
SA15dhkpvsvu:2459: api / na hy avaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanto vaikalya-pratibandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2463: ity antaraślokaḥ / tad ayaṃ bhāvo anapekṣas tad-bhāvaṃ prati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2465: kārya-utpādane / nanv anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcit kvacin na avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2467: na tatra api santānapariṇāma-apekṣatvāt / na evaṃ bhāvasya kācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2468: apekṣā / tatra apy antyā kāraṇa-sāmagrī yā avyavahitā kārya-utpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2469: sā phalavaty eva / sa eva ca tatra aṅkura-hetuḥ / anyas tu pūrvaḥ pariṇāmas
SA15dhkpvsvu:2470: tad-artha eva / na ca tāṃ tatra kaścit pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2471: ekatra bhāve vikāra-anutpatteḥ / utpattau vā ekatva-hāneḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2472: tadātmanaś ca apracyutasya tad-utpādanaṃ prati vaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2474: yava-bīja-ādayo api śāly-aṅkure janye na sāpekṣāḥ / tadutpatti-pratyayānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2475: kadācit tatra api saṃnidhānāt / kathaṃ na sāpekṣāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2476: yāvatā sa eva eṣāṃ svabhāvo na asti yas tad-utpādanaḥ śāli-bījasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2477: iti tat-svabhāva-apekṣāḥ / evaṃ tarhi kṛtakānām api keṣāṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2478: satāṃ vā sa eva svabhāvo na asti yo vinaśvaraḥ / tasmāt tat-svabhāva-apekṣatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2479: na vinaśvarāḥ / śāli-bīja-ādīnām api sa svabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2480: sva-hetor iti yo na tad-hetuḥ so atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt / niyata-śaktiś
SA15dhkpvsvu:2481: ca sa hetuḥ svarūpeṇa pratīta eva / na ca svabhāva-niyamo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2483: ayogāt tathā atra api niyama-hetur vaktavyo yata ime kecin
SA15dhkpvsvu:2484: naśvara-ātmano jātā na ca atra kaścin niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2485: sarva-janmināṃ vināśa-siddheḥ / janmi-svabhāvo nāśī iti cet / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:2486: janma nāśi-svabhāvasya hetuḥ na ca ahetoḥ svabhāva-niyamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2487: tasmān na atra kaścid hetoḥ svabhāva-pravibhāgaḥ / tad-abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2488: phalasya api na asti ity asamānam / sā iyaṃ nirapekṣatā vināśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2489: kvacit kadācic ca bhāva-virodhinī tad-abhāvaṃ svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2490: sādhayati / yo hi svabhāvo nirapekṣaḥ sa yadi kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2491: bhavet kvacid vā tat-kāla-dravya-apekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2492: syād ity uktam / sa tarhi naśvaraḥ svabhāvo nirapekṣa iti ahetukaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2493: syāt / na ahetukaḥ sattā-hetor eva bhāvāt tathā-utpatteḥ / sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2494: hi bhavatas tādṛśasya eva bhāvāt / na avaśyaṃ sataḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2495: bhāva iti cet / ākasmikī tarhi sattā iti / na iyaṃ kasyacit kadācit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2496: kvacit viramet / tad hi kiṃcid upalīyeta na vā yasya yatra kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2497: pratibaddham apratibaddhaṃ vā / sā iyaṃ sattā apratibandhinī cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2498: niyamavatī na syāt / tasmān na iyam ākasmikī kvacit / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2499: tarhi idānīm ahetuko vināśa uktaḥ / jātasya tad-bhāve anya-anapekṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2500: uktaṃ ca atra na vināśo nāma anya eva kaścid bhāvāt svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2501: eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hy eka-kṣaṇa-sthāyī jāta iti / tam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2502: mandāḥ svabhāvam ūrdhvaṃ vyavasyanti na prāk darśane api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2503: pāṭava-abhāvād iti tad-vaśena paścād vyavasthāpyate vikāra-darśanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2504: iva viṣam ajñaiḥ / tad ayaṃ sattā-vyatirekeṇa na anyat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2505: vināśo apekṣata iti tad-vyāpī / kathaṃ punar etad gamyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:2508: abhāva-kāriṇaḥ kriyā-pratiṣedhāc ca iti ca-śabdāt / katham asāmarthyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2509: siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti / na apy anya-kriyāyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2510: tasya kiṃcid iti / tad-atad-rūpa-akaraṇāc ca akiṃcitkaro na apekṣyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:2511: iti / kathaṃ kriyā-pratiṣedho vināśa iti hi te bhāva-abhāvaṃ manyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2512: tad ayaṃ vināśa-hetur abhāvaṃ karoti iti prāptam / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2513: yady abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2514: na abhāvaḥ syāt / tasmād abhāvaṃ karoti iti bhāvaṃ na karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2515: kriyā-pratiṣedho asya kṛtaḥ syāt / tathā apy ayam akiṃcitkaraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2516: kim iti apekṣyata iti siddhā vināśaṃ praty anapekṣayā bhāvasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2519: yatra nāma bhavaty asmād anyatra api svabhāvataḥ //196//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2520: so ayaṃ kvacid bhavan dṛṣṭo anapekṣatvāt svabhāvata eva bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2521: tathā anyatra api svabhāva-bhāvī viśeṣa-abhāvād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2522: yā kācid bhāva-viṣayā dvidhā eva anumitis tataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2524: tasmāt dviprakārā eva vastu-viṣaya-anumitiḥ kārya-liṅgā svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2525: liṅgā ca / yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhye tayor eva pratibandhāt liṅgayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:2529: tṛtīyas tu hetur anupalabdhir aviśeṣeṇa kvacid arthe gamaka ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2530: ucyate / san-niścaya-śabda-vyavahāra-pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2532: te pravṛttir ity uktāḥ / tathā hy anupalabdhir eva asattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2533: ity uktam prāk / tac ca pratipattṛ-vaśān na vastu-vaśāt / tāvad hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2534: sa bhāvo asya na asti yāvad atra apratipattiḥ / satā api te na tad-artha-akaraṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2535: vastutas tv anupalabhyamāno na san na asan / satām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2536: api svabhāva-ādi-viprakarṣāt kadācid anupalambhāt tasya asatsv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2537: tulyatvāt / tad etat pratipattuḥ pramāṇa-abhāvān nivṛttaṃ sattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2539: tena yā api iyam anupalabdhir upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2540: vastuto apy asattva-rūpā apravṛtti-yogyatvāt / tasyā apy etat tulyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2541: prāmāṇyam atra viṣaye / asan-niścaya-phalā api sā / asattāyām api iyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2542: pramāṇam eva / na hy asti sambhavo yad upalabdhi-yogyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2543: sakaleṣv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san na upalabhyeta / na punaḥ pūrvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2546: aliṅgāś ca kathaṃ teṣām abhāvo anupalabdhitaḥ //199//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2547: so ayam asattāṃ sādhayann anupalabdhi-mātreṇa sarva-arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2548: pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttyā sādhayet / tatra na śāstra-nivṛttir abhāva-sādhanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2549: tasya kvacid anadhikāre apravṛtteḥ / śāstraṃ hi pravartamānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2551: anyathā abaddha-pralāpasya aprāmāṇyāt / tatra ca prakaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2552: bahavo arthā na avaśyaṃ nirdeśyāḥ / yathā pratyātma-niyatāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2554: kāla-vyavahitā vā prakaraṇa-anupayogino dravya-viśeṣā na tān
SA15dhkpvsvu:2555: śāstraṃ viṣayīkaroti / na ca tathā viprakṛṣṭeṣu sva-sāmarthya-upadhānāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:2556: jñāna-utpādana-śaktir asti / na ca avaśyam eṣāṃ kārya-upalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2557: yena anumīyeran / na ca te pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttāv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2558: na santi iti śakyante vyavasātum / tasmān na sarva-anupalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2560: sad-asan-niścaya-phalā na iti syād vā apramāṇatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2561: na eva vā iyam anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇaṃ vyavasāya-phalatvāt pramāṇānām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2562: na hi pravṛtti-niṣedhe api iyaṃ niḥśaṅka-paricchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2563: cetaḥ karoti / saṃśayād api kvacil lokasya pravṛtteḥ / tathātve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2564: tan niravadyaṃ yadi niścaya-pūrvaṃ vyavahared iti sā iyam apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2567: atra na sarva-anupalabdhir apramāṇam / pramāṇam api kācil liṅga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2568: viśeṣa-bhāvinī yathā-udāhṛtā prāk / yat punar uktam apramāṇam anupalabdhir iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2570: yasya kasyacit svabhāvo na upalabhyate deśa-ādi-viprakarṣāt na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2571: sa tad-anupalambha-mātreṇa asan nāma yathoktaṃ prāk / yo api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2572: jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvād atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2573: viśeṣo vā yathā na asti viraktaṃ ceto devatā-viśeṣo vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2574: na asti dāna-hiṃsā-virati-cetanānām abhyudaya-hetutā iti pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2575: apy arthe phalasya ānantarya-abhāvād atat-phala-sādharmyād viparyasto
SA15dhkpvsvu:2576: apavadeta api na tāvatā tad-abhāva eva vyavahitānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2579: bhāve kiṃ pramāṇam iti cet / ata eva saṃśayo astu bhaved
SA15dhkpvsvu:2580: vā pramāṇam ity apratikṣepaḥ / tad atra keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2582: niyama-abhāvāc ca bhavej jñāpaka-asiddhiḥ / neyatā tad-abhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2584: kārye tu kāraka-ajñānam abhāvasya eva sādhakam //201//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2585: svabhāva-abhāve sādhye tad-anupalambha eva apramāṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2586: kāraka-anupalambhas tu pramāṇam eva / na hy asti sambhavo yad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2587: asati kāraṇe kāryaṃ syāt / nanu kadācit kāraṇa-nāśe api kārya-sthitir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2588: dṛṣṭā / na brūmaḥ kāraṇa-sthiti-kāla-bhāvī kāryam iti / hetu-rahitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2589: tu bhāva-utpattir na asti ity ucyate / na ca tathā sthāyī bhāvas tad-upādānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2591: yady asya kathaṃcid abhāvaḥ sidhyet tat-phalaṃ na asti iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2593: svabhāva-abhāva eva liṅgini svabhāva-anupalambho api kaścit pramāṇam eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2594: eva yady anupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvo asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2597: yady asya kāraṇasya svabhāvasya vyāpakasya vā abhāvaḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:2598: gamakād hetoḥ sidhyet / so ayaṃ asan eva sva-kāryaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2599: vyāpyaṃ vā nivartayati / tad-abhāva-asiddhau nivartye api saṃśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2600: katham idānīṃ bhāvasya svayam anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2604: bhāvo hi yadi bhaved yathāsvaṃ grāhakeṇa karaṇena upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2605: eva bhavet / sa darśana-pratibandhiṣu vyavadhāna-ādiṣv asatsu upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2606: eva / anupalabdhas tv asann iti niścīyate / tādṛśaḥ sata
SA15dhkpvsvu:2607: upalambha-avyabhicārāt / ayam eva hetur hetu-vyāpakayor abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2611: yo hi bhāvo yena saha na avatiṣṭhate tad-upādānayor anyonya-vaiguṇya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2612: āśrayatvena ārambha-virodhāt tayor viruddhayor ekasya bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2613: apy anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati yathoktaṃ prāk / idam anupalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:2614: na pṛthag vyavasthāpyate / tata eva virodha-gater virodhāc ca abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2615: sādhanāt / bhavatu nāma evaṃvidhāyā anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2616: gatiḥ / sā punaḥ katham anumānam / kathaṃ ca na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2617: dṛṣṭānta-anapekṣaṇāt / na hy asyāṃ kaścid dṛṣṭānto asti / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2618: na nirupākhyaṃ vyomakusuma-ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ / tad asat katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:2619: avagantavyaṃ yena evaṃ syāt / anupalabdher eva iti cet / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2620: katham adṛṣṭāntikā asattā-siddhiḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vā anavasthā-prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2622: anyatra api dṛṣṭānta-anapekṣaṇād ananumānam / śṛṇvann api devānāṃpriyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2625: etān sādhayati iti sva-nimitta-sāmagrī-yogya-saṃnidhānaḥ sarvo atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:2626: dṛṣṭāntaḥ / asattā punar atra anupalabdhir eva / ata eva iyaṃ kāraṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2629: nimitta-vaikalya-abhāvino aṅkura-ādayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevalaṃ nirupākhyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2630: nirupākhye api iyam eva pravṛttir niṣidhyate / anupalabdhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2631: lakṣaṇā asattā siddhā eva / so ayaṃ mūḍho nimittaṃ tad-abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2632: vā abhyupagamya pravṛtti-nivṛttī vilomayan yathā abhyupagamaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2633: pratipādyate nirupākhya-vad anya-vad vā iti / sa eva tāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2634: upalabdhy-abhāvaḥ kathaṃ siddha iti cet / etad uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2635: anyatra apy anumāne sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptaṃ sādhanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2636: icchan kim iti dṛṣṭāntena pratyāyyo vyāpya-nirdeśād eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2637: vyāpnuvataḥ siddheḥ / niścita-arthasya api smṛty-artho dṛṣṭānta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2638: cet / tad itaratra api samānaṃ / so ayam anyatra anupalambha-mātrād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2639: asad-vyavahāraṃ pratipadyamāno api iha vyāmūḍha iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2640: smāryate / atha yad idaṃ na santi pradhāna-ādayo anupalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:2642: vā / kathaṃ ca na syāt / tad-artha-pratiṣedhe dharmi-vācino aprayogād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2643: abhidhānasya nirviṣayasya ca pratiṣedhasya ayogāt / na eṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2648: tathā hetur na tasya eva abhāvaḥ śabda-prayogataḥ //206//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2649: niveditam etat yathā na ete śabdāḥ svalakṣaṇa-viṣayā anādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2651: kurvanti vaktuḥ śrotus ca tad-vikalpa-bhājo yathāpratibhāsi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2653: na ca upādāna-kārya-pratyaya-apratibhāsi rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tad-viṣayatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2656: ca bhāva-abhāva-ubhaya-dharma ity ucyate / tad atra dharmiṇi vyavasthitāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2658: artho bhāva-upādāno na vā iti / tasya bhāva-anupādānatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2659: sādhye sa eva pratyātma-vedyatvād apratikṣepa-arho artho dharmī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2660: na ca sa eva arthaḥ svalakṣaṇam iti śakyaṃ vaktum / asamprāpta-niruddhayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:2665: atīta-ajātayor vā api na ca syād anṛta-arthatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2666: vācaḥ kasyāścid ity eṣā bauddha-artha-viṣayā matā //208//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2667: iti saṃgrahaślokau / tasya ca yathā samīhita-rūpa-anupādānatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2668: sādhye tathā anupalambho asya dharmo asti iti na sādhana-dharma-asiddhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2669: na punar atra ayam eva śabda-vikalpa-pratibhāsy artho apahnūyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2673: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddho dharmaś ca kevalaḥ //209//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2674: yadi hi śabda-artha eva apohyeta pradhāna-śabda-vācyasya dharmiṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2675: eva nirākaraṇān nirādhāraḥ sādhya-dharmaḥ syāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2676: ādhāra-vyavaccheda-anapekṣo na vivāda-āśraya iti na upanyasanīya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2679: vastv eva cintyate hy atra pratibaddhaḥ phala-udayaḥ //210//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2682: na hi śabda-artho asan san vā kaṃcit puruṣa-artham uparuṇaddhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:2683: samādadhāti vā / yathā abhiniveśam atattvāt / yathā atattvaṃ ca asamīhitatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2685: avadhīrita-vikalpa-pratibhāso vastv eva adhiṣṭhānīkaroti yatra ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2686: puruṣa-arthaḥ pratibaddho yathā agnau śīta-pratīkāra-ādiḥ / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:2687: atra śabda-arthaḥ samarthas tad-anubhava-āptāv api tad-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2688: tad ayam arthakriyā-arthī tad-asamarthaṃ prati dattā-anuyogo bhavituṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2689: na yuktaḥ / na hi vṛṣasyantī ṣaṇḍhasya rūpa-vairūpya-parīkṣāyām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2690: avadhatte / yat punar etad uktaṃ kalpitasya anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2694: kalpanā-viṣayatvāc śabda-artha eva kalpitaḥ / tasya vastv -āśraya-anupalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2695: dharma ity abhiprāyaḥ / yad uktam na pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2696: traya-nivṛttāv api bhāva-abhāva-siddhir iti / tan mā bhūd anya-pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2697: anivṛttau nivṛttiḥ / tayor asakala-viṣayatvād āgamaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:2698: na kiṃcin na vyāpnoti / tan-nivṛttiḥ kathaṃ na gamikā iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2699: atra na āgameṣu sarva-arthā upanibadhyante aprakaraṇa-āpannatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2702: na artha-siddhis tatas te hi vaktṛ-abhiprāya-sūcakāḥ //213//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2703: na hi śabdā yathābhāvaṃ vartante yatas tebhyo artha-prakṛtir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2704: niścīyeta / te hi vaktur vivakṣā-vṛttaya iti tan-nāntarīyakās
SA15dhkpvsvu:2705: tām eva gamayeyuḥ / na ca puruṣa-icchāḥ sarvā yathārtha-bhāvinyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2706: na ca tad-apratibaddha-svabhāvo bhāvo anyaṃ gamayati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2707: yat tarhi idam āpta-vāda-avisaṃvāda-sāmānyād anumānatā ity āgamasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2708: prāmāṇyam anumānatvam uktam tat kathaṃ / na ayaṃ puruṣo anāśritya āgama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2711: adarśanāc ca / tat sati pravartitavye varam evaṃ pravṛtta
SA15dhkpvsvu:2712: iti parīkṣayā prāmāṇyam āha / tac ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2716: vākyānām iva anupasaṃhāra eva / anyathā vaktur vaiguṇyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2717: udbhāvayet / aśakya-upāya-phalāni ca śāstrāṇi phala-arthī na ādriyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:2721: śāstraṃ parīkṣyeta anyatra avadhānasya eva ayuktatvāt / tad yadi na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2722: parīkṣāyāṃ visaṃvāda-bhāk pravartamānaḥ śobheta / kaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:2732: yathā ātma-ādīnām / āgama-apekṣa-anumāne api yathā rāga-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2733: rūpaṃ tat-prabhavaṃ ca adharmam abhyupagamya tat-prahāṇāya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2737: buddher agatyā abhihitā parokṣe apy asya gocare //216//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2738: tasya ca asya evaṃbhūtasya āpta-bhūtasya avisaṃvāda-sāmānyād adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2741: tataḥ śabda-prabhavā api satī na śābda-vad abhiprāyaṃ nivedayaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:2742: eva ity artha-avisaṃvādād anumānam api / athavā anyathā āpta-vādasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2747: yathā catūrṇām āryasatyānāṃ vakṣyamāṇanītyā / tasya asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2749: api tathātva-upagamo na vipralambhāya anuparodhāt niṣprayojana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2750: vitatha-abhidhāna-vaiphalyāc ca vaktuḥ / tad etad agatyā ubhayathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2751: apy anumānatvam āgamasya upavarṇitam / varam āgamāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2752: pravṛttāv evaṃ pravṛttir iti / na khalv evam anumānam anapāyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2753: anāntarīyakatvād artheṣu śabdānām iti niveditam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2757: iṣṭo ayam arthaḥ śakyeta jñātuṃ so atiśayo yadi //218//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2758: sarve eva āgamam anāgamaṃ vā pravṛtti-kāmo anveṣate prekṣā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2759: pūrva-kārī na vyasanena / api nāma anuṣṭheyam ato jñātvā pravṛtto
SA15dhkpvsvu:2760: arthavān syām iti / sa śakya-darśana-avisaṃvāda-pratyayena anyatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:2762: tu pravṛttāv apravṛttir eva / tasya tathābhūtasya jñātum
SA15dhkpvsvu:2763: aśakyatvāt na aniṣṭeḥ / tādṛśām avitatha-abhidhānāt / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2764: ayam evaṃ na vā ity anya-doṣa-anirdoṣatā api vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2765: durlabhatvāt pramāṇānāṃ durbodhā ity apare viduḥ //219//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2768: syuḥ / vyavahārāś ca prāyaśo buddhi-pūrvam anyathā api kartuṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2770: tad ayaṃ liṅga-saṃkarāt katham aniścinvan pratipadyeta / atha
SA15dhkpvsvu:2771: kiṃ na eva sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣo asti yo nirdoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2773: sa ātmībhāvāt tad-abhyāsād dhīyeran āśravāḥ kvacit //220 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2774: sa tu prahīṇa-āśravo durjñānaḥ / doṣā hi nirhrāsa-atiśaya-dharmaṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2776: vikalpa-prabhavāḥ saty apy upādāne kasyacin mano-guṇasya abhyāsād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2778: syuḥ / jvālā-ādi-vad eva / tena syād api nirdoṣaḥ / kathaṃ nirdoṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2779: nāma / yāvatā doṣa-vipakṣa-sātmatve api doṣa-sātmano vipakṣa-utpatti-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2780: yathā-pratyayaṃ doṣa-utpattir api / na ayaṃ doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2782: na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat-pakṣa-pātataḥ //221 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2783: na hi svabhāvo ayatnena vinivartayituṃ śakyaḥ / śrotriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2785: guṇa-doṣa-darśanena kriyeta / tac ca vipakṣa-sātmanaḥ puruṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2786: doṣeṣu na sambhavati / tasya nirupadravatvāt / aśeṣa-doṣa-hāneḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2788: rasasya anudvejanāc ca / abhūta-arthaṃ khalv apy upādāna- bala-bhāvi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2789: santānasya viparyaya-upādānān na syāt / na tu bhūta-artham vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2790: bala-utpatteḥ / abhūta-arthāś ca doṣā na pratipakṣa-sātmya-bādhinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2791: tasmān na punar doṣa-utpattiḥ / yatne api buddher guṇa-pakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2792: pātena pratipakṣa eva yatna-ādhānāt parīkṣāvato viśeṣeṇa aduṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2793: ātmanaḥ / kaḥ punar eṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ prabhavo yat-pratipakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2796: sā avidyā tatra tat-snehas tasmād dveṣa-ādi-sambhavaḥ //222 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2797: na hi na ahaṃ na mama iti paśyataṃ parigraham antareṇa kvacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2798: snehaḥ / na ca ananurāgiṇaḥ kvacid dveṣaḥ / ātma-ātmīya-anuparodhiny
SA15dhkpvsvu:2800: ātma-darśanam ātmīya-grahaṃ prasūte / tau ca tat-snehaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2801: sa ca dveṣa-ādīni iti satkāyadarśanajāḥ sarva-doṣāḥ / tad eva ca ajñānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2803: moho nidānaṃ doṣāṇām ata eva abhidhīyate//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2805: mohaṃ doṣa-nidānam āhuḥ amūḍhasya doṣa-anutpatteḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:2806: anyatra satkāyadṛṣṭim / tac ca etat pradhāna-nirdeśe sati syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2807: aneka-janmanāṃ doṣāṇām eka-utpatti-virodhāt / na ca dvayoḥ prādhānye
SA15dhkpvsvu:2809: nirdeśe na virodhaḥ / prādhānyaṃ punas tad-upādānatvena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2810: tat-prahāṇe doṣāṇāṃ prahāṇāt / tasmāt sambhavati satkāyadarśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2812: prahāṇam / sa tu kṣīṇa-doṣo duranvayo yad-upadeśād ayaṃ pratipadyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2813: mā bhūt puruṣa-āśrayaṃ vacanam āgamaḥ praṇetur
SA15dhkpvsvu:2817: na khalu sarva eva āgamaḥ sambhāvya-vipralambhaḥ / vipralambha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2818: hetūnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ puruṣa-āśrayād apauruṣeyaṃ satya-artham ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:2819: eke / kāraṇa-abhāvo hi kārya-abhāvaṃ sādhayati iti / ya evaṃvādinas
SA15dhkpvsvu:2822: apauruṣeyaṃ mithyā-arthaṃ kiṃ na ity anye pracakṣate //225 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2823: yathā rāga-ādi-parītaḥ puruṣo mṛṣā-vādī dṛṣṭas tathā dayā-dharmatā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2824: ādi-yuktaḥ satya-vāk / tad yathā vacanasya puruṣa-āśrayān mithyā-arthatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2825: tathā satya-arthatā api iti / sa nivartamānas tām api nivartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:2826: ity ānarthakyaṃ syād viparyayo vā / na hi śabdāḥ prakṛtyā arthavantaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2830: arthavantaḥ syuḥ / tat-saṃskāryatā eva ca eṣāṃ pauruṣeyatā yuktā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2831: na utpattiḥ / tata eva artha-vipralambhāt / utpanno apy anyathā samito
SA15dhkpvsvu:2832: na uparodhī tad-anya-puruṣa-dharma-vat / tad ayaṃ nivartamānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2834: tat kutas tan-nivṛttyā satya-arthatā / atha punar utpattir eva pauruṣeyatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2838: kiṃ hy asya apauruṣeyatayā yato hi samayād artha-pratipattiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2839: sa pauruṣeyo vitatho api syāt / śīla-sādhana-svarga-vacanaṃ tad anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2840: samayena viparyāsayet / tena ayathārtham api prakāśana-sambhavāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2843: syād etad akārya-sambandhā eva śabdāḥ / na te artheṣu puruṣair
SA15dhkpvsvu:2844: anyathā viparyasyante / tena adoṣa iti / kim idānīṃ saṃketena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2845: sa hi sambandho yato artha-pratītiḥ / sa ced apauruṣeyo na ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2846: samayam apekṣeta / apratīty-āśrayo vā kathaṃ sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2848: na vai sambandho vidyamāno apy anabhivyaktaḥ pratīti-hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2849: saṃketas tv enam abhivyanakti / sa tarhi siddha-upasthāyī kim
SA15dhkpvsvu:2850: akāraṇaṃ poṣyate / nanv iyān sambandhasya vyāpāro yad artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2851: pratīti-jananam / tat samayena eva kṛtam iti / na ayogye samayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2852: samartha iti yogyatā tat-sambandhaś cet / tat kiṃ vai śabdaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2853: sambandho astu / samarthaṃ hi rūpaṃ śabdasya yogyatā kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2854: kāraṇa-yogyatā-vat / sā ced artha-antaraṃ kiṃ śabdasya iti sambandho
SA15dhkpvsvu:2855: vācyaḥ / yogyatā-upakāra iti cet / na / nityāyāḥ niratiśayatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2856: tatra apy atiprasaṅgāt upakāra-asiddheḥ / yogyatāyāṃ ca svato yogyatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:2857: artha eva kiṃ na iṣyate / samayas tarhi kathaṃ śabda-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2858: sambandhāḥ / puruṣeṣu vṛtteḥ / na amiśrāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:2860: apreritā vāg ata idam iti viduṣaḥ sva-nidāna-ābhāsinam arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2861: sūcayati iti buddhi-rūpa-vāg vijñaptyor janyajanakabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2864: na tu sa eva sambandhaḥ / astu vā anya eva nityaḥ sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2866: girām eka-artha-niyame na syād artha-antare gatiḥ//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2867: na hi tena sambandhena asambaddhe arthe pratītir yuktā / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2868: vaiphalya-prasaṅgāt / dṛṣṭaś ca icchā-vaśāt kṛta-samayaḥ sarvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2871: atha mā bhūd dṛṣṭa-virodha iti sarve sarvasya vācakāḥ / tathā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:2872: sarvaḥ sarva-sādhano asaṃkarāt kāryakāraṇatāyāḥ / tatra pratiniyata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2874: śabdasya-iṣṭa-vyaktim eva samayakāraḥ karoti iti kuta etat so aniyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:2877: api nāma asaṃkīrṇam arthaṃ jānīyām iti saṃkara-hetuḥ puruṣa-upākīrṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2878: tatra yādṛśāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacit prayuktāḥ saṃkīryante
SA15dhkpvsvu:2879: tādṛśā eva sarva-sādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ kvacit tair viniyamitās
SA15dhkpvsvu:2880: tattva-aparijñānāt / prakṛtyā eva vaidikā niyatā iti cet / na upadeśam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2881: apekṣeran na anyathā saṃketena prakāśayeyuḥ vyākhyā-vikalpaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:2882: ca na syāt / upadeśasya ca iṣṭa-saṃvādaḥ śakya-vikalpe na asti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:2884: vācyaś ca hetur bhinnānāṃ sambandhasya vyavasthiteḥ //229 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2885: arthā hi bāhyā na rūpaṃ śabdasya na śabdo arthānām / yena abhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2886: ātmatayā vyavasthā-bhede api nāntarīyakatā syāt / kṛtakatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2887: anityatva-vat / na apy ete vivakṣā-janmāno dhvanayo ajanmāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:2888: vā vivakṣā-vyaṅgyāḥ na artha-āyattāḥ / tataḥ katham idānīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2893: iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ / api ca / śabda-arthayoḥ sambandho nityo vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2894: syād anityo vā / yady anityaḥ puruṣa-icchā vṛttir avṛttir vā / apuruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2895: adhīnatve puruṣāṇāṃ yathā abhiprāyaṃ deśa-ādi-parāvṛttyā tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:2896: pratipādanaṃ na syāt / icchāyām apy anāyattasya kadācid ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2897: parvata-ādi-vat / ayam eva nityatve api doṣas tasya sthira-rūpasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2898: parāvṛtty-ayogād iti samaṃ sarva-avasthāne api iṣṭa-pratiniyama-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2899: tato viśeṣa-pratipattir na syād iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2900: icchā-vṛttau ca pauruṣeyatvam iti vipralambha-āśaṅkā / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2901: sambandhinām anityatvān na sambandhe asti nityatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2902: parāśrayo hi sambandho apratibandhe tayoḥ sambandhitā ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2903: sa ca āśrayo anityaḥ / apāye asya sambandhasya apy apāyaḥ anyathā anāśritaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2904: syāt / tato na nityaḥ / tad-āśraya-arthaś ca vaktavyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2905: nityasya anupakāryatvāt / anupakurvāṇaś ca anāśrayaḥ / jāter vācyatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:2906: adoṣa iti cet / na / tad-vacane prayojana-abhāvād iti nirloṭhitam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2907: etat / sarvatra ca jāty-asambhavād ayogo yādṛcchikeṣu vyakti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2909: ca / tasmād anvaya-vyatirekiṇo bhāvasya bhāva-abhāvau sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2910: arthair ataḥ sa śabdānāṃ saṃskāryaḥ puruṣair dhiyā //231 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2911: tāv eva bhāva-abhāvāv āśritya-asaṃsṛṣṭāv api saṃsṛṣṭāv iva puruṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2913: saṃśleṣaḥ / kiṃ ca āśraya-vināśān naṣṭe sambandhe sa śabdaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:2914: asambandhatvān na apūrveṇa yojyeta / utpanna-utpannāś ca bhāvāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2921: atha mā bhūn naṣṭa-sambandhasya śabdasya artha-antare vaiguṇyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2922: arthānāṃ ca avācyatā ity utpanno arthaḥ sambandhavān yady utpadyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:2923: sa sambandha utpanno api na śabde syāt / tasya tena asambandhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2925: arthena saha utpannasya anyataḥ siddhasya anupakāriṇi śabde
SA15dhkpvsvu:2926: asamāśrayāc ca / tasya api tadutpatti-sahakāritve samarthasya nitya-utpādana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2931: sambandhaḥ / so ayam nityānām apy aparāvartayan svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2932: kutaścit svayam utprekṣya ghaṭayed iti te api tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2933: syuḥ / na ca cyavana-dharmāṇaḥ / yad uktam āśraya-apāyena āśrita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2935: nityatvād āśraya-apāye apy anāśo yadi jāti-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2936: nityeṣv āśraya-sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ yena iṣṭaḥ sa āśrayaḥ //233//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2937: śrūyata etan nityā jātir āśrayitā ca na apy āśrayeṇa saha naśyati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2938: kevalaṃ nityeṣv āśraya-sāmarthyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ yena asāv āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2939: kṛtasya karaṇa-abhāvād akārakasya ca anapekṣatvāt / vyaktir
SA15dhkpvsvu:2940: upakāro jāteḥ sambandhasya ca āśrayāt tena āśraya iti cet
SA15dhkpvsvu:2944: vyañjakaiḥ svaiḥ kutaḥ ko artho vyaktās tais te yato matāḥ //235 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2946: utpattir eva ghaṭa-ādīnām abhivyaktiḥ / anyathā anapekṣya tad-upakāraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2948: tasya ca tadātmakatvāt / arthāntaratve ca bhāva-anupakāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2949: prasaṅgāt sāmarthyāc ca jñāna-utpatter nityaṃ ghaṭa-ādīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:2952: tataḥ svabhāva-atiśayaṃ svīkurvanti / tena asya te janyāḥ / jñeya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2953: rūpa-asādhanāt tu jñāna-vaśena kārya-atiśaya-vācinā śabdena viśeṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2954: khyāty-arthaṃ vyaṅgyāḥ khyāpyante / na evaṃ jāti-sambandha-ādayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2955: kathaṃcid apy anupakāryatvād anupakāriṇā vyaktā yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2956: sambandhasya ca vastutve syād bhedād buddhi-citratā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2957: sa ca ayaṃ sambandho vastu bhavan niyamena śabda-arthābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:2958: bheda-abhedau na ativartate / rūpaṃ hi vastu / tasya atattvam eva anyattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2959: ity uktam / sa ca ayam aindriyaḥ san sva-buddhau tad-anya-vivekina-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2960: apratibhāsamāno rūpeṇa kathaṃ tathā syāt / dṛśya- aviveka-adarśanayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:2962: abhāva-prasaṅgāt / atīndriyatvād apratibhāse api indriya-ādiṣv iva adoṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:2963: iti cet / na / tato apratipatti-prasaṅgāt aprasiddhasya ajñāpakatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2965: na anumānāt pratipattir liṅga-abhāvāt dṛṣṭānta-asiddheś ca tatra apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:2966: atīndriyatvena sādhana-apekṣaṇāt / tulyam indriya-ādiṣv api iti cet / na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2967: teṣām anyathā-anumānāt / jñānaṃ hi keṣucit satsu vyatireka-anvaya-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:2969: tataḥ kārya-dvāreṇa indriya-siddhiḥ / na evaṃ sambandhasya / tasya asiddhau
SA15dhkpvsvu:2970: tat-kāryasya eva jñānasya abhāvāt / na hi tatra śabda-rūpam
SA15dhkpvsvu:2971: artho vā liṅgaṃ tayoḥ sarvatra yogyatvāt / viśeṣa-pratīti-samāśrayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2972: apratyāyanād apratītir asya / na hy asati sambandha-viśeṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:2973: sā yuktā / tasyāṃ vā animittāyāṃ tad-viśeṣa-pratīti-niyama-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:2974: artha-pratipādanam api śabdānām animittaṃ kiṃ na iṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2975: tat sadṛśaṃ liṅgaṃ sarva-sambandhe tato aviśeṣeṇa gamayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2976: tato aviśeṣeṇa eva pratītiḥ syāt sarvasya ca / tasmāt sambandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2977: siddhy-artha-pratīter na kaścit sampradāyam apekṣeta / sampradāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2978: sahitasya liṅgatvam iti cet / tat kim anayā paraṃparayā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2979: sa eva sampradāya-apekṣo artha-jñāpanaṃ kiṃ na karoti / sa ca śabdo
SA15dhkpvsvu:2980: yad abhiprāyaiḥ prayujyamāno dṛṣṭo anyathā na dṛṣṭo darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:2981: adarśanābhyāṃ dhūma-ādi-vat tat-pratītiṃ janayati iti sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2982: sambandho avinābhāva-ākhyaḥ / na ca atra anyasya sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2983: na api siddhy-upāyam / atha punar na śabda-arthayor anya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2985: tābhyām abhede tāv eva na ato anyā vastuno gatiḥ //236//
SA15dhkpvsvu:2987: syāt / dharma-bhedas tu syāt pūrva-ukta-krameṇa / sa ca aviruddha
SA15dhkpvsvu:2988: eva na vastu-bhedaḥ / na ca bheda-abhedau muktvā vastuno anyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:2989: gatiḥ / tasya rūpa-lakṣaṇatvād / rūpasya ca etad-vikalpa-anativṛtteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2992: ity uktaṃ prāk / na hi śleṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ sambandho aśliṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:2993: sambhavati / na ca artha-antaram eṣāṃ sambandhaḥ / yasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:2994: sad-dravyaṃ syāt para-adhīnaṃ sambandho anyasya vā katham //237 //
SA15dhkpvsvu:2995: na hi siddhaṃ sat param apekṣate / na anapekṣaḥ svatantraḥ sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2996: dravyam iti ca svabhāva ucyate / sa kathaṃ parabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:2997: śleṣaḥ syāt / na hi svabhāva-antara-sattayā anyaḥ śliṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:2998: mā bhūd aśliṣṭena śliṣṭena tu syād iti cet / na / tasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:2999: tābhyāṃ śleṣa-asiddheḥ sa eva asiddho yas tau śleṣayet / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3000: atiprasaṅgo yady arthāv artha-antareṇa śliṣyato viśeṣa-abhāvāt / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3003: avastuni kathaṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhasya asya vastunaḥ //238//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3004: vācako hi vacana-aṅgena tadvān syāt / santo apy avācakā varṇāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3005: tan na teṣu vācyavācakasambandhaḥ / tad-vṛttau svarūpa-hāni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3006: prasaṅgāt / krama-viśeṣeṇa vācakā varṇā iti cet / na / kramasya anartha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3007: antaratvena abhedakatvāt / tad-rūpasya krama-antare apy aviśeṣāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3008: tulyā syāt pratipattiḥ / arthāntaratvam api kramasya niṣetsyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3009: tad asati varṇānāṃ vācakatve pada-ādi vācakaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3010: tac ca na kiṃcid vyatireka-avyatireka-virodhāt / tasmād indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3012: padam / vākyaṃ ca eka-avabhāsi mithyā eva / eka-anekatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3013: ayogāt / na hy ekam / anekayā buddhyā krameṇa grahaṇa-ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3014: na ca tad ekayā grāhyaṃ varṇa-anukrama-grahaṇāt / eka-varṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3019: smṛtir api tat-kāla eva / anubhava-smaraṇa-anukramayor viśeṣa-anupalakṣaṇatvāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:3020: ca / na apy anekaṃ pada-ādi / abheda-pratibhāsanād buddhes
SA15dhkpvsvu:3021: tad-anekatvasya niṣetsyamānatvāc ca / tan na vastu / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3022: etad-vikalpa-anatikramāt / vastu ca sambandhaḥ / sa kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3023: tad-āśrayaḥ syāt / āśrayanīya-ayogāt / anāśrito hy evaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3024: tathā ca asambandhaḥ / tasmān na svābhāvikaḥ śabda-arthayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3026: vā śabdo tad-avyabhicārī iti tattvam asya sambandhaḥ / sā ca utpattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3027: abhivyaktir vā avyabhicāra-āśrayaḥ pauruṣeyī iti pauruṣeya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3028: sambandhas tad-dvāreṇa ca artha-pratyāyane aniyamaḥ śabdānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3029: ity apauruṣeyatve api sa eva vipralambhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3030: apauruṣeyatā api iṣṭā kartṛṛṇām asmṛteḥ kila /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3031: yā api iyam apauruṣeyatā veda-vākyānāṃ kartur asmaraṇād varṇyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3032: santy asya apy anuvaktāra iti dhig vyāpakaṃ tamaḥ //239//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3033: tasya eva tāvad īdṛśaṃ prajñā-skhalitaṃ kathaṃ vṛttam iti savismaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3034: anukampaṃ naś cetaḥ / tad apare apy anuvadanti iti nirdaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3035: ākrānta-bhuvanaṃ dhig vyāpakaṃ tamaḥ / kaḥ prāṇino hita-īpsā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3036: vipralabdhasya aparādhaḥ / tathā hi smaranti saugatā mantrāṇāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3037: kartṛṛn aṣṭaka-ādīn / hiraṇyagarbhaṃ ca kāṇādāḥ / teṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3038: sa mithyā-vāda iti cet / ka idānīm evaṃ pauruṣeyo anyo api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3039: kumārasambhava-ādiṣv ātmānam anyaṃ vā praṇetāram upadiśanto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3040: yad evaṃ prativyūhyeran / tatra prativahane abhyupeta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3041: bādhā iti cet / nanv idam eva abhyupagama-aṅgam iti kasya bādhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3042: tat parasya api tulyam eva / tasya iṣṭatvād adoṣa iti cet / kuto asya iyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3043: iṣṭir apramāṇikā prāg āsīt / akasmād grāhī ca ayaṃ kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3045: ātmānam āyāsayati / tata eva iṣṭer anabhyupeta-bādhāyāṃ tad-anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3046: api tulyam ity anupālambhaḥ / anatiśaya-darśī ca ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3048: vā kvacid atiśayam abhyupeta ity apratyaya eva asya vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3049: dṛśyante ca vicchinna-kriyā-sampradāyāḥ kṛtakāś ca / tān yatnavanta
SA15dhkpvsvu:3050: upalabhanta iti cet / na / niyama-abhāvāt / anyatra anupalambhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3054: yathā ayam anyato aśrutvā na imaṃ varṇa-pada-kramam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3055: vaktuṃ samarthaḥ puruṣas tathā anyo api iti kaścana //240//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3056: tasya api tad eva uttaram evam apauruṣeyatve api kim idānīṃ pauruṣeyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3058: anyo vā racito granthaḥ sampradāyād ṛte paraiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3059: dṛṣṭaḥ ko abhihito yena so apy evaṃ na anumīyate //241//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3060: na khalu kiṃcid anyad apauruṣeyatva-āśrayo anyatra idānīntanānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3061: anupadeśa-pāṭha-aśakteḥ / sā ca anyatra apy ekena racite granthe anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3062: tulyā / tad-anusāriṇā sarvas tathā unneyo na vā kaścit / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3063: tathā aniṣṭatvād ity ādāv apy uktam iṣṭes tad-āśrayatvād ity ādi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3065: yaj-jātīyo yataḥ siddhaḥ sa tasmād agni-kāṣṭha-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3067: na adarśanād hetur ahetuko nāma / adṛṣṭa-hetavo api hi bhāvās
SA15dhkpvsvu:3070: vyatikramān na tataḥ syād iti na kaścit tathā vacanīyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3071: rūpa-viśeṣo vā tathā darśanīyo ya enaṃ hetum anuvidadhyāt / yena iṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3072: aniṣṭayor iṣṭa-viparyayo na syāt / svabhāva-nivṛtteś ca hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3073: abhedane bhāvānāṃ bhedaḥ syād ākasmika iti na kvacid vinivarteta /
