SA15dhkpvsvu:3074: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvo yaj-janmā dṛṣṭaḥ so anyatra apy avibhajyamānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3078: yathā-adyo api pathika-kṛto agnir jvālā-antara-pūrvako na araṇi-nirmathana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3081: āśritya dahanasya hetv-antaraṃ pratikṣipyate / yadi hi vinā jvālayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3082: syād anyatra api syād iti / tatra jvālā-itara-janmanor abādhyabādhakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3083: jvālā-aprabhavatvam anyathā api syād iti dharmayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3084: ekatra arthe sambhavāt sa pathika-agnir anyo vā artha eka-pratiniyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3085: na syād ity āśaṅkyate vyabhicāraḥ / so apy anyonya-vyatirekī
SA15dhkpvsvu:3086: dharma-dvaya-avatāro vastu-sāmānye aviruddha ity ucyate na avasthā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3087: bhedini viśeṣe / niṣkalasya ātmanas tad-atattva-virodhāt / na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3090: jvālā-prabhava iti syāt / na sarvaḥ / tatra viśeṣa-pratikṣepasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3092: yad api vinā jvālayā syād anyatra api syād iti / bhavaty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3093: yayā sāmagryā sambhavati sā yadi syāt asyāḥ sambhavaṃ pradarśya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3094: tad-abhāvaṃ pradarśayet tatra vā jvālām syād etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3095: tasmān na ekasya para-pūrvakam adhyayanaṃ sarvasya tathābhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3097: tu tat-kriyā-pratibhā-rahitasya tathā syād iti / tathābhūtam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3098: evaṃ vācyaṃ syāt tad aviśeṣeṇa sambhavad-viśeṣam ucyamānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3099: chāyāṃ na puṣṇāti / kathaṃ viśeṣasya sambhavo yāvatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3100: teṣām api puruṣāṇām aśaktir eva idānīntana-puruṣa-vat / atra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3101: śakti-puruṣayor na kiṃcid virodha-darśanam iti na aviruddha-vidhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3102: anupalabdhi-prayogo gamakaḥ / na hy atīndriyeṣu virodha-gatir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3103: asti ity uktam / na ca ayaṃ pūrva-prayogād bhidyate / yadi puruṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3104: śaktāḥ syur idānīntanā api iti / viśeṣa-asambhava etat syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3105: sa ca duḥsādhaḥ / yatra ekasya aśaktis tatra sarva-puruṣāṇām ity api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3107: api kasyacit śakti-siddheḥ / tasmāt kāraṇāni vivecayata artheṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3109: sarvas tadātmā na vā kaścit / na ca atra laukika-vaidikayoḥ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3110: bhedaṃ paśyāmaḥ / asati tasmiṃs tayoḥ sāmānyasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3111: dṛṣṭer ekasya kaścid dharmaṃ vivecayan tat-svabhāva-sambhavinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3113: tattva-lakṣaṇo asty eva viśeṣaḥ / satyam asti / na kevalaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3114: tayor eva / kiṃ tarhi / ḍiṇḍika-purāṇa-itarayor api / na ca sva-prakriyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3116: api prasaṅgāt / yadi tādṛśīṃ racanāṃ puruṣāḥ kartuṃ na śaknuyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3117: kṛtāṃ vā akṛta-saṃketo vivecayet vyaktam apauruṣeyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3118: vedaḥ / nanu na śaknuvanty eva puruṣā mantrān kartum / etad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3119: uttaratra vicārayiṣyāmaḥ / api ca / na mantro nāma anyad eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3121: vacanam / tad adyatve api puruṣeṣu dṛśyata eva / yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3123: śabarāṇāṃ ca keṣāṃcid adya api mantra-karaṇāt / avaidikānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3124: ca bauddha-ādīnāṃ mantra-kalpānāṃ darśanāt / teṣāṃ ca puruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3125: kṛteḥ / tatra apy apauruṣeyatve katham idānīm apauruṣeyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3126: avitatham / tathā hi bauddha-itarayor mantra-kalpayor hiṃsā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3128: tat katham ekatra viruddha-abhidhāyi dvayam satyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3129: syāt / tatra artha-antara-kalpane tad anyatra api tulyam ity artha-anirṇayāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3130: kvacid apratipattiḥ / tathā ca sad apy anupayogam apauruṣeyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3132: syāt karaṇīyam / viṣa-karma-adhikṛto bauddhā api dṛśyante / tatra amantratvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3134: anakṣaraiḥ karmāṇi kriyante / na ca tāny apauruṣeyāṇi nityāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:3135: yujyate / teṣāṃ kriyā-sambhave akṣara-racanāyāṃ kaḥ pratighātaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3136: puruṣāṇām / tasmān na kiṃcid aśakya-kriyam eṣām / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:3139: lakṣaṇāv api tau staḥ / sa prabhāvo gati-siddhi-viśeṣābhyām api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3140: syāt / yadi pauruṣeyā mantrāḥ kiṃ na sarve puruṣā mantra-kāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3142: yuktāḥ syuḥ kurvanty eva / api ca kāvyāni puruṣaḥ karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3143: sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ kāvya-kṛt syāt / akaraṇe vā na eva kaścit tadvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3144: ity apūrvā eṣā vāco-yuktiḥ / satyaṃ mantra-kriyā-sādhana-vikalā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3145: mantrān na kurvate / tat tu kasyacit sākalyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3146: puruṣāṇāṃ samāna-dharmatvāt / uktam atra na mantro nāma anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3147: eva kiṃcit satya-ādimatāṃ vacana-samayād iti / tāni ca kvacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3148: puruṣeṣu dṛśyante / sarva-puruṣās tad-rahitā ity api tat-sambhava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3149: virodha-abhāvād anirṇayaḥ / na ca atyakṣa-svabhāveṣv anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3152: sādhanāny api syuḥ / na api sann api sarvo draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ / ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:3153: eva adṛṣṭasya anapahnavaḥ / na api puruṣeṣu utpitsoḥ kasyacid guṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3155: sarva-jñāna-pratiṣedha-ādayo api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ / tatra apy evaṃbhūto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3156: yādṛśo ayam asambhavat-tat-sādhana-sampradāyo na iti nyāyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3157: na adṛṣṭa-jñāpako atat-svabhāva ity api / satāṃ api kārya-anārambha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3160: bhārata-adhyayane api bhāvād vyabhicāri / nanu vedane viśeṣaṇād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3161: adoṣaḥ / kaḥ punar atiśayo veda-adhyayanasya yad anyathā adhyetuṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3162: na śakyate / na hi viśeṣaṇam aviruddhaṃ vipakṣeṇa asmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3163: hetuṃ vyāvartayati / aviruddhayor ekatra sambhavāt / idānīntanānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3164: adhyayanād iti cet / ukta-uttaram etat / adarśanād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3165: iti cet / idam api prativyūḍham / na apy adarśana-mātram abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3166: gamayati iti vyabhicāra eva / tasmān na viśeṣaṇam atiśaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3167: bhāg ity anupātta-samam / yat kiṃcid veda-adhyayanaṃ sarvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3168: tad-adhyayana-antara-pūrvakam ity api vyāptir na sidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3169: sarvasya tathābhāva-asiddheḥ / yādṛśaṃ tu tan-nimittaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3170: tat tathā iti syāt / dṛṣṭe viśeṣe tan-nimittatayā tat-tyāgena sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3174: sarvathā anāditā sidhyed evaṃ na apuruṣa-āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3175: tasmād apauruṣeyatve syād anyo apy anara-āśrayaḥ //244//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3176: puruṣa eva hi svayam abhyūhya parato vā ādhīyate / na eṣām avyāpṛta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3177: karaṇānāṃ svayaṃ śabdā dhvananti yena apauruṣeyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3178: api syur apauruṣeyā yadi puruṣāṇām ādiḥ syāt / tadā apy anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3179: pūrvakaṃ na sidhyati / adhyāpayitur abhāvāt / tat prathamo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3180: adhyetā kartā eva syāt / tad ayam anādiḥ pūrva-pūrva-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3182: na apauruṣeya iti / anāditvād apauruṣeyatve bahutaram idānīm
SA15dhkpvsvu:3187: ca anādayaḥ / nāstikya-vacāṃsi ca apūrva-paraloka-ādy-apavādīni / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3188: hi tāny anāhita-saṃskārāḥ paraiḥ pravartayanti / sva- pratibhā-racita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3189: samayānām api yathā aśruta-artha-vikalpa-saṃhāreṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3190: tat kiṃcit kutaścid āgatam ity ekasya upadeṣṭuḥ prabandhena abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3191: apara-pūrvakam ity ucyate / prāg eva yathā-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3193: ādi-kalpikeṣv adṛṣṭā eva vyavahārāḥ paścāt pravṛttā iṣyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3194: na / teṣām apy anya-saṃskāra-āhitānāṃ yathā-pratyayaṃ prabodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3196: tādṛśe apauruṣeyatve kaḥ siddhe api guṇo bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3197: kāmam avisaṃvādakam ity apauruṣeyatvam iṣṭam / tad visaṃvādakānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3198: api keṣāṃcid anāditvād asti iti kim apauruṣeyatvena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3201: yadi apauruṣeyatve api pratiniyatām eva tad-artha-pratibhāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3202: janayed āśvāsanaṃ syāt / yatheṣṭaṃ tu samāropa-apavādābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3204: ca te arthās teṣāṃ na saṃghaṭante / samaya-prādhānyād artha-niveśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3206: aneka-artha-pāṭhāt / rūḍher apy ekāntena ananumateḥ / arūḍha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3209: api ca / ayam apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhayan varṇānāṃ vā sādhayed
SA15dhkpvsvu:3211: anya-aviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3212: na hi loka-vedayor nānā varṇāḥ / bhede api ca pratyabhijñāna-aviśeṣāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3215: ca / teṣāṃ ca apauruṣeyatva-sādhane te tulyāḥ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3216: iti kim anena pariśeṣitam / tathā ca sarvo vyavahāro apauruṣeyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3217: na ca sarvo avitatha iti vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ / atha vākyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3219: vākyaṃ na bhinnaṃ varṇebhyo vidyate anupalambhanāt //247//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3220: na hi vayaṃ devadatta-ādi-pada-vākyeṣu dakāra-ādi-pratibhāsaṃ muktvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3222: na ca apratibhāsamānaṃ grahaṇe grāhyatayā iṣṭam asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:3223: anyad vā iti śakyam avasātum / ākāra-antara-vat / anya-asambhavi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3224: kāryaṃ gamakam iti cet / syād etat yadi teṣu varṇeṣu satsu api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3225: tat kāryaṃ na syāt / na bhavati teṣām aviśeṣe api pada-vākya-antare
SA15dhkpvsvu:3226: abhāvād iti cet / na / teṣām aviśeṣa-asiddheḥ / aviśeṣaḥ pratyabhijñānāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3227: siddha iti cet / na / tasya vyabhicārād anidarśanatvāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:3228: ca / varṇa-aviśeṣe api vākya-bhedāt pratipatti-bhedaḥ kārya-bhedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3229: syāt / sā ca vākyāt / tac ca atīndriyam iti kutaḥ syāt / saṃnidhāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3230: mātreṇa janane avyutpannasya api syāt / tasmān na vākyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3231: nāma kiṃcid artha-antaraṃ varṇebhyo yasya apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3233: pakṣe pratyuktam / api ca astv artha-antaraṃ vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3234: tad aneka-avayava-ātmakaṃ vā syād anavayavaṃ vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3236: te api tasya bahavo avayavāḥ pṛthak prakṛtyā yady anarthakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3238: arthavān eva ātmā vākyam / te ca avayavāḥ svayam anarthakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3239: teṣu sa ātmā kalpanā-samāropitaḥ syāt / siṃhatā-ādi-van māṇavaka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3240: ādiṣv iti pauruṣeya eva / atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3244: parisamāpta-arthaṃ hi śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam / te ca avayavās tathāvidhāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3245: pṛthak pṛthag iti pratyekaṃ te vākyam / tathā ca na aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3247: avayava-antara-apekṣā kāla-kṣepaś ca na syāt / tasya niṣkala-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3250: sakṛc śrutau ca sarveṣāṃ kāla-bhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3251: atha mā bhūd avayava-antara-apratīkṣaṇena ekasmād eva avayavād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3252: vākya-artha-siddher aneka-avayavatva-hānir vākyasya iti sakṛt sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3253: avayavānāṃ śravaṇam iṣyate / tadā api kāla-kṣepo na yukta eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3255: ca pṛthag arthavatām ekasmād eva tad-artha-siddher anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3256: vaiyarthyāt / sakṛc śrutau ca pṛthag artheṣv adṛṣṭa-sāmarthyānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3257: arthavattā ca na sidhyati / sahiteṣv artha-darśanād adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3258: na / pṛthag asato rūpasya saṃghāte apy asambhavāt / artha-antara-anutpatteś
SA15dhkpvsvu:3259: ca / śabda-utpāda-vādinas tāvad ayam adoṣa eva / pṛthag
SA15dhkpvsvu:3261: kārya-viśeṣa-upayogāt / pratyekaṃ tv avayaveṣu samartheṣu vyarthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3262: syād anya-kalpanā / atha punar ekam eva anavayavaṃ vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3264: ekatve api hy abhinnasya kramaśo gaty-asambhavāt //250//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3265: kāla-bheda eva na yujyate / na hy ekasya krameṇa pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3266: yuktā / gṛhīta-agṛhītayor abhedāt / krameṇa ca vākya-pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3272: prayuktair api yat kiṃcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta vinā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3273: varṇaiḥ / tair anukramavadbhir akramasya upakāra-ayogāt / akrameṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3274: ca vyāhartum aśakyatvāt / gaty-antara-abhāvāc ca / na eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3275: vākye varṇāḥ santi tad ekam eva śabda-rūpaṃ vyañjaka-anukrama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3276: vaśād anukrama-vad varṇa-vibhāga-vac ca pratibhāti iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3277: anukramavatā vyañjakena akramasya vyaktiḥ pratyuktā / vyakta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3278: avyakta-virodhād avarṇa-bhāge ca vākye asakala-śrāviṇo asakala-vākya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3279: gatir na syāt ekasya śakala-abhāvāt sakala-śrutir na vā kasyacit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3281: ity api mithyā / tasya avarṇa-rūpa-saṃsparśinaḥ kasyacit kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3282: apratipatteḥ / varṇānāṃ ca akrameṇa apratipatteḥ kuto akramam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3283: eka-buddhi-grāhyaṃ vākyaṃ nāma / na ca antya-varṇa-pratipatter
SA15dhkpvsvu:3284: ūrdhvam anyam aśakalaṃ śabda-ātmānam upalakṣayāmaḥ / na api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3285: svayam ayaṃ vaktā vibhāvayati / kevalam evaṃ yadi syāt sādhu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3286: me syād iti kalyāṇa-kāmatā-mūḍha-matir antyāyāṃ buddhau samāpta-kalaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3287: śabdo bhāti iti svapnāyate / na hi smaryamāṇāyor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3288: api pada-vākyayor varṇāḥ krama-viśeṣam antareṇa vibhāvyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3289: akramāyāṃ buddhau paurvāparya-abhāvāt / teṣāṃ tat-kṛtaḥ pada-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3290: vākya-bhedānāṃ bhedo na syāt / na apy avarṇa-kramam anyac
SA15dhkpvsvu:3291: śabda-rūpaṃ paśyāma ity uktam / sati vā tad anityaṃ vā syān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3293: anityaṃ yatna-sambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3294: avaśyaṃ hy anityam utpattimat kutaścid bhavati / tathā hy ākasmikatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3295: sattvasya deśa-ādi-niyamo na syād ity uktam / tac ca yatna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3296: prerita-aviguṇa-karaṇānāṃ dṛṣṭam anyathā na iti / kāraṇa-dharma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3297: darśanāt puruṣa-vyāpāra eva kāraṇam / ataḥ pauruṣeyaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3299: atha tac śabda-rūpaṃ nityaṃ syād upalabhya-svabhāvaṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3300: sa ca tasya svabhāvaḥ kadācin na apaiti iti nityam upalabhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3301: evaṃ hi sa nityaḥ syād yadi na kutaścit sāmarthyāt pracyavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3303: prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt / na api tasya upalabhya-ātmanaḥ kiṃcid upalambha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3304: āvaraṇaṃ sambhavati / tasya sato api tadātmanam akhaṇḍayataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3305: sāmarthya-tiraskāra-ayogāt / na hi tatra atiśayam anutpādayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:3306: kiṃcitkaro nāma / akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya āvaraṇam anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3307: vā iti nirloṭhita-prāyam etat / kuḍya-ādayo ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ kam atiśayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3308: utpādayanti khaṇḍayanti vā yena āvaraṇam iṣyante / na brūmas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3309: te kaṃcid atiśāyayanti iti / api tu na sarve ghaṭa-kṣaṇāḥ sarvasya indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3313: vā anyasya sarvadā syād ity uktam / te ca avyavahitāḥ pratighātinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3317: samartha-nirodhāt sati kuḍye anyasya utpitsoḥ kāraṇa-abhāvena anutpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3319: ucyante / na prāg yogyasya pratibandhāt / tasya svabhāvād apracyuteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3320: athavā sambhavaty api bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikānām anyonya-upakāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:3322: yad indriya-viṣaya-madhya-sthitam āvaraṇaṃ tat tau vijñāna-utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3323: vaiguṇya-tāratamya-bhedena atiśayayed api / āvaraṇa-bhede na śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3324: ādau śruti-māndya-pāṭava-darśanāt / anyathā kvacid apy akiṃcitkarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3325: saṃnidhānasya apy asaṃnidhāna-tulyatvāt tasya idam ity /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3326: upasaṃhāro vikalpa-nirmita eva syāt / na vastv-āśrayaḥ / na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3327: samāropa-anuvidhāyino arthakriyāḥ / na hi māṇavako dahana-upacārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3328: ādhīyate pāke / tasmāt satyām api kalpanāyām atat-parāvṛttayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3329: bhāvā yathā-svabhāva-vṛttaya eva syuḥ / tat saty apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:3330: āvaraṇe vijñāpayeyur eva indriya-ādayaḥ / na ca tathā / tasmāt tena ādheyaviśeṣā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3331: iti gamyante / na khalv evaṃ nityānāṃ śabdānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3332: kasmiṃścit saty atiśaya-hānir utpattir vā / tad yadi teṣāṃ jñāna-jananaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3333: svabhāvaḥ sarvasya sarvadā sarvāṇi sva-viṣaya-jñānāni sakṛj
SA15dhkpvsvu:3334: janayeyuḥ / no cen na kadācit kasyacit kiṃcid ity ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3336: syād etat / na āvaraṇān nityaṃ sarve śabdā na śrūyante / api tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3337: kiṃcit teṣāṃ pratipattau sahakāri pratiniyatam asti / tat kadācit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3338: kasyacid bhavati iti tat-kṛtam eṣāṃ kadācit kvacic śravaṇam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3339: kāmam anya-pratīkṣā astu niyamas tu virudhyate //252//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3340: na vai vayaṃ kāraṇānāṃ sahakārīṇi pratikṣipāmaḥ / kiṃ tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:3341: apekṣanta eva kāraṇāni tad-avasthā-upakāriṇam / tato labhyasya atiśayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3342: kārya-upayogāt / tathā śabdo api yadi kiṃcid apekṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3343: kāryaṃ kuryāt karotu pūrva-svabhāva-niyata ity etan na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3345: na hy anupakāry apekṣyata ity uktam etat / tad-upakārasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3346: ca arthāntaratve tasya iti sambandha-abhāva-ādayo apy uktāḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3347: ca ajñeyatvam / upakārād eva jñāna-utpatteḥ / tasmād eva śabdo na indriyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3348: na saṃnikarṣaṃ na ātmānam anyad vā kiṃcij jñāna-utpatti-samāśrayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3350: api ca / ete śabdā vyāpino vā syur avyāpino vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3351: sarvatra anupalambhaḥ syāt teṣām avyāpitā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3353: grahaṇa-pakṣe adoṣa iti cet / na / tatra api yogya-deśa-sthiti-tāratamya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3355: bhedo na syāt / sati ca upalambha-pratyaye sarvatra deśe tulyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3357: sarveṣām upalambhaḥ syād yugapad vyāpitā yadi //253//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3358: na hi kaścic śabda kvacin na asti iti sarve yugapad upalabhyeran
SA15dhkpvsvu:3361: saṃskṛtasya upalambhe ca kaḥ saṃskartā avikāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3362: syād etat / sann api na sarvaḥ śabda upalabhyate sarveṇa / saṃskṛtasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3363: saṃskṛtena eva upalambhād iti / tatra na saṃskṛtasya upalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3365: indriyasya hi saṃskāraḥ śṛṇuyān nikhilaṃ ca tat //254//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3366: tatra yadi saṃskṛtena upalambha ity asaṃskṛtena indriyo na upalabhate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3367: yasya saṃskāra indriyasya kṛtaḥ sa sarva-śabdān yugapac śṛṇuyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3371: atha api syāt / pratiniyatāḥ te saṃskārāḥ śabdānām / tatra kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3372: saṃskṛtam indriyaṃ kasyacid eva grāhakam iti na yugapat sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3373: śabda-śrutir iti / saṃskāra-viśeṣāc śruti-niyame indriyāṇām aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3374: śabda-saṃghātasya kalakalasya śrutir na syāt / na hy ekaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3375: śabdaḥ kalakalo nāma / bhinna-svabhāvānāṃ yugapac śravaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3377: sakṛc-śrutir bhrāntir iti cet / vaṃśa-ādi-svara-dhārāyāṃ gamaka-avayava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3378: saṃhārāt saṃkulā pratipattiḥ syāt / vakṣyate ca atra pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3381: dhvanayaḥ kevalaṃ tatra śrūyante cen na vācakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3382: na vai kalakale varṇa-pada-vākyāni śrūyante / dhvanīnām eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3383: kevalānāṃ śravaṇāt / vācake ca pratiniyata-śakti-indriyaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3385: dhvanibhyo bhinnam asti iti śraddhā iyaṃ atibahv idam //256//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3386: na hi vayaṃ dhvaniṃ śabdaṃ ca vācakaṃ pṛthag-rūpam upalakṣayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3389: avyavasyantaḥ pravartayāmaḥ / tasmād dhvani-viśeṣa eva iyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3391: sthiteṣv anyeṣu śabdeṣu śrūyate vācakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3392: na dhvanir ato bhinnas tena saha pṛthag vā / na hi pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:3393: arthe para-upadeśo garīyān / tad ayaṃ sthiteṣv anyeṣu vyāhartṛṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3394: kevalam eva śabdaṃ śṛṇvaṃs tad-upalambha-pratyayānāṃ tad-anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3395: niṣpādane sāmarthya-abhāvaṃ pratyeti / yadi hi samarthāḥ syus
SA15dhkpvsvu:3396: tat-sādhitaṃ tad upalabhyeta / tat-svabhāvā eva punaḥ pratyayāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3397: kathaṃ kalakale artha-antaram ārabheran / na hi kāraṇa-abhede
SA15dhkpvsvu:3398: kārya-bhedo yuktaḥ / bhedasya ahetukatva-prasaṅgād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3399: na ca kalakale vācako na śrūyate / pada-vākya-vicchedānām upalakṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3401: tāni pratiniyata-śaktīny api indriyāṇi nānā-rūpān prati-śabda-niyatān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3402: dhvanīn śṛṇvanti na tv evaṃ śabdān iti kaḥ śabdeṣv eṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3403: nirvedaḥ / yad uktaṃ na dhvanayo bhedena vācakebhyaḥ siddhā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3404: iti kathaṃ na siddhāḥ / vacanād artha-pratipatteḥ / na hi dhvani-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3405: bhāgād alpīyasaḥ śabda-artha-pratītiḥ / na ca so anyaṃ sama iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3407: bhāgeṣu dhvaniṣu na sambhavati iti siddham akrama-sattvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3408: śabda-rūpam / kramavad-bhāgaś ca dhvanir iti / tan na / akramasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3409: kramavad-vyatirekiṇaḥ prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt / atiprasaṅgaś ca evam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3413: eva / krama-bhāvina eva yathāsvaṃ karaṇa-prayogād bhinnā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3414: varṇa-bhāgāḥ karma-bhāgā vā krameṇa vikalpa-viṣayā yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3415: saṃketam eva artha-pratītiṃ janayanti iti nyāyyam / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3416: dhvanayaḥ sammatā yais te doṣaiḥ kair apy avācakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3417: dhvanibhir vyajyamāne asmin vācake api kathaṃ na te //258//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3418: krama-utpādibhir dhvani-bhāgair vyaktaḥ kila vācako vakti / tam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3419: api te na eva sakṛt prakāśayanti / krama-bhāvāt / na apy eka eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3421: bhāga-kāle ca samasta-rūpa-anupalakṣaṇāt / tad ayam apratisaṃhita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3423: arthaṃ kathaṃ sādhayet / ko hi viśeṣo atyanta-anupalambhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:3424: sad-asator upalambha-sādhyeṣv artheṣu / na ca saṃnidhi-mātreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3425: sādhanaḥ / vyakty-apekṣaṇāt / sā ca iyaṃ krama-bhāvinī sad-asatos
SA15dhkpvsvu:3426: tulya-upayoga iti dhvanibhir aśakya-sādhanaṃ kāryam / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3427: tathā ity alaṃ anyena / tasmān na varṇeṣu vākye vā apauruṣeyatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3428: varṇa-anupūrvī vākyaṃ cen na varṇānām abhedataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3429: na artha-antaram eva śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam apauruṣeyam / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3430: varṇa-anukrama-lakṣaṇaṃ hi no vākyam / tad apauruṣeyaṃ sādhyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3431: iti cet / na / varṇānām ānupūrvyā abhedāt / na iyam artha-antaraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3433: apratipatter liṅga-abhāvāt / bhedavatyāś ca ānupūrvyā abhāve varṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3434: mātram avaśiṣṭaṃ sarvatra iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3436: yady akṛtaka-anupūrvī varṇānāṃ te ca na bahavaḥ samāna-jātīyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3437: yena kecid vyavasthita-kramāḥ syuḥ anye yathā iṣṭa-parāvṛttayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3438: kiṃ tarhi eka eva trailokye akāras tathā gakāraḥ tadā agnir ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3439: eva syāt na gaganam iti akāra-gakārayoḥ pūrvāpara-bhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3444: anyathā abhāva-ayogāt / tyāge vā vināśa-prasaṅgāt / viśeṣeṇa nityāyām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3445: ānupūrvyāṃ / tad etat pratipadaṃ krama-anyatvaṃ varṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3446: anyatve apūrva-utpādāt varṇa-bāhulyād vā syāt / tac ca anabhimatam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3449: sā ca iyam ānupūrvī vārṇānāṃ deśa-kṛtā vā syāt / yathā pipīlikānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3450: paṅktau / kāla-kṛtā vā yathā bīja-aṅkura-ādīnām / sā dvividhā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3451: varṇeṣu na sambhavati / vyāpter nityatvāc ca / anyonya-deśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3452: parihāreṇa vṛttir hi deśa-paurvāparyam / tat sarvasya sarveṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3453: tulyadeśatvād varṇeṣu na sambhavati / vāta-ātapa-vad ātma-ādi-vac
SA15dhkpvsvu:3454: ca / tathā kāla-parihāreṇa vṛttiḥ kāla-paurvāparyam / yadā eko
SA15dhkpvsvu:3455: na asti tadā anyasya bhāvāt / tad api nityeṣu na sambhavati / sarvadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3456: sarvasya bhāvāt / na ca anyā gatir asti / tat kathaṃ varṇa-paurvāparyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3458: anitya-avyāpitāyāṃ ca doṣaḥ prāg eva kīrtitaḥ //260//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3459: atha mā bhūd ayaṃ doṣa ity anityān avyāpinaś ca varṇān icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3460: tāv api pakṣau prāg eva nirākṛtāv ity aparihāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3462: na varṇānāṃ rūpa-anupūrvī vākyam / kiṃ tarhi / tad-vyakteḥ / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3464: iti tadā anupūrvī vākyam ity api mithyā / tasyā nityeṣu prāg eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3467: vyāpārād eva tat-siddheḥ karaṇānāṃ ca kāryatā //261//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3468: yat khalu rūpaṃ yata eva upalabhyate tasya tad-upalabdhi-nāntarīyakām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3469: upalabdhim eva āśritya lokaḥ kāryatāṃ prajñāpayati / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3470: varṇeṣv apy asti / sa eva ca anyatra api tad-āśrayaḥ / na viśeṣaḥ / tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3471: kathaṃ tulye abhyupagama-nibandhane na varṇāḥ kāryāḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3472: ca etad upalabdhy-āśrayā kāryatā-sthitiḥ / kiṃ tarhi / yat saty eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3473: bhavati iti sattā-āśrayā / sā sattā kutaḥ siddhā ye na kāryatāṃ sādhayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3474: na hy asiddhāyām asyām evaṃ bhavati iti / tasmāt sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3475: siddhis tat-sādhanī / sā ca upalabdhir eva / satyam evaṃ yadi tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3476: prāṅ na sattā siddhā syāt / sā hi sattā-siddhir yā asiddhi-pūrvikā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3477: nanu tad rūpam asiddham eva yat tathābhūta-vijñāna-avyavadhāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3478: upayogi / siddham eva tad anya-vaikalyān na upayuktam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3479: cet / katham idānīm upayukta-anupayuktayor abhedaḥ / na api bhedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3480: śabda-svabhāva-asaṃsparśī tasya eva atiśayasya upayoga-siddhes tasyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3481: kāraṇatva-prasaṅgāt / yasya eva bhāve sādhya-siddhis tad eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3482: tatra upayogi yuktam / tad-atiśaya-upayoge apy asya tadvat prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3484: bhedas tad-anyam / anatiśayasya apekṣā ca prāg eva niṣiddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3485: sa ca karaṇa-vyāpārād eva siddha iti sarva-kārya-tulya-dharmā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3486: tasya tādṛśasya vyaktau sarvaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ na vā kiṃcid apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:3488: sva-jñānena anya-dhī-hetuḥ siddhe arthe vyañjako mataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3489: yathā dīpo anyathā vā api ko viśeṣo asya kārakāt //262//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3491: dīpa-ādi-vat sa cet prāk siddhaḥ syāt samāna-jātīya-upādāna-kṣaṇa-siddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3492: na tasya eva atiśayasya jñāna-hetoḥ tasya tat-sāmagrī-pratyayatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3493: ye punar asiddha-upalambhanāḥ kārakā eva kulāla-ādi-vad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3494: ghaṭa-ādau / pratyabhijñāna-ādayo api siddhi-hetavo na hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3495: puṣṇanti / yad api kiṃcid uttarā akāra-pratītir akāra-pratīteḥ pūrva-abhinna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3496: viṣayā tadvad ity ādi / tad api na svalakṣaṇayor abheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3498: bhinna-viṣayatvasya apy avirodhaḥ / eka-viṣayayoś ca pratītyoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3501: bhinna-akhila-kāraṇatvam / tatra eka-abhede api śaktasya apratīkṣaṇād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3504: ayuktam / ghaṭa-ādiṣv api prasaṅgāt / tatra dṛṣṭa-virodhād asādhanatvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3505: iti cet / iha api virodha-abhāvaḥ kena siddhaḥ / yāvat tathā abhidheyatā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3506: artha-bhedena vyāptā na sādhyate tāvat sandigdho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3508: śrutau niviśamāno yadā ekaḥ sādhyate kiṃ na ghaṭa-ādayaḥ / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3509: api śakyam evaṃ vyañjaka-bhedāt pratibhāsa-bheda iti pratyavasthātum /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3513: na hi kadācid vyāpṛteṣu karaṇeṣu śabda-anupalabdhiḥ / na ca avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3515: api ghaṭa-ādy-anupalabdheḥ / sā iyaṃ niyamena upalabdhis tad-vyāpārāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:3516: śabdasya tad-udbhave syāt / akartur vyāpāre api tat-siddhy-ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3517: vyāpi-nityatvād upalambha iti cet / ka idānīṃ ghaṭa-ādiṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3518: samāśvāsaḥ / teṣāṃ tathā aniṣṭer iti cet / śabdaḥ kim iṣṭas tat-samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3519: dharmā / na ca asya kaścid atiśaya ity uktam / pratiṣiddhe ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3521: prakāśo hy eṣāṃ vyañjakaḥ siddhaḥ / kulāla-ādīnāṃ vyañjakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3522: tādṛśā eva syuḥ / atiśerate ca / tato vyañjaka-atiśayāt kārakā eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3523: upakārakasya gaty-antara-abhāvāt / tad etac śabdeṣv api tulyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3524: tatra api indriya-yogya-deśatā-ādibhyaḥ karaṇānām atiśayāt / ghaṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3525: kāraka-dharmasya ca karaṇeṣu dṛṣṭeḥ / tasya eva pradīpa-āder
SA15dhkpvsvu:3526: viṣaya-antarasya ca kasyacid vyañjaka-antara-abhāvāt / tat- kāraṇāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:3527: teṣāṃ vyañjakāni syuḥ / tasmān na vyaktiḥ śabdasya / bhavantī
SA15dhkpvsvu:3528: vā karaṇebhyo atiśayattā vā śabdasya vyaktir āvaraṇa-vigamo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3529: vijñānaṃ vā gaty-antara-abhāvāt / tatra na atiśaya-utpattir anityatā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3532: tad-rūpa-āvaraṇānāṃ ca vyaktis te vigamo yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3533: abhāve karaṇa-grāma-sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ nu tad bhavet //264//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3534: na hy āvaraṇasya akiṃcitkarāṇi karaṇāni samarthāni nāma / vigamaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:3535: ca abhāvaḥ / na ca abhāvaḥ kāryam iti niveditam etat / na api śabdasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3536: nityasya kiṃcid āvaraṇam asāmarthyād ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3537: tasmān na āvaraṇe karaṇa-upakṣepaḥ / na apy eṣām asāmarthyam / tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3538: vyāpāra-abhāve śabda-anupalabdheḥ / ato yuktam ete yac śabdān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3542: yadi sarva-kāraṇa-samāna-dharmāṇy api karaṇāni vyañjakāni na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3543: kiṃcid idānīṃ kāryaṃ syāt / na ca etad yuktam / sarva-kāraṇānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3545: akāryatvāt / vastu-vad eva jñānasya api siddhatvāt / jñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3546: prati kārakatve kasyacit tathābhūtānām anyeṣām api tathābhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3548: kāraka-abhimato artha-kalāpo na vyaktau na kriyāyām iti vyartha
SA15dhkpvsvu:3549: eva syāt / tathā ca idam anupakārya-upakārakaṃ nirīhaṃ jagat syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3553: kṣaṇa-bhaṅgino hi sarva-bhāvā vināśasya akāraṇatvād ity uktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3554: vakṣyate ca / utpattimantaś ca parataḥ / sattāyā ākasmikatva-ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3555: tan na idaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sat-prayoga-ādikaṃ kvacid anveti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3557: dṛṣṭam iti viruddham eva / na / abhinna-janmanaḥ sādharmya-vipralambhād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3558: bhrāntyā dīpa-ādiṣu bhāvāt / abhinna-janma iti kena avaṣṭambhena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3559: ucyate / tasya eva abhedasya sarvatra paurvāparyeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3560: cintyatvāt / tathā bhedasya api iti cet / tena eva saṃśayo astu / na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3561: saṃśayitāt siddhiḥ / viveka-adarśanād ekatvam iti cet / na / jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3563: yady aparāṇi jñānāni prāk saṃnihita-kāraṇāni pūrva-jñāna-vaj jātāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:3564: eva syuḥ / ajātāni tu kāraṇa-vaikalyaṃ sūcayanti / samarthasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3566: pratilambhe vā sthairya-ayogāt / tad ayam sat-prayoga ity api jananam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3567: eva prayoktuḥ sāmarthyāt / svayaṃ samarthe tasya anupayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3568: prayoga ity api iṣṭa-sādhana-samartha-utpādanam eva samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3570: ādi-prayoga-vac ca kathyate / yo api manyate samakṣe pratyabhijñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3571: pratyakṣam eva tataḥ pratyakṣād eva sthairya-siddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3574: na eva kaścid dharmo yaḥ samāna-jātīyam anveti / sarva-dharmāṇām
SA15dhkpvsvu:3579: yadi vyaktir buddhis tadā ānupūrvī vādyam / tasyā apauruṣeyatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3581: asya bādhyate / pratyakṣaṃ khalv apy etad yad imā buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3583: bhavanti iti / na ca kāryatā nāma anyā bhāva-abhāva-viśeṣābhyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3584: sa ca bhāvaḥ pratyakṣo abhāvo apy anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3585: sāmarthya-siddha iti vakṣyāmaḥ / tata eva puruṣa-kāryatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3587: ānupūrvyāś ca varṇebhyo bhedaḥ sphoṭena cintitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3588: kalpanā-āropitā sā syāt kathaṃ vā apuruṣa-āśrayā //268//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3590: na api sā varṇa-svabhāvā / vastu-svabhāvasya etad-vikalpa -anatikramāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3592: ayaṃ vibhramaḥ syād ānupūrvī iti / sā ca katham apauruṣeyī / buddhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3594: svabhāvasya abhāvād bhavatā dhvaninā anātyantikena bhavitavyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3595: sa ca ahetuko anya-hetuko vā nityaṃ bhaven na ca puruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3596: vyāpārāt / tasmān na apauruṣeyaḥ / katham idaṃ gamyate anātyantiko
SA15dhkpvsvu:3599: na hi nāśo bhāvānāṃ kutaścid bhavati / tad bhāva-svabhāvo bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3600: bhāvasya eva sva-hetubhyas tad-dharmaṇo bhāvāt / na ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3602: mātra-svabhāvaḥ syāt / tena śabdo anyo vā sattā-bhājanaḥ sarva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3603: eva bhāvo anātyantika iti siddham / na siddham / tasya eva vināśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3604: apara-janma-asiddheḥ / tathā hy agninā kāṣṭhaṃ daṇḍena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3605: ghaṭa iti vināśa-hetavo bhāvānāṃ dṛśyante / anvaya-vyatireka-anuvidhānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3606: hetu-tadvator lakṣaṇam āhuḥ / na / pūrvasya sva-rasa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3608: astu vā agniḥ kāṣṭha-vināśa-hetuḥ / sa vināśo agni-janmā kiṃ kāṣṭham
SA15dhkpvsvu:3612: kim ity artha-antarād artha-antara-janmani kāṣṭham abhūtaṃ nāma
SA15dhkpvsvu:3613: na dṛśyate vā / atiprasaṅgo hy evaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3614: sa eva asya vināśa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3615: yadi sa eva artho agni-janmā abhāvas tad idam abhūtatvān na dṛśyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:3616: iti / bhavatu tasya idaṃ nāma abhāva iti / tathā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3618: anyo anyasya vināśaḥ / na hi kasyacid arthasya nāma-karaṇa-mātreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3619: kāṣṭhaṃ na dṛśyata iti yuktam / na ca anyo anyasya vināśaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3621: tad-anyebhyaḥ / kāṣṭhe agni-kṛtaḥ svabhāvo vināśo na sarva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3622: cet / kāṣṭhā iti kaḥ sambandhaḥ / āśrayāśrayi sambandhaś cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3623: na / tasya niṣetsyamānatvāt / janyajanakabhāvāś cet / agner iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3624: kim / kāṣṭhād eva bhāvāt / tad-apekṣād utpatter adoṣa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3625: anatiśaya-lābhinaḥ kā apekṣā / lābhe vā apara-kāṣṭha-janma syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3626: pūrvaṃ tv apracyuti-kāraṇam / tathā eva dṛśyata / tata eva agneḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3627: pūrva-vināśa iti cet / pūrveṇa asya kaḥ sambandha iti sa eva prasaṅgo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3628: aparyavasānaś ca / tad avaśyaṃ vināśa-sambandha-yogyam uttaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:3629: atiśayaṃ pratyupakurvāṇo agnir apūrvam eva janayati iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3630: pūrvaṃ tad-avasthaṃ dṛśyeta / kāṣṭha-vināśa iti ca kāṣṭha-abhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3631: ucyate / na ca abhāvaḥ kāryaḥ / tat-kārī ca akāraka eva ity anapekṣaṇīya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3632: ity uktam / svabhāva-abhāvasya ca tato bhede tato nivartamānasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3633: bhāvasya svabhāva eva samarthitaḥ syād iti katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:3635: anyo anyasya vināśo astu kāṣṭhaṃ kasmān na dṛśyate //270//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3637: tat-parigrahataś cen na tena anāvaraṇaṃ yataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3638: yadi tena artha-antareṇa parigṛhītam iti kāṣṭhaṃ na dṛśyeta tat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3639: kāṣṭhasya āvaraṇam ity āpannam / na ca etad yuktam / āvaraṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3640: hi darśanaṃ bibadhnīyān na abhighāṭa-ādīni dravya-sāmarthyāni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3641: sarva-pratibandhe ca nanv anena eva dravyaṃ vināśitaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3642: sarva-śakti-pracyāvanāt / punas tatra apy agnāv iva prasaṅgād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3643: anavasthā / apracyuteṣu vā asya abhighāṭa-sāmarthya-ādiṣu satā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3644: tena anyena kiṃ vināśitam / yadi ca agni-samudbhavasya vināśa-ākhyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3646: vināśasya vināśitvaṃ syād utpattes tataḥ punaḥ //271//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3648: avaśyaṃ hy utpattimatā vināśena vinaṣṭavyam / tasmin vinaṣṭe
SA15dhkpvsvu:3651: yathā atra apy evam iti ced dhantur na amaraṇatvataḥ //272//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3652: vināśa-vināśe api ca vastunaḥ pratyāpattiḥ / na hi hantari hate api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3653: tadvataḥ pratyujjīvati iti cet / na / hantus tad-ghāta-hetutvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3654: na brūmo vināśa-hetor agni-daṇḍa-āder nivṛttau bhāvena bhavitavyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3656: tan-nivṛttau kānyā gatiḥ svabhāva-sthiteḥ / hantā hi caitrasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3657: na nāśa-kalpaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / daṇḍa-ādi-kalpaḥ / nāśa-kalpaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3658: hy asya maraṇaṃ / tan-nivṛttau ca syād eva asya punarbhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3659: ananyatve api nāśasya syān nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva tu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3660: tasya sattvād ahetutvaṃ na ato anyā vidyate gatiḥ //273 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3661: anartha-antara-bhūto vināśaḥ kāṣṭhāt / tad eva tad bhavati / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:3662: ca prāg eva asti iti kim atra sāmarthyaṃ vahny-ādīnām / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3663: tad-anupakārāt tena na apekṣyante kathaṃcit / na apy asya idam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3664: sambandham arhati / tasya upakāra-nibandhanatvāt / anyathā atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3665: pāraṃparyeṇa upakāre apy avaśyam ayaṃ vikalpo anveti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3666: sa kim upakāro artha-antaram āhosvit tad eva iti / tad-arthāntaratve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3667: api tasya iti punar upakāratva-ādi-paryanuyogas tad-avasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3668: eva / tathā ananyatve / tasmāt sato rūpasya tattvānyattva-avyatikramāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3670: tad-atat-kriyā-vikalo na kartā eva iti na kasyacid hetur ahetuś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:3671: na apekṣate / tasmāt svayam ayaṃ bhāvas tat-svabhāva iti siddham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3674: syād etad yasya api vināśo ahetukaḥ so avaśyaṃ nitya iti bhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3675: tad-abhāva-lakṣaṇo vināśaś ca saha syātām iti / na / tasya nitya-anitya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3676: dharma-ayogāt / na hy asaty ayaṃ vikalpaḥ sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3677: tayor vastu-dharmatvāt / vināśasya ca akiṃcitvāt / bhavato hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3678: kenacit sahabhāvaḥ syāt / na ca vināśo bhavati / tasmād adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3680: yasmād bhāvasya nāśena na vināśanam iṣyate //275//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3681: katham asan vināśo bhāvaṃ nāśayet / ato avināśī bhāvaḥ syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3682: ity aprasaṅga eva / vināśād bhāva-nāśa-anabhyupagamāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3683: vināśa iti kiṃcin na ity āha sa kathaṃ tato bhāva-nāśam icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3684: katham idānīm asati vināśe bhāvo naṣṭo nāma / na hy asad-vināśā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3685: naṣṭā gaṇyante pratyutpanna-avasthāyām / na hi yo yena atadvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3686: sa tena tathā vyapadiśyate pratīyate vā / yathā aśvo viṣāṇena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3687: na vai vināśo na asty eva / sa tu na asti yo bhāvasya bhavanti / bhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3688: eva tu kṣaṇa-sthiti-dharmā vināśaḥ / tam asya svabhāvam uttara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3689: kālaṃ vibhāvayanto vināśo asya bhūta iti yathā-pratīti vyapadiśanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3690: ity uktam / na hi bhāvasya kiṃcit kadācid bhavati / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3691: kevalaṃ sva-hetubhyas tathābhūto bhavati / tan na kenacid bhavatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3692: sa naṣṭaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / svabhāva eva asya yena sa naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3693: kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ahetuko vināśo bhavati ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3694: naśyan bhāvo apara-apekṣa iti taj-jñāpanāya sā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3695: avasthā ahetur uktā asyā bhedam āropya cetasā //276//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3696: na bhāvo jāto aparasmān nāśaṃ pratilabhate tathābhūtasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3698: svabhāva-jñāpanena artha-antaram iva dharmiṇo dharmaṃ cetasā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3699: vibhajya tan-mātra-jijñāsāyāṃ svabhāva eva tathā ucyate / tad etan
SA15dhkpvsvu:3701: nāśaṃ guṇaṃ tasya ca bhāvam āropya sahetukam ahetukaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3703: svato api bhāve abhāvasya vikalpaś ced ayaṃ samaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3704: nanv aparabhāvitve api vināśasya svata eva bhāvasya bhavato
SA15dhkpvsvu:3705: ayaṃ tattvānyattva-vikalpas tulyaḥ / tadā kim artha-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3706: bhāvo na dṛśyate anarthāntaratve api tad eva tad bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3707: tan na kiṃcid asya jātam iti kathaṃ vinaṣṭo nāma / nanv atra /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3708: na tasya kiṃcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam //277//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3709: ity uktam / na hy ayaṃ vināśo anyo vā kaścid bhāvasya bhavati ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3710: āha / kiṃ tarhi / sa eva bhāvo na bhavati iti / yadi hi kasyacid bhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3711: brūyāt na bhāvo anena nivartitaḥ syāt / tathā ca bhāva-nivṛttau
SA15dhkpvsvu:3712: prastutāyām aprastutam eva uktaṃ syāt / na hi kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3713: bhāvena bhāvo na bhūto nāma / tadā na bhūto yadi svayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3714: bhavet / na bhavati iti ca prasajyapratiṣedha eṣa na paryudāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3715: anyathā iha api kasyacid bhāve na pratiṣedha-paryudāsayo rūpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3716: bhedaḥ syād ubhayatra vidheḥ prādhānyāt / evaṃ ca apratiṣedhāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3717: kasyacit paryudāso api kvacin na syāt / yadi hi kiṃcit kutaścin
SA15dhkpvsvu:3718: nivarteta tadā tad-vyatireki saṃspṛśyeta / tat-paryudāsena / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:3719: ca na asti / sarvatra nivṛttir bhavati ity ukte kasyacid bhāvasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3720: pratītiḥ / tathā ca anena artha-antara-bhāva eva uktaḥ syāt / na tayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3721: parasparaṃ vivekaḥ / aviveke ca na paryudāsaḥ / tad evaṃ vyatireka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3722: abhāvād anvayo api na syāt / tasya eka-svabhāva-sthiti-lakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3723: tat-sthitiś ca tad-anya-vyatireke sati syāt / sa ca na asti ity apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3724: nivṛttikaṃ jagat syāt / tasmād yasya nāśo bhavati ity ucyate sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3725: svayam eva na bhavati ity uktaṃ syāt / na vai ghoṣa-sāmyād viṣaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3726: antara-dṛṣṭo vidhiḥ sarvatra yojanām arhati / na hi gardabha iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3727: nāma-karaṇād bāleya-dharmā manuṣye api saṃyojyāḥ / tathā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3728: caitrasya putro bhavati ity atra dṛṣṭo vidhir nāśe api virodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3729: evaṃ ca abhidhāne api prayojanam āveditam eva / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3730: bhāve hy eṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidher vastv-anurodhataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3731: bhāvo avaśyaṃ bhavantam apekṣate / sa ca svabhāva eva / niḥsvabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3732: kvacid vyāpāre samāveśa-abhāvāt / vyāpāra iti hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3734: katham idānīṃ bhavaty abhāvaḥ śaśa-viṣāṇam ity ādi-vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3735: na vai śaśa-viṣāṇaṃ kiṃcid bhavati ity ucyate / api tv evam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3736: asya na bhavati iti bhāva-pratiṣedha eva kriyate / api ca / vyavahartāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3737: eva etad evaṃ vyāpāra-vad iva samāropya ādarśayanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3738: prakaraṇena kenacit / na tu tat tathā / sarva-artha-vivecanaṃ hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3739: tatra tattvaṃ na kasyacit samāveśaḥ / na khalv evaṃ vināśo vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:3740: tad-bhāvāt / asāv api yadi vaktṛbhir evaṃ khyāpyate na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3741: tu svayaṃ tathā tadā na kiṃcid bhavati iti iṣṭam eva / tasmāt svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3742: bhavan svabhāvo vikalpa-dvayaṃ na ativartate tattvam anyattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3743: iti / atattvam eva svabhāvasya anyattvam / na hi rūpa-rasayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3744: apy anyad eva parasparam anyattvam / svabhāva-apratibandho
SA15dhkpvsvu:3745: anyattvam iti cet / ko ayaṃ pratibandho nāma yena sa ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3746: syāt / na anya-svabhāvaś ca / janma iti cet / sarva-kāraṇānāṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3747: avācyatā syāt / tathā ca sarvaḥ sarvasya kathaṃcid upayogi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3748: iti na kaścit kutaścid anyaḥ syāt / evaṃ ca avācyatā ity api kāryakāraṇabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3749: eva śabda-antareṇa uktaḥ syāt / na artha-bhedaḥ / svabhāva-ananugamanaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3750: tv anyattvaṃ brūmaḥ / sa ca svabhāvavatāṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3751: asty eva ity anyattvam eva / na ca taj-janma-lakṣaṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3753: vyabhicāra-avirodhāt / tato dharma-bhedāc ca anyattvam / jñāna-kṛtaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3754: pratibandha iti cet / syād etat / yat-pratipatti-nāntarīyakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3755: yaj-jñānaṃ tad-gatau niyamena tat-pratibhāsanāt tad atad-rūpam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3756: apy avācyam iti / na / tasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt svayam / sa eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3757: tasya svabhāvo yaḥ pratibhāti / svabhāvavattve asya tadvat pratibhāsa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3759: api na tad-rūpaṃ jñānam iti kasya kim āyattā pratipattiḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3760: ca yad yad āyattā-pratītikaṃ tasya svabhāva-pratibhāsa eva naśyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3761: prakāśa-āyatta-pratītīnām iva nīla-ādīnām / kā vā tasya pratyāsattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3762: tatra yat tasminn anātma-rūpe pratīyamāne sa svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3763: pratyupatiṣṭhate / atiprasaṅgo hy evaṃ syāt / pratīyamānasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3764: tad-upādānatā iti cet / ko ayam upādāna-arthaḥ / na kāryakāraṇabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3765: anabhyupagamāt / abhyupagame vā na kārya-kāraṇe anyonya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3767: pratyāsattir iti cet / nanu sa eva asati pratibandhe na yuktā ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3768: na akārya-kāraṇayoḥ kaścit pratibandha iti ca uktam / yat -pratipatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3769: nāntarīyakaṃ yaj-jñānam ity api taj-jñāne sati syāt / na hi yo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3770: vijñāne svarūpeṇa asvarūpa-asaṃsargeṇa na pratibhāsate tasya kiṃcij
SA15dhkpvsvu:3771: jñānam / tad-abhāvān na sidhyati avācyatā-lakṣaṇam artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3772: rūpasya / tad bhavatā vastutas tattvānyattva-bhājā bhavitavyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3773: yasya tu vinaśyato bhāvasya na kiṃcid bhavati / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3774: na bhāvo bhavati ity uktam abhāvo bhavati ity api //278//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3775: yad apy ayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvo bhavati ity āha / tad api bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3776: na bhavati ity eva uktaṃ bhavati / evaṃ hi sa nivartito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3777: pratiṣedhe vidher asambhavāt / tata eva asya vināśe na kaścid hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3779: apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryaṃ yadi vidyata kiṃcana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3780: yad akiṃcitkaraṃ vastu kiṃ kenacid apekṣyate //279//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3781: sati hi kārye kāraṇaṃ bhavati / na ca naśyato bhāvasya kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3782: kāryam ity uktam / tasmād yo nāma nāśa-hetuḥ sa bhāve na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3783: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaro na apekṣyaṇīyaḥ / tat kathaṃ idānīm
SA15dhkpvsvu:3784: anutpanna-atiśayas tad-avastha eva bhāvo naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3785: nanv atiśaya-utpattāv api sa eva tasya atiśaya utpanna iti kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3786: sa naṣṭo nāma / tena na ayaṃ tad-avastho naṣṭo nāma / yena svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3787: na bhavati tena naṣṭaḥ / na artha-antara-utpādād ity uktam / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:3788: atiśaya-utpattyā svayaṃ na bhūto nāma / abhāvasya sarva-atiśaya-upākhyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3790: ca utpatti-samāveśa-lakṣaṇatvāt / tasmān na abhāve kasyacid bhāva-upakṣepo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3792: etena ahetukatve api hy abhūtvā nāśa-bhāvataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3794: yo api manyate ahetuke api vināśe abhūtvā asya bhāvāt sattā-anityatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3795: ca durnivāram / abhūtvā bhavann ahetuko bhavati ity api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3796: viruddham iti / so apy anena eva pratyākhyātaḥ / kasyacid bhāvān abhyupagamāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3797: yathā keṣāṃcid eva iṣṭaḥ pratigho janmināṃ tathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3798: nāśaḥ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na anutpattimatāṃ yadi //281//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3799: atha api syād / bhavatu nāma svabhāva eṣa bhāvānāṃ ya ime kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3800: sthiti-dharmāṇāḥ / sa tu utpattimatām eva bhaviṣyati / na hi svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3801: iti sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo bhavati pratigha-ātmatā-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3804: na anitye rūpa-bhedo asti bhedakānām abhāvataḥ //282//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3805: na vai pratigho anyo vā svabhāvo akasmāt pratiniyamavān / yādṛśī
SA15dhkpvsvu:3806: tu sva-hetoḥ śakti-sthitis tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati iti hetu-svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3807: niyamāt phala-svabhāva-niyamaḥ / ākasmikatve apy asya ukto
SA15dhkpvsvu:3810: tathā syān na anyaḥ / sarva-ākāra-janmanāṃ vināśa-darśanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3811: nanv idam apy aniśceyam eva sarva-ākāra-janmāno naśyanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3812: tāsām aniḥśeṣa-darśanāt / vicitra-śaktayo hi sāmagryo dṛśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3813: tatra kācit syād api yā anaśvara-ātmānaṃ janayet / na / jñeya-adhikārāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3814: ye kadācit kvacit kenacij jñātāḥ santo na jñāyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:3815: teṣāṃ sattā-anubandhī nāśa iti brūmaḥ / ta eva kṛtakā anityāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3816: sādhyante / na hy ayaṃ sambhavo asti yat te jñāna-janana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3817: svabhāvāḥ punar anaṣṭā na janayeyur apekṣeran vā param /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3818: taj-janana-svabhāvasya niṣpatteḥ / na ca teṣv anapekṣeṣu kasyacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3819: kadācit kiṃcij jñānaṃ nivarteta / na ca evaṃbhūtaṃ kiṃcid asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3820: sarvasya kenacit kadācit jñānāt / jñāna-mātra-arthakriyāyām apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:3821: asāmarthye vastv eva na syāt / tathā hi tal-lakṣaṇaṃ vastv iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3822: vakṣyāmaḥ / tasya ca vināśa-avyabhicārāt sa sattā-anubandhī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3823: pratyākhyeyā ata eva eṣāṃ sambandhasya api nityatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3824: ata eva yathā uktād vastu-mātra-anubandhād vināśasya śabda-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3825: sambandha-nityatā api pratyākhyeyā / yā ca śabda-śaktir yogyatā-ākhyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3826: artha-pratipattyā āśrayo jaiminīyair varṇyate sa artha-antaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:3827: eva na bhavati / tathā hi / yogyatā iti rūpa-atiśaya eva bhāvānām ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3828: āveditaṃ prāk / astu vā artha-antaram / tathā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3829: sambandha-doṣaiḥ prāg uktaiḥ śabda-śaktiś ca dūṣitā //283//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3830: ukto hi sambandha-artha-antara-vāde aneka-prakāro doṣaḥ / tena eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3831: sā śabda-śaktir dūṣitā iti na punar ucyate / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3832: na apauruṣeyam ity eva yathā artha-jñāna-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3833: dṛṣṭo anyathā api vahny-ādir aduṣṭaḥ puruṣa-āgasā //284//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3834: bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3835: eva eṣām ayathārtha-jñāna-hetutvam / na hi puruṣa-doṣa-upadhānād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3836: eva artheṣu jñāna-vibhramaḥ / tad-rahitānām api pradīpa-ādīnāṃ nīla-utpala-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3837: ādiṣu vitatha-jñāna-jananāt / tad ime śabdāḥ saṃskāra-nirapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3838: prakṛtyā ca artheṣu pratibhāna-hetavaḥ syuḥ / svabhāva-viśeṣād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3839: vahny-ādi-vat / vitatha-vyaktayaś ca niyamena eva niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3840: kāraṇa-abhāvād ayuktam iti cet / avitatha-vyakti-niyame kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3842: vyakti-niyamaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate / athavā vahny-ādi-vad eva artheṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3843: ubhaya-jñāna-hetutvaṃ syāt / na hy apauruṣeyā api vahny-ādaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3844: ekatra yathārtha-jñāna-hetavo api sarvatra tathā bhavanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3845: tathā śabdānām apy apauruṣeyatve apy ubhayaṃ syād iti / bhavatu
SA15dhkpvsvu:3847: na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣv etad asti / nanv evaṃvidho anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:3848: apy asty eva dharmas teṣām api saṃketa-balād anyathā-vṛtteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3849: kārya-janana-svabhāva-sthitau ca eṣāṃ samaya-āder apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3850: tataḥ pratītir artheṣu sarvasya sarvadā syāt / na ca asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3851: tasmān na śabdāḥ sthita-svabhāvā iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3852: na jñāna-hetutā eva syāt tasminn akṛtake mate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3853: nityebhyo avastu-sāmarthyān na hi janma asti kasyacit //285//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3854: yady akṛtakaḥ śabdo na tasmād artheṣu pratītir eva syāt / pratīti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3856: sambhāvanā-ayogāt / evam ayaṃ janako na evam iti vivecanīyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3857: rūpa-bhedasya abhāvāt / na yādṛśo asya ajanakas tādṛśa eva janako
SA15dhkpvsvu:3858: yuktaḥ / anya-apekṣā api niṣiddhā eva / tasmān na nityānāṃ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3859: vijñāna-janana-sāmarthyam / kadācid ajanane nityam ajanana- prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3860: kārya-sātatya-adarśanāc ca na te kathaṃcit kartāra ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:3861: ukta-prāyam / yā apy etā nitya-abhimateṣv ākāśa-ādiṣu pratipattayas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3862: tā api na tat-svabhāva-bhāvinyaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3864: jāyante buddhayas tatra kevalaṃ na artha-gocarāḥ //286//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3866: iti tasmin saty asyāḥ kāraṇe yogye sā bhavaty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3867: tad yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit jñānaṃ syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3868: sarvasya sarvadā syāt / kārya-viśeṣā hi vyaktayaḥ kathaṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:3870: vastu-viśeṣam apekṣanta iti yuktam / tathā akārya-viśeṣo nityo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3871: bhāvaḥ kenacid gṛhyamāṇas tat-kāraṇa-apekṣo yadi grahaṇam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3872: janayet yuktaṃ yat tena eva gṛhyeta / tac ca sthita-svabhāvatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:3873: na sambhavati iti / sarveṇa samaṃ gṛhyeta na vā kenacid iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3874: san kenacid dṛṣṭo na nityaḥ kaścid atīndriyaḥ syāt / na ca etad asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3875: tasmād artha-sāmarthya-anapekṣāḥ samāropita-gocarā āntaram eva upādānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3877: eva ākāśa-ādiṣu sarvasya sambhavanti iti / tasmān na aparāvṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3878: dharmāḥ śabdāḥ / tattve vā kuta etad avitatha-artha-pratītaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3879: eva iti / na hy agnir himasya bheṣajam ity ādiṣu śīta-pratighāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3880: sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ agneḥ khyāpyata iti sarvaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3882: lokaḥ sva-saṃketam anuvidadhad evaṃ pratyeti āhosvic śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3883: svabhāva-sthiter iti sandehaḥ / loka-icchayā api parāvartyamānāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3884: śabdāḥ punar anyatra anyathā dṛśyanta iti loka-prasiddhy-anuvidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:3885: api sambhavaty eṣām anyathābhāvaḥ / tasmāt kasyacid avaiparītya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3886: darśane api sarveṣāṃ tathābhāvo na sidhyati / akṛtaka-svabhāvatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3887: api hy eṣāṃ kaścin mithyā-artha-niyato api syād iti svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3889: mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣv eva dṛṣṭam ity akṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3891: atha yan mithyā-arthaṃ vacanaṃ tad akhilaṃ kṛtakam iti hetu-vyatirekeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3893: satya-artham iti syād vinā apy anvayena / yo hi yena avyāptas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3894: tatra tad-vyatirekaḥ śaṅkyeta / na ca viruddhayor ekatra sambhavo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3895: asti / asambhave ca vijātīyasya gaty-antara-abhāvād iṣṭa-artha-siddhes
SA15dhkpvsvu:3897: vyatireka-mātreṇa eva siddher iti / satyam etat yadi vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3898: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ sidhyet / sa tu na siddhaḥ / yasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:3899: hetāv asambhave anukte bhāvas tasya api śaṅkyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3901: yadi hetoḥ sādhya-vipakṣe abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhya-vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3902: hetu-vyatireko vyāpnuyāt / na ca tatra tasya asambhave
SA15dhkpvsvu:3903: pramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na ca aviruddha-vidhiḥ pratiṣedha-sādhano
SA15dhkpvsvu:3904: yuktaḥ / atiprasaṅgāt / na ca ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra asambhava
SA15dhkpvsvu:3905: eva pṛthag viruddha-sahabhāvinām api darśanāt / anityatva-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:3906: prayatnānantarīyaka-itarayor / na ca tathāvidhasya adarśanād asattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3908: na asattā-siddhir ity uktaṃ sarvato anupalambhanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3910: na hy ayaṃ puruṣa-mātrakaḥ sarvaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho yena asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3911: darśana-nivṛttyā na tathā syāt / yasya hi jñānaṃ jñeya-sattāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3912: na vyabhicarati sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ śobheta adarśanān na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3913: tad ime svabhāva-deśa-kāla-viprakarṣeṇa santo apy anupalakṣyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3914: syuḥ / tathā hi / ko atyantaparokṣe arthe saṃvādanam itarad
SA15dhkpvsvu:3915: vā sarva-darśī vacanasya akṛtakasya itarasya vā vibhāvayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3916: pratipāditaṃ ca etat kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām apy arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3917: punaḥ kathaṃcid anyathābhāvaḥ yathā kvacid deśe madhurāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3919: ca idānīm atad-darśinā tāni pratikṣeptavyāny eva iti / tasmād akṛtakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3920: ca syād syān mithyā-arthaṃ ca iti na virodhaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:3921: hi iyam anupalabdhir adṛśya-ātmasv abhāva-sādhikā ity uktam / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:3922: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam ity aniścayād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3924: anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhya-dharmiṇi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3926: tathā ca uktam / ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:3928: iti / ko hy adṛṣṭa-virodhasya sambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta / tad ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3931: sa eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo hetur ato anvayī //291//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3932: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam iti hetu-vipakṣeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:3933: sādhya-vipakṣasya vyāptis tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau syāt / tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:3934: bhavatas tena vyāpty-ayogāt / yā eva ca vijātīyayor vyāvṛtti-siddhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3936: pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3937: siddhiḥ / tan na kaścid hetur ananvayo nāma / eka-vyavacchedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:3939: api tathā syāt / na / vyatireka-vyavacchedasya bhāva-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3942: rūpatvāt / abhāva-rūpas tu vyatirekaḥ sa ca vyatiricyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:3943: bhāvam upasthāpayati na evaṃ nairātmya-ādayaḥ svabhāva-viśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3945: lakṣaṇatvād ātmanaḥ / tad rūpaṃ nairātmyaṃ na ātma-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3946: mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3947: siddhiḥ syāt / ātma-vyavacchedena nirātmano bhāvasya parāmarśād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3948: adoṣa iti cet / paryudāsena vastu-saṃsparśād tad eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:3949: vastu-rūpaṃ nairātmyam āyātam / yasya api na abhāva-rūpo vyatirekas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3950: tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3951: na anvaya-anuṣaṅgaḥ / tathā anairātmye api na bhāva-siddhiḥ / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3952: na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇa-ādimattvād iti vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:3954: dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3955: na ātmani siddhim upasthāpayati / tathā sādhye api prāṇa-ādibhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:3956: vyudasyamānaṃ syāt kevalam / nairātmye abhāvāt prāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3957: ādayas tan-nirasanā na ātma-upasthāpanāḥ / tatra bhāva-asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3958: na ca nairātmya-nivṛttyā ātma-siddhiḥ syāt / vipakṣa-vyatireka-darśane
SA15dhkpvsvu:3959: api prasaṅgāt / tan na viparyaya-vyāptir vyatireka-asiddhau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3960: tat-siddhir eva ca anvaya-siddhiḥ / asiddhau vā tad-vyatireka-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3961: siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ / tan na ananvayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:3963: apauruṣeyān nivṛttāv api na satya-arthatvam / prakāra-antara-sambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3964: dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3965: abhāvāt / te tv anarthakā api syur iti na iṣṭasiddhiḥ / artha-pratīter
SA15dhkpvsvu:3966: na anarthakā iti cet / eṣa puruṣa-vyāpāraḥ syāt / artha-antara-vikalpa-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3968: anye anyathā vyācakṣate / tad-anusāreṇa ca keṣāṃcit pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3969: tathā ayam anarthakeṣv artha-vikalpaḥ puruṣa-kṛtaḥ na tu śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3971: na hi prakṛtyā prakāśanās tam apekṣante vahny-ādayaḥ / puruṣas
SA15dhkpvsvu:3972: tu sva-samaya-vyāpāram ācakṣāṇa upadiśati iti nyāyyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3974: ca eko naisargiko anyas tu pauruṣeya iti duravasānam / asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:3975: viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa-saṃvāda iti cet / etad uttaratra niṣetsyāmaḥ na asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:3978: idānīm apauruṣeyam / santi puruṣa-kṛtāny api vākyāni kānicid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3979: evaṃvidhāni iti teṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tadvad eṣām apy abhimata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3980: arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa-anurodhinī ca / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:3981: ca idaṃ mantrā apauruṣeyāś ca iti vyāhataṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3983: yuktam / yady ete mantrāḥ kasyacit samayo yathā mat-praṇītam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3985: anena arthena yojayāmi iti parārtha-paratā-anurodhena anyato vā kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:3986: hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tadā mantra-prayogāt kadācit artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3988: atha api bhāva-śaktiḥ syād anyatra apy aviśeṣataḥ //292//
SA15dhkpvsvu:3989: na vai puruṣa-samayān mantrebhyo artha-siddhiḥ / kiṃ tarhi / bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:3990: svabhāva eṣa yad ime kathaṃcin niyuktāḥ phaladāḥ / tat tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:3991: rūpaṃ varṇānāṃ sarvatra aviśiṣṭam iti yathākathaṃcit prayuktād
SA15dhkpvsvu:3992: api phalaṃ syāt / varṇā eva hi mantro na anyat kiṃcit / tat-kramo
SA15dhkpvsvu:3994: kramasya arthāntaratvaṃ ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3995: na varṇa-vyatirikto anyaḥ krama iti niveditam etat / avyatireke
SA15dhkpvsvu:3996: ca varṇā eva mantras / te ca aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra iti sarvadā phaladāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:3997: syuḥ / upaplavas tv alpīyaso api kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:3999: ca / sarva-bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya ananuṣṭhānād asaṃnidher
SA15dhkpvsvu:4000: na artha-anarthau / kiṃ ca kramasya arthāntaratve anarthāntaratve
SA15dhkpvsvu:4001: vā varṇa-ātmanas tat-krama-ātmano vā mantrasya artha-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:4004: yato hi bhāva-śakteḥ phala-utpattiḥ sā avikalā iti na phala-vaikalyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4005: syāt / na hi kāraṇa-sākalye kārya-vaikalyaṃ yuktam / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4009: yadi mantrā vidhānād anyato vā kaṃcit svabhāva-atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4010: sa tatra samartho apekṣyaḥ syāt / na ca nityeṣv etad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4011: asti ity uktam / tat kim ayam asamartho apekṣyata ity anapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4012: sadā kuryur na vā kadācid anatiśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4013: sarvasya sādhanaṃ te syur bhāva-śaktir yad īdṛśī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4015: yadi bhāva-śaktayā eva mantrāḥ siddhi-pradā na te kaṃcit parihareyur
SA15dhkpvsvu:4016: yajamānam anyaṃ vā / na hy anyaṃ prati svabhāvo atad-bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4017: bhavati / tasya tena anapakarṣaṇād anyena ca anutkarṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4019: abhāvāt / ata eva asya asaṃskāryatvāt prayoktā api na asti / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4021: saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu-bhedo hi bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4022: prayoktṛ-bhedān niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet //295//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4023: ādheyaviśeṣā hy anityā bhāvāḥ / tad-hetoḥ svabhāva-bhede tataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4024: samāsādita-atiśayatvād anyatra anyathā syuḥ / na abhede / kāraṇa-aviśeṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:4025: kārya-aviśeṣāt / viśeṣe tasya ahetukatva-prasaṅgād ity ukta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4026: prāyam / tad ime mantrāḥ svabhāva-atiśayāt phaladāyinaḥ kāryā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4027: api na śūdra-ādi-prayoge apy anyathā syuḥ / śūdra-vipra-abhidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4030: asti / tayor jāti-bheda iti cet / sa khalv ākṛti-guṇa-śakti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4031: bhede dṛṣṭo gava-aśva-vat / anupadeśaṃ ca enaṃ lokaḥ pratipadyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4032: na tadvad anayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇaṃ viniyataṃ paśyāmaḥ / apaśyantaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4033: ca kathaṃ bhedaṃ pratipadyemahi / yo apy ayaṃ nāma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4034: bheda-anvayo loke pratīti-bhedaḥ so asaty api jāti-bhede vyāpāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4036: tad ime aviśiṣṭena prayujyamānā mantrās tato aviśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4037: svabhāvam āsādayanti / tena aviśeṣeṇa eva phaladāḥ syuḥ / yadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4038: tu samayād ebhyaḥ phalaṃ tadā ayam adoṣaḥ / samayakārasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4039: ruceḥ phala-utpatti-niyamāt / svabhāva-vṛttayo hi bhāvās tan-mukhena
SA15dhkpvsvu:4041: yathākathaṃcid vṛtteḥ / yad api prayoktā phalam aśnuta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4043: vā paśyāmaḥ / tad ubhayaṃ viśeṣa-janmani syāt / anyathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4045: yena tataḥ kaścit phalam aśnute anyo na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4046: prayogo yady abhivyaktiḥ sā prāg eva nirākṛtā //296//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4047: na hi nityānāṃ kācid abhivyaktir ity uktam yato abhivyañjakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4049: vyaktiś ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalair yadi yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4050: syāc śrotaḥ phala-sambandho vaktā hi vyakti-kāraṇam //297//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4051: na hi śabdasya anyataḥ svarūpa-pariṇāmo vyaktir na apy āvaraṇa-vigamanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4052: kiṃ tu tad-viṣayā pratītir aśrūyamāṇe avyakta-vyapadeśāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4053: tatra yadi buddhi-hetur vaktā syāt tat tulyaṃ śrotary api iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4054: so api phalaṃ vaktṛ-vad aśnuvīta / na hi vaktuḥ kaścid anyas
SA15dhkpvsvu:4056: na vaktur iti viśeṣa iti cet / kaḥ punar upayogo vaktuḥ śrotari
SA15dhkpvsvu:4057: yena upādhir iṣyate / tataḥ śabda-śrutir iti cet / nanu tad eva idaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4058: paryanuyujyate kathaṃ tata iti / asambandhāt / viṣaya-upanayanād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4059: ayam asya śrāvakaḥ syāt / tac ca na śakyam tasya kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:4060: apy apariṇāmāt / indriya-saṃskāra-ādayo apy uktāḥ / māṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4061: śrāvayaty ahaṃ śrāvayāmi iti tayoḥ pratyayād vaktṛ-śrotṛ-bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:4062: iti cet / anupakārya-upakārakād bhrānti-mātrāt tad-bhāve atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4063: anyatra api bhrāntyā pratyaya-darśanāt / sarvathā upakāra-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:4064: ca tathā pratyayo na yuktaḥ / sarveṣāṃ parasparam evaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4065: prasaṅgāt / bhrāntir api kutaścid upakāre sati kayācit pratyāsattyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4066: anyatra bhavati / sa apy atyanta-anupakāre na syāt / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4070: manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syāc śabdo hi śrotra-gocaraḥ //298//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4072: evaṃ sāmānye api prasaṅgaḥ / na brūmaḥ śabda eva iti / śabdas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:4073: avaśyaṃ tal-lakṣaṇas tasya lakṣaṇa-antara-abhāvāt / tatra yadi
SA15dhkpvsvu:4075: śruti-viṣayāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā jāpī na mantra-phalena
SA15dhkpvsvu:4076: yujyate na api manasā japan / na hi tadā śrotreṇa kaṃcid arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4078: pāraṃparyeṇa tajjatvāt tad-vyaktiḥ sā api cen matiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4079: na hi manasā dhyāyato api mantra-ābhāsā buddhiḥ śabda-śravaṇād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4080: ṛte / tataḥ śabda-prabhavāt sā api śabda-vyaktir eva / anavasthā evaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4081: syāt / śabda-artha-vikalpānām api paraṃparayā prasūtir asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4084: tathā syus tad-arthā ced asiddhaṃ kalpanā-anvayāt //299//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4085: na brūmaḥ sarvā śabda-prabhavā buddhis tad-vyaktir iti / yā tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4086: tad-viṣayā sā tasya vyaktir iti / mano-vikalpasya tad-viṣayatvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4087: asiddham / na hi svalakṣaṇe vikalpānāṃ vṛttir iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4088: te hi yathāsvam āntarād vikalpa-vāsanā-prabodhād anapekṣita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4090: na hi yo yasya sattā-upadhānaṃ na apekṣate sa tasya hetuḥ / ahetuś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4091: ca kathaṃ viṣayaḥ / tasmān na mano-vikalpaḥ śabda-vyaktir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4092: yatas tadvān prayoktā syāt / tat-prasūtā tad-viṣayā buddhis tad-vyaktiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4093: tad-āśrayaḥ prayoktā iti / atra apy uktaṃ śrotary api prasaṅga
SA15dhkpvsvu:4094: iti / taj-jñāne ca prayoge śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate / tasya jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4095: jananāt / na puruṣaḥ śabde / tadātmany anupakārāt / atha ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:4096: puruṣaḥ śabdānāṃ prayoktā ity alaukiko ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4103: samayam ārocayet yathā-samayaṃ ca arthaṃ niṣpādayed iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4104: na manojapa-ādāu doṣaḥ / vastu-svabhāvāt tu phalāv āptāv atat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4105: svabhāva-saṃsparśe na syāt / yad uktaṃ na varṇebhyo anyā kācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:4107: ānupūrvyām asatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śrutau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4109: na hi saro rasa ity ādi-pādeṣu kaścid varṇa-bhedo na ca varṇa-vyatiriktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4110: anyad yataḥ kārya-bhedaḥ syāt / bhinnāṃ ca tayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4111: pratibhāṃ paśyāmaḥ ānupūrvīm eva ca atulyām / na ca kāraṇa-abhede
SA15dhkpvsvu:4112: kārya-bhedo yuktaḥ / tasmād asti sā bhedavatī yato ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4119: apekṣya tat-smṛtiṃ paścād ādhatte smṛtim ātmani //303//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4125: pūrva-pratyayāni / tad ime anyānya-hetavo varṇāḥ sva-kāraṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4126: ānupūrvī-janmānaḥ / śruti-kāle api yadā manda-cāriṇaḥ pūrva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4128: pūrva-varṇa-smaraṇa-apekṣā eva smṛtim upalīyante / sa eṣa varṇānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4132: anyad eva tato rūpaṃ tad varṇānāṃ padaṃ padam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4134: tasmān na khalv eka eva padeṣu varṇānāṃ svabhāvaḥ kartṛ-citta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4135: saṃskāra-bhedena bhedāt / sa ca paraspara-sahitaḥ kārya-bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4137: sā ca ānupūrvī varṇānāṃ pravṛttā racana-ākṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4140: ity uktam / sā ca puruṣa-vitarka-vicāra-kṛtā iti na sthita-kramā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4143: ādīnāṃ bīja-aṅkura-ādīnāṃ ca sva-icchayā krama-racanā śakyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:4144: kartum / tata eva puruṣa-dharma-saṃkhyāte vikalpa-anukrame sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:4148: sati indhane dāha-vṛtter asaty abhāvād adṛṣṭa-indhano api dahano
SA15dhkpvsvu:4149: na anindhanas tasya deśa-kāla-niyama-ayogāt / niyame ca tasya eva indhanatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4151: api varṇa-anukramaḥ puruṣa-vikalpaṃ yadi na apekṣeta nirālambanaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4152: svayaṃ prakāśeta / yatne api na śakyeta / atat-prabhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4153: kvacic śaktau sarvas tathā syāt / viśeṣa-abhāvāt / tad-bhāva-bhāvino
SA15dhkpvsvu:4154: atad-viśiṣṭasya ca atat-kṛtau sarvatra kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:4156: vā vaktavyam / sarve api ghaṭa-ādayo bhāvāḥ kṛtrimā akṛtrimā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4157: prasajanti / tatra apy evaṃ vikalpanāyāḥ sambhavāt / viśeṣa-abhāvāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:4158: ca / tān api hi para-kriyā-darśana-pūrvakam eva anyaḥ karoty avidita
SA15dhkpvsvu:4159: kartāraś ca kecid iti sarveṣāṃ keṣāṃcid vā akriyā-abhiniveśo astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4160: tasmāt sarvā eva iyaṃ varṇa-ānupūrvī prasiddha-kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4164: ayaṃ kramo varṇānāṃ viṣa-nirghāta-ādi-samartho na anya iti yady
SA15dhkpvsvu:4165: anyo api jānīyat taṃ tathā eva pratipadyeta / na ca evam / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4166: ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvato api kārya-kṛt kaiścid eva vijñāta ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:4167: asti parokṣa-artha-darśī puruṣaḥ / na hy ayam arthaḥ samartho
SA15dhkpvsvu:4168: na ayam iti śakyam unnetum asaṃkīrṇasya liṅga-viśeṣasya asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4170: upadeśe api kathaṃcit svabhāva-viveka-apratīter anyatra kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4171: saṃvādāt tasya ca karaṇāt prāg draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:4172: ca ayam anukramaḥ svabhāvataḥ kārakaḥ kasyacid āśu-siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:4173: anyasya cirād aparasya vrata-caraṇa-ādy-apekṣaṇāt / ekasmād api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4175: mantrāṇāṃ punaḥ kvacid visaṃvādāt / na hy ayaṃ prakāraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4176: svabhāve yuktaḥ / svabhāvasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt / puruṣas
SA15dhkpvsvu:4177: tu sva-icchā-pravṛttiḥ sattva-sabhāgatā-ādi-vaśāt sā iva aviśeṣād vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4178: kaṃcid anugṛhṇāti na aparam iti yuktam / vrata-caryā-bhraṃśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4180: siddhy-asiddhī iti cet / na / dharma-viruddhānām api kraurya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4182: tantra-ādiṣu darśanāt / taiś ca siddhi-viśeṣāt / na ca evaṃvidho
SA15dhkpvsvu:4183: dharma-svabhāva iti ca yathāvasaraṃ nivedayiṣyāmaḥ / maitrī-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4184: śauca-dharma-parāyaṇānāṃ ca tan-nimittam eva kasyāścid siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:4185: asiddher viparyaye ca punaḥ siddheḥ / na ca eka-rūpāt karmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4186: sa tad-virodhī dharmo yukto adharmaś ca / katham idānīṃ dharma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4187: phalam iṣṭam adharma-ātmano vrata-āder aśnute / na vai tasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4188: tad iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ vrata-āder vipāko api tu pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4190: adharma-ātmano vratasya āgāmi phalam aniṣṭam / sa tu mantra-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4191: prayogas tasya iṣṭa-phalasya karmaṇaḥ kathaṃcid upakārāt pācakaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4193: dharmā sa dharmas tena kṛtaḥ sa tathā tad-ārādhanena phalati iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4195: vinā api puruṣeṇa tad-upakārāt phalam iti cet / na / puruṣa-ākāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4198: eva hi viṣa-karma-ādi-karaṇāt / tasmāt ca mantrāḥ puruṣa-pranītā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4200: ye api tantravidaḥ kecin mantrān kāṃścana kurvate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4202: rathyā-puruṣā api kecana tantrajñāḥ svayaṃ-kṛtair mantraiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4203: kiṃcit karma kurvanti / tathā anyo apy anatiśayaś ca kartā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:4204: mantrāṇām iti / na / teṣāṃ prabhāvavatā eva adhiṣṭhānāt / tat-kṛtaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4205: hi te samayam anupālayantas tad-upadeśena ca vartamānāḥ samarthāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4207: tad-ākāra-dhyāna-āder eva prayogāt / tasmāt tad-adhiṣṭhānam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4208: tat tādṛśam ity unneyam / api ca / so api tādṛśaḥ prabhāvavān
SA15dhkpvsvu:4209: eva ananya-sādhāraṇa-śaktitvād iti puruṣa-viśeṣa eva samarthitaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4210: kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāś ca vācyā mantrāḥ phala-īpsunā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4211: na hy akṛtakānāṃ prayogaḥ sambhavati na ca aprayuktebhyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4212: phalam iti prayogāt phalam icchatā kṛtakā mantrā vācyāḥ pauruṣeyāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4216: pratipāditā hi puruṣa-kṛtās tad-adhiṣṭhānāc ca phaladā mantrāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4217: tad asti kaścid atiśayavān iti tat-pratikṣepa-sādhanāny api prativyūḍhāni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4219: pramāṇa-ābhaṃ yathārthā asti na hi śeṣavato gatiḥ //311//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4220: yat tu buddhi-indriya-vacana-yogāt puṃstvād iti puruṣa-atiśaya-pratikṣepa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4221: sādhanaṃ tat tv agamakam eva / pratikṣepa-sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4222: sādhanayor asambhavāt / na hy atīndriyeṣv atad-darśinaḥ pratikṣepaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4223: sambhavati / satām apy eṣām ajñānāt / ata eva virodha-asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4224: avirodhinā ca saha sambhava-avirodhād ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4225: na api itara-sāmānya-siddhir viśeṣa-asambhavasya jñātum aśakyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4227: api kasyacid viśeṣasya darśanāt / sambhavad-viśeṣe ca sāmya-asiddhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4228: ity uktam / tasmāc śeṣavad anumānam etat / vyatirekasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4229: sandehād asamartham adarśane api vipakṣa-vṛtteḥ / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4230: ca evaṃvādino jaiminīyāḥ svam eva vādaṃ sva-vācā vidhurayanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4232: artho ayaṃ na ayam artho na iti śabdā vadanti na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4233: kalpyo ayam arthaḥ puruṣais te ca rāga-ādi-saṃyutāḥ //312//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4234: tatra ekas tattvavin na anya iti bhedaś ca kiṃ-kṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4235: tadvat puṃstve katham api jñānī kaścit kathaṃ na vaḥ //313//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4236: na khalv ete vaidikāḥ śabdā evaṃ vikrośanti eta bhavanto brāhmaṇā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4237: ayam asmākam artho grāhyo na anya iti kevalam anabhivyakta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4238: artha-viśeṣa-saṃsargāḥ śrutim abhipatanti / tatra ekaḥ puruṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4239: kaṃcid arthaṃ kalpayaty anyo aparam / na ca śabdānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4240: kaścit svabhāva-pratiniyamo yena ekam artham anurundhate na aparam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4241: kevalaṃ samaya-vaśāt taṃ tam āviśanto dṛśyante / teṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4243: kaścit tattvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na apara iti na nyāyyam / atha
SA15dhkpvsvu:4244: kutaścid atiśayād buddhi-indriya-ādīnāṃ sa eva vetti na aparaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4245: kuto ayam atīndriya-jñāna-atiśayaḥ / tathā anyo api draṣṭā deśa-kāla-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4246: svabhāva-viprakṛṣṭānām arthānāṃ kim asambhavī dṛṣṭaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:4247: hi tat-pratikṣepa-sādhanāni kānicid yāni na enam upalīyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4248: yathā ayaṃ tat-sādhana-sambhave apy asya viśeṣas tathā anyasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4250: yasya pramāṇa-saṃvādi vacanaṃ so arthavid yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4251: na hy atyantaparokṣeṣu pramāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ //314//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4252: syād etan na vayaṃ puruṣa-prāmāṇyāt kasyacid vyākhyānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4253: abhiniviṣṭāḥ / kiṃ tarhi / pramāṇa-antara-saṃvādād / bahuṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4254: vyākhyātṛṣu yaḥ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣa-ādikaṃ saṃsyandayati so
SA15dhkpvsvu:4255: anumanyate / tan na / atīndriyeṣv adṛṣṭa-ādiṣu pramāṇa-antara-avṛtteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4256: tad-asambhavād eva hy āgamas tat-pratipatty-artham upayācyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4257: anyathā saty api tasmin pramāṇa-antara-avṛttāv apratipatteḥ / tataś
SA15dhkpvsvu:4258: ca kevalād artha-pratipatter asādhanam eva āgamaḥ syāt / kevalād anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:4259: apy atīndriyeṣv apratipattir iti cet / katham atīndriyaś ca nāma
SA15dhkpvsvu:4260: pratyakṣa-ādi-viṣayaś ca / te punaḥ sva-viṣaye apy āgamam apekṣya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4261: sādhakāś cet / anāgamād dhūma-āder agny-ādi-pratyayo na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4262: na vai pravṛtta āgame pramāṇa-antaram anviṣyate kiṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:4263: sa eva āgama-pravṛttir na jñāyata iti cet / svayaṃ samarthasya prasādhane
SA15dhkpvsvu:4264: asya tad-āgama-upadhānaṃ kam atiśayaṃ puṣṇāti / asamarthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4265: tv āgama-pravṛttim api na eva sādhayiṣyati / sā ca atīndriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4267: siddhā / anyac ca evam āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4269: sa āgama iti prāptaṃ nirarthā apauruṣeyatā //315//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4270: tulye apy āgama-vāde pramāṇa-balād āgamasya kvacid āgamatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:4271: pramāṇa-saṃvādo vacanānām āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / na apuruṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4272: kriyā / tasyāḥ sarva-artheṣu tulyatve api pramāṇa-abādhanāt pratipatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4276: atīndriyārthavit kaścid asti ity abhimataṃ bhavet //316//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4277: yady āgama-anapekṣaṃ jñāna-ayāthātathyaṃ puruṣasya iṣyate parokṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:4278: arthe santi puruṣā atīndriyārthadṛśa iti iṣṭaṃ syāt / pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4281: anvākarṣati iti na puruṣa-atiśayo nivāryaḥ syāt / tasmān na asty atīndriyeṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4284: svayaṃ rāga-ādimān na arthaṃ vetti vedasya na anyataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4285: na vedayati vedo api veda-arthasya kuto gatiḥ //317//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4286: sarva eva hi puruṣo anatikrānta-doṣa-viplavas tam atīndriyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4287: artha-viśeṣa-pratiniyamaṃ vyākhyātā na svayaṃ vetti / na apy enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4288: anyo vedayati / tasya api tulya-prasaṅgatvāt / na hy andhena ākṛśyamāṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4289: andhaḥ panthānaṃ pratipadyate / na api svayaṃ vedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4290: svārthaṃ vivṛṇoti / upadeśa-vaiyarthya-prasaṅgāt / tad ayam aparijñāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4293: tena agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti śrutau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4294: khādec śvamāṃsam ity eṣa na artha ity atra kā pramā //318//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4295: kvacid apy arthe pratyāsatti-viprakarṣa-rahitasya agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4297: ghṛta-ādi prakṣiped ity ayam arthaḥ na punaḥ śvamāṃsaṃ khāded
SA15dhkpvsvu:4298: iti na atiśayaṃ paśyāmaḥ / nanv ayaṃ sarvatra samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4300: kiṃ samanuyanti āhosvid viparyayam iti / na / upadeṣṭuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4303: ca bruvāṇo loka-saṃketa-prasiddhim anupālayati iti tato api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4304: tad-artha-siddhiḥ syāt na apauruṣeyāṇāṃ śabdānām / tatra kasyacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:4305: samīha-abhāvāt / api ca nyāyam eva anupālayantaḥ paṇḍitā heya-upādeya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4306: tad-āśrayeṣu saṃghaṭante na tu pravāda-mātreṇa iti na samānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4307: prasaṅgaḥ / tac ca yathāvasaraṃ pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ / nanu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4309: vacanād arthaḥ pratipadyate / na / apratyayāt / na hi kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:4310: askhalita iti sarvaṃ tathā / vyabhicāra-darśanāt / tat pravṛtter
SA15dhkpvsvu:4311: avisaṃvādena vyāpty-asiddheś ca / agatyā ca idam āgama-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4312: iṣṭam / na ato niścayaḥ / tan na pramāṇam āgama ity apy uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4314: na yukter na lokād iti tatra apratipattir nyāyyā / tatra api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4318: aneka-artheṣu śabdeṣu yena artho ayaṃ vivecitaḥ //319//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4319: na hy ayaṃ loka-vyavahāro apauruṣeyāc śabda-artha-sambandhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4321: upadeśa-apekṣaṇāt / na hy apauruṣeye tasminn upadeśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4322: yuktaḥ / tasya kenacid ajñānāt / atīndriyatvāt / aindriyakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:4323: svayaṃ pratipatti-prasaṅgāt / rūpa-ādi-vat / upadeśe ca puruṣāṇāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4324: svatantrāṇāṃ yathā-tattvam upadeśena avisaṃvādasya asiddher anāśvāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4326: āgatam tato artha-siddhir iti cet / tasya api śabda-ātmakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:4327: tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ katham asya artho vidita iti / puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:4328: hi svayaṃ samitānāṃ śabdānām arthaṃ śṛṅga-grāhikayā api tāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:4329: abudhaṃ bodhayed ity asti pauruṣeyānāṃ śabdānām artha-gatāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:4330: upāyaḥ / apauruṣeyas tu śabdo na evaṃ karoti / na ca asya kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:4331: kvacit sambandha-niyamaṃ jñātum īśa ity apratipattir eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4332: tad-arthasya / api ca vedas tad-vyākhyānaṃ vā puruṣeṇa puruṣāya upadiśyamānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4333: anaṣṭa-sampradāyam eva anuvartata ity atra api samayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4336: vā kutaścit kāraṇād anyathā racana-adarśanāt / api ca atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:4337: bhavān svam eva mukha-varṇaṃ sva-vāda-anurāgān nūnaṃ vismṛtavān
SA15dhkpvsvu:4338: puruṣo rāga-ādibhir upapluto anṛtam api brūyād iti na asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4339: vacanaṃ pramāṇam iti / tad iha api kiṃ na pratyavekṣyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:4340: sambhavati na vā iti / sa eva upadiśann upaplavād vedaṃ veda-arthaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4341: vā anyathā apy upadiśed iti / śrūyante hi kaiścit puruṣair utsanna-uddhṛtāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:4343: tadvat pracura-adhyetṛkāṇām api kasmiṃścit kāle kathaṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:4348: ca tad-bhaktānām avicāreṇa pratipatter bahuṣv adhyetṛṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4349: sambhāvitāt puruṣād bahulaṃ pratipatti-darśanāt / tato api kathaṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:4351: puruṣa-paraṃparām eva ca atra bhavatām api śṛṇumaḥ / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:4352: kaścid dviṣṭājña-dhūrtānām anyatamaḥ syād api ity anāśvāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4353: tasmān na apauruṣeyād vyākhyānān na api sāmayikāl loka-vyavahārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:4355: vyavahāre darśanāt kasyacid aprasiddha-arthasya aprasiddhasya vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4358: jananāt / iṣṭa-aniṣṭayor aviśeṣāt / aviśiṣṭānāṃ sarva-artheṣv ekam artham
SA15dhkpvsvu:4360: yato lokāt pratītiḥ syāt / api ca / svayam apy ayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:4365: apsarā urvaśī nāma iti loka-vādaḥ / tam anādṛtya-anyām eva artha-kalpanām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4366: ayaṃ kurvāṇaḥ śabda-antareṣu kathaṃ prasiddhiṃ pramāṇayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4367: tatra avirodhād abhyupagama iti cet / na / atra apy atīndriye
SA15dhkpvsvu:4368: virodha-asiddheḥ / anyatra apy avirodhasya duranvayatvāt / viruddhām
SA15dhkpvsvu:4369: apy agnihotrāt svarga-avāptiṃ māndyād ayaṃ na lakṣayed
SA15dhkpvsvu:4370: api / virodha-avirodhau ca bādhaka-sādhaka-pramāṇa-vṛttī / te ca atyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:4371: na abhimate / tat kathaṃ tad-vaśāt pratītiḥ / na ca vacana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4372: vṛtter eva avirodho anyatra api prasaṅgāt / apauruṣeya āgamas tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4373: pravādād artha-siddhiḥ / tatra punar virodha-cintāyām anāśvāsa
SA15dhkpvsvu:4374: āgame syāt / saty api tasminn atathābhāvād arthasya apramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4375: vṛtter anyasya api śaṅkanīyatvāt / yad uktam agnihotraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4377: bhavatv iti sa na bhavati / pradeśa-antareṣu tathā tasya carcanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4378: na / tasya artha-aparijñānāt / pradeśa-antareṣv api tathāvidha-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4379: kalpanāyā anivāryatvāt / yadi hi kvacid vidita-artho ayam apauruṣeyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4380: śabda-rāśiḥ syāt tadā tato artha-pratītiḥ syāt / te tu bāhulye
SA15dhkpvsvu:4381: apy andhā eva sarva iti yatheṣṭam praṇīyante / tasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4382: śabda-antareṣu tādṛkṣu tādṛśy eva astu kalpanā //320//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4383: yādṛśy agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity asya vākyasya / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4385: prasiddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ vādaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca na iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4386: tataś ca bhūyo artha-gatiḥ kim etad dviṣṭa-kāmitam //321//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4387: na prasiddhir nāma anyā anyatra jana-pravādāt / te ca sarve janā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4389: tad eṣāṃ pravādo na pramāṇam / na hi kasyacid api samyak-pratipatter
SA15dhkpvsvu:4391: cāra-vat / teṣām eva puruṣāṇāṃ vacanāt punaḥ parokṣa-artha-sampratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4392: iti kathaṃ tad eva yugapad dveṣyaṃ ca kāmyaṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4393: atha prasiddhim ullaṅghya kalpane na nibandhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4396: iti prasiddher anvaya iti cet / na / prāpteḥ pramāṇa-vṛtti-lakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4397: yat kiṃcana grahaṇaṃ hi prasiddhim apramāṇayatas
SA15dhkpvsvu:4398: tan-mukhena pratītiḥ / nyāyāt prāpti-pratiṣedhāt / tulyā sva-para-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4399: vikalpayor ubhayathā api vṛttir iti kaḥ prasiddhāv anurodhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4403: na prasiddher eka-artha-niścayaḥ śabdānāṃ tata eva śaṅkā-utpatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4404: nānā-arthā hi śabdā loke dṛśyante / loka-vādaś ca pratītiḥ / ata eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4405: nānā-arthā iti tata eka-artha-niyamo na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4408: ity antaraślokaḥ / tasmād avidita-artha-vibhāgeṣu śabdeṣv ekam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4410: jaiminis tad-vyājena svam eva matam āha iti na tīrthakara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4411: antarād asya viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi / tad-artha-vacana-vyāpāra-
