SA15dhkpvsvu:4412: śūnyasya tat-samāropeṇa abhidhānaṃ na sva-vacanam atiśete /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4413: tat-kāriṇā kevalaṃ mithyā-vinītatā eva ātmanaḥ samuddyotitā syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4415: eṣa sthāṇur ayaṃ mārga iti vakti iti kaścana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4416: anyaḥ svayaṃ bravīmi iti tayor bhedaḥ parikṣyatām //325//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4418: vā svayaṃ vacana-upagame na kaścid viśeṣo anyatra jaḍasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4419: pratipatti-māndyāt / api ca eka-artha-niyame saty enaṃ jaiminir
SA15dhkpvsvu:4422: na hi śabdasya kaścid arthaḥ svabhāva-niyataḥ sarvatra yogyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4423: ayogyatve ca tad-apracyuter avidheyasya puruṣāṇāṃ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:4425: jñātā vā atīndriyāḥ kena vivakṣā-vacanād ṛte //326//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4426: puruṣa-praṇīte hi śabde kayācid vivakṣayā sa tāṃ kadācit kvacin
SA15dhkpvsvu:4427: nivedayed api iti vivakṣā-pūrvakānāṃ śabdānām artha-niyamaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4428: pratīyeta api / apauruṣeye tu vidyamāno apy artha-niyamaḥ kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4429: vijñeyaḥ / svabhāva-bhedasya abhāvāt / sati vā pratyakṣasya svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4430: pratīti-prasaṅgāt / apratyakṣe api kenacij jñātum aśakyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4431: na ca asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ / sarva-śabdā hi sarva-artha- pratyāsatti-viprakarṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4434: apauruṣeye sā na asti tasya sā ekārthatā kutaḥ //327//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4435: vivakṣayā hi śabdo arthe niyamyate na svabhāvataḥ tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4436: kvacid apratibandhena sarvatra tulyatvāt / yatra api pratibandhas
SA15dhkpvsvu:4439: saṃketaḥ kriyate / apauruṣeye tu na vivakṣā na saṃketaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4440: kasyacid abhiprāya-abhāvād iti na niyamo na taj-jñānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4441: svabhāva-niyame anyatra na yojyeta tayā punaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4442: yadi saṃketa-nirapekṣaḥ svabhāvata eva artheṣu śabdo nilīnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4443: syāt uktam atra apratibandhād aniyama iti / api ca / svābhāvike
SA15dhkpvsvu:4444: vācyavācakabhāve na punar vivakṣayā yatheṣṭaṃ niyujyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4446: na hi svabhāva-bheda indriya-gamyaḥ sva-pratītau paribhāṣā-ādikam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4447: apekṣate / nīla-ādi-bheda-vat / tad-apekṣa-pratītayas tu na vastu-svabhāvāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4448: kiṃ tarhi / sāmayikā rāja-cihna-ādi-vat / yaś ca sāmayikaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4449: sa svabhāva-niyato ayuktas tasya icchā-vṛtteḥ / ata eva saṃketāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4452: sva-icchā-vṛttiḥ saṃketaḥ sa iha eva kartuṃ śakyate na anyatra iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:4453: na uparodho asti / sa ca puruṣaiḥ sva-icchayā kriyamāṇas tam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:4454: svabhāvaṃ vyanakti na anyam iti na niyamo asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4455: yatra svātantryam icchāyā niyamo nāma tatra kaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4456: dyotayet tena saṃketo na iṣṭām eva asya yogyatām //329//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4458: yasmāt kila īdṛśaṃ satyaṃ yathā agniḥ śīta-nodanaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4459: vākyaṃ veda-ekadeśatvād anyad apy aparo abravīt //330//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4460: anyas tv apauruṣeyam āgama-lakṣaṇaṃ parityajya anyathā prāmāṇyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4462: yatra apratipattir veda-ekadeśatvāt yathā agnir himasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4463: bheṣajam ity ādi-vākyam iti / tasya idam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4469: sādhana-vac ca asādhanam uktam / tad-asādhanatva-nyāyaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:4470: pūrvam eva uktaḥ / uktaṃ ca idam āgama-lakṣaṇam asmābhiḥ tat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:4471: sarvasya śakya-vicārasya viṣayasya yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena vidhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4473: varaṃ saṃśayitasya vṛttiḥ tatra kadācid avisaṃvāda-sambhavāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:4474: na tv anyatra dṛṣṭa-pramāṇa-uparodhasya puruṣasya pravṛttir iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4476: abhidhānaṃ satya-artham upadarśya sarvaṃ satya-artham āha
SA15dhkpvsvu:4477: śāstraṃ śakya-paricchede api viṣaye pramāṇa-virodhād bahutaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:4479: nityasya puṃsaḥ kartṛtvaṃ nityān bhāvān atīndriyān /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4480: aindriyān viṣamaṃ hetuṃ bhāvānāṃ viṣamāṃ sthitim //332//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4481: nivṛttiṃ ca pramāṇābhyām anyad vā vyasta-gocaram /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4483: virodham asamādhāya śāstra-arthaṃ ca apradarśya saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4487: ity āha vedaḥ tac ca ayuktam ity āvedita-prāyam nityatvaṃ ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:4489: apratyakṣāny eva hi sāmānya-ādīni pratyakṣāni janma-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4490: nivṛttīś ca viṣamāḥ padārthānām anādheyaviśeṣasya prāg akartuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4492: sthānam kāraṇāc ca vināśa ity ādikam anyad api pratyakṣa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4499: bandhakīm api prāgalbhyena vijayate / kācit kila
SA15dhkpvsvu:4500: bandhakī svayaṃ svāminā vipratipatti-sthāne dṛṣṭvā upālabdhā / sā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4501: taṃ pratyuvāca / paśyata mātaḥ puruṣasya vaiparītyaṃ / mayi
SA15dhkpvsvu:4502: dharma-patnyāṃ pratyayam akṛtvā ātmīyayor na itara-abhidhānayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:4504: prārthitā api na saṃgatā / rūpa-guṇa-anurāgena kila mantri-mukhya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4505: dārakaṃ kāmaye aham iti / evaṃjātīyakam etad api vahneḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4508: sidhyed pramāṇaṃ yady evam apramāṇam atha iha kim /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4509: na hy ekaṃ na asti satya-arthaṃ puruṣe bahu-bhāṣiṇi //335//
SA15dhkpvsvu:4510: yathā idam atiduṣkaram atyanta-satya-abhidhānaṃ tathā atyanta-asatya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4511: abhidhānam api / tatra ekasya vacanasya kathaṃcit saṃvādena aviśiṣṭasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:4512: tad-vacana-rāśes tathābhāve na kaścit puruṣo anāptaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4514: na ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ vā vastūnāṃ vaktari dhvaniḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4516: na tāvad etad vacanaṃ vācyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ / na apy eṣāṃ kāryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:4517: tad-abhāve api vaktur vivakṣā-mātreṇa bhāvāt / na ca anyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4518: kaścit kasyacid avyabhicārī / vyabhicāre ca tato anyathā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:4520: pravṛttir vācakānāṃ ca vācya-dṛṣṭi-kṛtā iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4521: syād etat kāryam eva vacanaṃ vācakasya vācya-darśana-vṛtter /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4524: yady eṣa pratiniyamo vācyaṃ vastv antareṇa śabdo na pravartata
SA15dhkpvsvu:4525: iti / bhinneṣu pravādeṣv ekatra vastuni viruddha-svabhāva-upasaṃhāreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:4526: vacana-vṛttir na syāt / na hy ayaṃ sambhavo asti ekaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:4527: śabdo niṣparyāyaṃ nityaś ca syād anityaś ca iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4528: vastubhir na āgamās tena kathaṃcin nāntarīyakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4530: āgamaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad-ādarśita-artha-pratipattaye ajño janaḥ samanveṣate
SA15dhkpvsvu:4533: samīhita-artha-sattām antareṇa api vṛttiṃ paśyato bhavitavyam eva adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:4534: vyabhicāra-vacasām api puruṣāṇāṃ vāci śaṅkayā kiṃ yathārthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:4535: na vā iti / tena na yuktam anena kasyacid vacanena kiṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:4537: tasmān na tan-nivṛttyā api bhāva-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4538: yad uktaṃ sarva-viṣayatvād āgamasya sati vastuny avisaṃvādena
SA15dhkpvsvu:4540: iti tad asya sarva-viṣayatve api vastv-antareṇa āvṛttau syāt / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:4541: ca na asti / tataḥ pratipattukāmasya asiddhir ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:4543: tasmān na pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttāv api viprakṛṣṭeṣv abhāva-niścayaḥ /
